story:
The Atlas Bag fits under the seat in front of you, so you have access to in-flight necessities without having to get up from your seat or reaching for the overhead bin, i.e. (toiletries, medicines, devices, chargers, etc.) 
 

Personal Item Bag Size & Regulations: The Atlas Bag is L17” x W7.6 x H10.2” ” or L44cm x W22cm x H25cm and fits the definition of a personal item bag for most U.S. airlines. The bag fits under standard economy seats. 

 

 

 

The jet-setting Atlas features a dual packing design with two garment bag inserts that allows you to pack and neatly organize your belongings easily. 

Each side has a zip around divider to keep things in place. 

 

Quickly access your laptop from the top zipper and remove it for security. 

 

 On the front of the bag, there are two zipper pockets to stow away passport, credit cards, or power bank which you can easily remove for security.

 

In front of the bag, there is a hidden pocket to tuck away small things you want to access while on the go quickly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 That’s an excellent question. We think every product should be built to be used, not just to look pretty out of the box. Although we believe it should also look pretty out of the box.

 

Our design was inspired by our busy lifestyle. With a mix between office life, traveling to meet clients or just weekend getaways, we needed a bag that could look great yet was designed for maximum functionality. With this goal in mind, we set out to create a bag versatile enough to take on our weekend adventures but stylish and sleek sufficient for a business trip. 

Using only hand-selected premium materials and hardware, we are confident that your ATLAS bag will withstand anything you throw at it. We built the Awesome Travel Bag to be more versatile than ever. Its interior design along with two packing bags allows you to pack for your specific lifestyle without missing a beat.

 

Together the JMNY team has been designing and manufacturing bags, footwear, and apparel for over 10 years. We've designed, built and retailed or products in companies such as Neiman Marcus, Nordstrom, Macy’s, as well as Independents and many more. With our background and experience, we're confident we can deliver a product of the highest quality, at a fraction of the retail price.

 

Over the years, we have come across many bag designs and materials we've wanted to incorporate into our own. A bag designed from the ground up with all aspects meticulously thought out to serve a purpose. It's designed to help as your single bag that can seamlessly transition between your lifestyles.

We are excited to share with you the Atlas travel bag. It's built with only the highest quality materials on the market - no corners cut, Period. 

 

The Atlas Bag makes getting through security and to your gate stress-free with dedicated pockets for all your travel essentials, so you have easy access to your toiletries, tech gadgets, passport, etc.

 

Inserts

The jet-setting Atlas features a dual packing design with two garment bag inserts that allows you to pack and neatly organize your belongings easily. 

 

Shoe Bag

 In case you want to keep your dirty shoes away from other items or want to keep other items away from your shoes, this shoe bag is perfect for the job. 

 

Unisex Toiletry Bag

Jetset “L” Hanging Toiletry Case with a Removable TSA Compliant Waterproof Swivel Hook Pouch.  Perfectly organize your toiletry kits when going for a gym, traveling, outdoor, weekend getaways, business trips, or personal vacations. 

 

Unisex Tech Organizer

Jetset “T” Hanging Electronic Organizer Bag with a Removable TSA Compliant Waterproof Swivel Hook Pouch. Great Organizer for Office Use and Traveling, and Keep Your Important Devices in Reach. 

 

Sling Bag

Durable yet refined, this casual sling is a perfect choice for world travel and everyday adventures. Get to the main compartment through the side, and stash your phone in the front zipper pocket and other essentials in the handy hidden zipper back pocket.

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have been working on Atlas design for the past year and because we wanted to make sure that every element is perfected. We're confident we'll be able to execute production and delivery smoothly and on time. 
We set out to make a truly awesome and amazing looking bag, and we're very proud of the final product. The next important milestone will be mass-production and we've already made lots of progress on that frontier. 
We know that unexpected delays could happen, but we're fully committed to ensuring all our backers will get the best product and on time.

story:
As most of you know, passports are used for travel, and are rarely used outside of this space other than immigration or travel purposes, but this brand of jackets changes all of that.

As travelers ourselves, we are proud of those journeys and our goal is to fill those journeys with various patches to reflect those lifelong memories thru our TrāV-Eler Originals jackets, hooded sweatshirts and sleeveless vests.

These jacket allow travelers to simply display a person's journey thru an array of various unique and custom patches from various places around the world.
 


Pre-order, customize, and create your jacket with Trav-Eler Originals:

1. Preorder a jacket from one of our four styles. The bomber, the hooded sweatshirt, the windbreaker & the sleeveless vest.

2. Select the country patches for each place you've traveled to or those that are on your bucket list.  Once you purchase you will receive a follow up email to provide selected countries.

3. Customize your jacket or hooded sweatshirt with a patch that has your social media username.

4. You will receive a follow up email for social media username tag information, your list of countries and your social media links for the smart features.

The idea of the TrāV-Eler Originals brand came to us while reflecting on our own adventures.

Wouldn't it be cool to create something that allows us to represent our journey instead of a passport? A wearable brand that without words shares your life's journey and the places that you have experienced or plan to experience in your lifetime. 

Trav-Elēr Originals wants to honor the legacy of Anthony Bourdain in creating a brand of  jackets and hooded sweatshirts that promote cultural appreciation, travel, and global awareness.

It is thru our own travel experiences that the world becomes smaller, more familiar and enriching. It is in this common space that we realize that we are more alike than different.  Traveling, visiting its landmarks, and observing the culture, leads to a greater understanding and appreciation for life. It allows for all of us to step outside of our comfort zone and develop an open appreciation for all walks of life.
 




The various patches are positioned on each jacket with distinction and precision, giving the wearer a distinctive look, ranging from points of interest, travel experiences and lifestyle.

The various smart features embedded in the jacket and hooded sweatshirts themselves, such as sharing contact information or connecting to Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram, allows the user to enable others to follow them on their journeys.    
 

​

Each custom jacket or hooded sweatshirt, delivers a strong visual statement about ones life and one's journey without saying a word. It is these commonalities and differences that make the fabric of life so amazing.



As travelers ourselves, we are proud of the footprints that we have left along the way, and it is the TrāV-Eler Originals brand of jackets and hooded sweatshirts that represent our own journeys.

So if you value global connections shared with amazing journeys and experiences, then the TrāV-Eler Originals brand is for you.

Trāv-Elēr Originals makes stylish travel clothing that helps you enhance and appreciate your travel experiences. Our stylish, smart, jacket and hooded sweatshirt apparel can be worn in all types of settings and can be stored when traveling without lugging it around like a piece of luggage with stickers of ports of exit and entry. 

They are the travel essentials made for all seasons: The Bomber, The Hooded Sweatshirt, The Sleeveless Vest and The Windbreaker. 

Each jacket and hooded sweatshirt is created with a look and layer of custom designed and placed patches that reflect the places, the travels and all the locations and experiences that one has experienced in their lifetime.

The jackets in our collective line, the hooded sweatshirts, sleeveless vest, bomber jacket, the Windbreaker, and the ultralight puffy jacket is a must have.

Each is made with the highest quality patches and fabric with smart features embedded into the clothing. This is why our jackets will be the most stylish travel jacket you've ever owned...a jacket that you will keep for a lifetime, while handing it down for generations to come.


 

Stylish: Our line of jackets have a stylish urban look that will complement any trip or city excursion.

Premium Patches: We use the finest quality patches available. Our patches are custom made and we have every country on the map. These patches really compliment the high quality jacket.

Smart Features: This jacket has smart features embedded into the clothing. These features include an ability to use social networking features and exchange contact information as you travel. Keep up with your trip by simply wearing your jacket.

Sleeveless Vest & and the Puffy Jacket - Ultralight : That means it's great for packing. When you pull it out of your suitcase, it is wrinkle free. The jacket keeps you warm and still breathable. 

Durable and made with quality: Our hooded sweatshirts and jackets are as durable as it is well made. Our versatile designs will have you looking great no matter where your travels take you.

Machine Washable: Protected embedded smart features can handle heat and washing.




 

 


 
 

We started with less than $1,000 to produce a prototype and bring our vision to a reality. 

We were determined to create a travel jacket that would evolve with the our travel demographics and the needs of various diversified markets not only for travelers, but even also everyday people who felt the urge to have such an amazing jacket to reflect their own lives and fashionable look.

It is key to our growth that we use crowdfunding platforms to help us generate the funding necessary to scale as well as decrease cost of production in customizing our jackets.  We truly believe that focusing on our customers needs and the quality of our product is the best path forward.

The startup is looking for US$5,000 to start production. When we reach this goal, our immediate plan is purchase product in bulk so we can drastically reduce the cost of the jackets and the hooded sweatshirts.

Right know, our average jacket and hooded sweatshirt prices range between $149-$349.

We would like to sell and customize clothing in price ranges that anyone could afford while understanding that each jacket and hooded sweatshirt is custom made and unique to each individual which still requires dedicated time, resources, and supply needs.




Our guarantee of your backing and support:
Each person who purchases a jacket perk will receive a jacket.
Each person who purchases a hooded sweatshirt perk will receive a hooded sweatshirt.
Each person who purchases a hat perk will receive a hat.

Guaranteed.

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

To best way to determine your size, we recommend using your favorite hooded sweatshirt, fleece or jacket on a table to compare the measurements with ours. This will help to ensure the best fit. All jackets fit to size. Sizes available are small, medium, large and X-Large.

Every contribution will be spent fulfilling the orders of people who generously contributed to our campaign and mission, and once you purchase your jacket, a follow up email will be received so that we can get your listing of cities countries, states, or national parks that you would like to be added to your jacket.

We look forward to providing an awesome keepsake that any global traveler would be proud to wear. 



Your contribution will help us promote the value and impact travel has in our lives as well as our communities. Travel is meant to expand ones level of acceptance and understanding. It thru these travel experiences that we become better versions of ourselves and become positive members of a global community.

​We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to put Trāv-Elēr Originals into production and to generate revenue for mass advertising across the U.S. and worldwide with print advertising, radio, Internet, and even billboards. We know what we’re doing, so we know exactly what's required to get this product off the ground and to take it to beyond worldwide levels.

By backing up this campaign, you are getting in early, and getting a premium product ahead of everyone else at a much cheaper cost compared to the regular price. We would like to decrease the cost of producing the jacket by increasing our overall volume. We also want to produce more in house to control the cost and quality of the jacket. We would also use the funds to build an ecommerce website. 

Some clothing products cost several hundred dollars, with some jackets even costing close to over $500, and they are not even custom. So with that said, we evaluated the cost and the time, to ensure that along with time and supply, we were able to develop a custom jacket at a beyond more than fair price with not only you in mind, but also cost in mind, with time also being considered.

Trāv-Elēr Originals jackets and hooded sweatshirts are not just another added collection to your wardrobe, but more so a statement, a story teller, and an item you will keep forever and even hand down to your children and even your grandchildren for generations to come.


We have been entrepreneurs on our own for a number of years fighting thru many challenges and overcoming many hurdles to achieve success.

However, this journey was different.

We decided to collaborate on this project together because we share a passion for travel and the world and felt that our contribution collectively would produce an amazing jacket and hooded sweatshirt.

Without our joint effort Trāv-Elēr Originals would not be what it has become today.

We are founders who see projects to the end and giving up is not in the blueprint whatsoever, so ensuring that we deliver to all our backers and supporters has to be a guarantee. It is our past experiences that make us ready for this journey. 


 

Both founders are British born expats with a passion for travel.

Both have been friends for many years and share many things in common including the challenging journey of having startups.

Katrina Ramalho is a founder of a travel app and blog called Travelflix.

www.travelflixapp.com

The app assist travelers like your self to find the best places to eat, stay, and play while traveling based on your interest. It also has a host feature to help you find a great guide while you are there. Katrina Ramalho is a Berkeley graduate who has an MBA in International Business who has been fortunate to receive a Presidential Lifetime Achievement award from President Barack Obama.

"I am a global minded person who has backpacked across Europe and traveled to many places", says Katrina. "My passion for travel is greater than anything I may have accomplished, and inspiring others to see the world with innovative products is my mission".

James "Bronz" Stephens is educated in Law, Psychology, and Critical Thinking with a deep background as an Advertising Art Director and a 14 year veteran for a magazine called Music Connection Magazine, which is a 40+ year long industry entertainment magazine.

Along the way, James has touch many fields of entertainment including working with Michael Jackson's record company MJJ Records as an A&R liaison, published his own music magazine, a Power 106 FM Los Angeles weekend news radio personality back in the mid 90's with the Baka Boyz, and ran a few premiere printing companies/shops in the Greater Los Angeles area.

James has spent extensive time traveling across not only the U.S., but also thru out the Central America,  the West Indies and Canada.

Many of the other places James has traveled to includes the Grand Canyon, the Salton Sea, Arches National Park, Monument Valley, Death Valley and many other places too numerous to count.

James comes from an Air Force & Boy Scout family background who has lived extensively between the capital city of London and various modern day "Lord of the Ring" villages stretching south to London and as far North as Birmingham, but James has also lived extensively across the United States.

Many of the other places James has lived in include New Jersey, farm living in Georgia, the Great Lakes state of Michigan, the Rocky Mountains of Colorado, the desert and cattle plains of Texas, and even the wild tundras of the Alaskan wilderness who since, has resided in California since.

"Exploring the world, understanding our entity in this amazing place called the Universe and knowing that we are here for a reason and a purpose is my life journey while traveling," says James.

"I have so much to share with the world and so many other amazing ideas coming forward after this, and like Elon Musk and the late Steve Jobs, I will definitely want to help mold and change the world, one concept and one idea at a time.

One of my ultimate dreams would be to create batteries that can recharge themselves for use in cell phones and other electronics, I "KNOW" this can be done, and by making this project happen and getting past this, that will be one of my ultimate goals while at the same time completing a few other pending project that without a doubt will change the world.

The world has not seen nothing yet, for I have been under the radar for many years, but now starts the journey...watch what I do."



Unlike other campaigns this one is different.

We are opening our doors and allowing people with a access or influence to be able to journey with us...to be a part of our journey, and to share their impact and time in helping us share our jackets and message to the world.

More and exciting details will be provide in our frequent updates. Stay posted and follow us for any and all updates.
 

1. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word.

2. Can you share our crowdfunding social media posts with your friends and please tag them. 

3. Please be sure to follow us on Instagram @traveleroriginals and like the crowdfunding posts.

4. Also please invite your friends to Trāv-Elēr Originals and let them know we are working on customizing a jacket made specially for them!

5. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign with your community.

Thank you for your time, your read, and your interest in this amazing brand that must be shared with the world.

The world is waiting.


Trāv-Elēr Originals

James comes from an Air Force & Boy Scout family background who has lived extensively between the capital city of London and various modern day "Lord of the Ring" villages stretching south to London and as far North as Birmingham, but James has also lived extensively across the United States.Many of the other places James has lived in include New Jersey, farm living in Georgia, the Great Lakes state of Michigan, the Rocky Mountains of Colorado, the desert and cattle plains of Texas, and even the wild tundras of the Alaskan wilderness who since, has resided in California since."Exploring the world, understanding our entity in this amazing place called the Universe and knowing that we are here for a reason and a purpose is my life journey while traveling," says James."I have so much to share with the world and so many other amazing ideas coming forward after this, and like Elon Musk and the late Steve Jobs, I will definitely want to help mold and change the world, one concept and one idea at a time.One of my ultimate dreams would be to create batteries that can recharge themselves for use in cell phones and other electronics, I "KNOW" this can be done, and by making this project happen and getting past this, that will be one of my ultimate goals while at the same time completing a few other pending project that without a doubt will change the world.
The world has not seen nothing yet, for I have been under the radar for many years, but now starts the journey...watch what I do."Unlike other campaigns this one is different.We are opening our doors and allowing people with a access or influence to be able to journey with us...to be a part of our journey, and to share their impact and time in helping us share our jackets and message to the world.
More and exciting details will be provide in our frequent updates. Stay posted and follow us for any and all updates. 


1. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word.
2. Can you share our crowdfunding social media posts with your friends and please tag them. 
3. Please be sure to follow us on Instagram @traveleroriginals and like the crowdfunding posts.
4. Also please invite your friends to Trāv-Elēr Originals and let them know we are working on customizing a jacket made specially for them!
5. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign with your community.Thank you for your time, your read, and your interest in this amazing brand that must be shared with the world.The world is waiting.Trāv-Elēr Originals

story:
In memory of the end of World War in 1945, introducing the GP1945 PRO Bolt Action Pen. AN NON-VIOLENT NON-SILENT PEN. Patent Pending.   

GIZMODO / YANKO DESIGN / TRENDHUNTER / BLESS THIS STUFF /  EVERY DAY CARRY /
 HI CONSUMPTION /THAT'S DOPE / GEARMOOSE / SOLIDSMACK / GLOBOSURFER /​​
 EDC ZONE  / ​

Refining the bolt action mechanism, we prototyped rounds and rounds to integrate the right amount of force, smooth turn-around corners to secure the tip in the pen instead of ink all over your pockets. Center bolt placement is addictive and fun to fidget in 2 different holding positions.

 

A traditional whistle produces a monotone high pitched sound to grab attention from the rescuer. However, a monotone sound can easily get lost in the wind. The GP1945 pen is integrated with a loud, up to 100 dB PRO whistle which is uniquely designed to produce a variety of tones to attract.

  

Adjust the vibration of the air by sliding your fingers along the pen clip air tunnel while blowing the whistle. It is also a simple musical instrument, a bird attractor to bring you extra fun when it is not serving as your rescuer.

Finger rest area is precisely-machined with diamond knurling texture (AL). It is dimensioned thoughtfully for a comfortable and sturdy grip while providing a quick reference to measurements of the commonly used 1 inch” and 10 millimeters.

 

Made of tungsten steel, the super compact glass breaker is on top of the GP1945 Pen. Different than the regular window breaker pen that has a narrow front.

The GP 1945 has a sharp but safer and wider push away tip. When the tempered glass is breaking, the wider tip will push the fragments away from your hand in an emergency.

​

Additional $10 for a MG-CORE Fire Starter, make GP1945 your most compact survival EDC.

The MG-CORE is always protected inside the GP1945 body, take it out only if you need the fire to warm you up in an emergency.

The MG-Core can work with any hard edges or surfaces, including the steel tip on the top. *you don't have to scratch the pen body even on the Aluminum version.

The GP-Grip PRO Special Edition is for Jeep Wrangler owners. Cast aluminum grab handle has 2 openings on the outer pouch to store your GP1945. 

And it is the only foldable handle that gives you a full window view, integrated with a secret inner pocket to store your cards and emergency money.

Having passed a 4500 lbs Jeep Wrangler road test, the GP 1945 Bolt Action Aluminum Pen is tough built for lifetime use. The Titanium version is extraordinarily tough, stronger than gold. On top of that, the TC4 Titanium we hand-picked has much higher strength than the commonly used TA1 Titanium.

 

Never lost your pen with our tight-fit pen clip. 

There are details we put into the GP1945 pen clip: 1. DYNAMIC to complement the overall GP1945 pen. 2. LOW profile, more integrated. 3. SMOOTH leading tip with a nice ramp. 4. More CONTACT surface notch to your pocket or notebook. 5. Two different heights to catch different thickness edges TIGHTLY. 6. Thickness INCREASED.

The black ink refill size is compatible with LAMY M22, GPCA.us will continue to supply refills for online purchase worldwide.

As your EDC champion, regardless you are a hard worker, nature explorer, outdoor adventurist, photographer, the CNC'ed Titanium or Aluminum GP 1945 will be your daily essential for many years to come. 

READ MORE ABOUT THE GP1945 Bolt Action Pen on 

GIZMODO / YANKO DESIGN / TRENDHUNTER / BLESS THIS STUFF /
 HI CONSUMPTION /THAT'S DOPE / GEARMOOSE / SOLIDSMACK /
 EVERY DAY CARRY / EDC ZONE / GLOBOSURFER /

story:
Introducing ToolBox.

ToolBox started as a simple idea. Why should you have to purchase high priced tools to only use one time?  Join us in creating our first Toolbox!

Yes, there are places that you can rent tool's, but usually they are not very affordable, not easily accessible and make you pay high deposits. 

ToolBox offers a simple and affordable alternative.

  • Figure out what tool you need for that #DIY project.
  • Go online either from your smartphone or any device. 
  • Reserve the tool you need with a few simple clicks from our awesome website. NO DEPOSITS!
  • Go Pickup your reserved tool at the nearest ToolBox location. OR
  • Complete Step 1. Travel too nearest ToolBox location and using our simple checkout system, rent the tool you need in a few clicks> 
  • Easy, Accessible and Affordable. 

We are also working within our community to help programs in our area by offering a monthly membership subscription so that community programs can have unlimited access to our inventory of tools to help aid in building of houses and many other community outreach projects. 

Community Program Memberships

  • Low Cost Monthly Pricing
  • Unlimited Rentals per month, no late fees, no upfront cost. 
  • We want to help build our communities, to change our environment. 
  • #DIY Community projects are all over. We want to help communities in Michigan (our flagship state) feel pride in they're surroundings.


Timeline

- July 23 Crowdfunding begins. We will be handing out some pre-launch swag at the St.Clair Riverfest on July 24th. Stop by and talk with us. Community Involvement is very important to us. 
-August 23 Crowdfunding ends. 
-August 24. Purchase Shipping container to retrofit into our 
First "ToolBox" location. (Idea)

Under Construction.. 

 We have already begun planning and project development. Your funds will assist  us with some #startup costs. We have a plan to allocate funds to each of these parts of our project.

  1. Development of our first "Toolbox" location. 
  2. More Tools!
  3. Marketing, Community Involvement Programs

Other ways you can be part of something great.

If you can't donate today, that isn't the only way we need help. Sharing our project with your friends and family is a powerful donation. PLEASE Share, Share, Share!


FAQ:

What differentiates "ToolBox" from a tool rental/equipment rental company that already exists? 

Here at Toolbox we are not renting out large items such as trenchers, bulldozers and other large commercial equipment. We are going for items that we think most people know how to operate as well as items that fit into a 40ft shipping container. 

We also are shooting for low prices and no deposits!!

Once you are have multiple locations in MI, where to next?

Well, we will begin operations in many other areas such as Chicago, Columbus, Toledo, Milwaukee, Nashville and continue to expand!

What is the average cost of a one day tool rental?

Well pricing isn't completely set in stone yet, but most items will be under $30 dollars a day.

story:
What is Keepbo?

The combination of ‘Keep’ and ‘Robot’, Keepbo is a robotic device that serves to keep your loved ones and precious items safe and secure.

This high quality, effective device will keep track, locate and notify users the exact time and location information of the lost item or child in real time, using the Crowd GPS feature. With such a device with preventative measures included, users can feel rest assured when it comes to the safety of their valuables.

Furthermore, Keepbo can act as a universal remote control to activate various functions like using the camera, listening to music, as well as launching using the navigation app system by connecting to the user’s smartphone. This convenient feature gives users fast and easy access to various functions with just one click of a button.


Anti-Lost

By attaching Keepbo to the subject (ie. a child, a pet, a bag, keys) users want to protect, users can check the distance and location of the subject using their smartphone.

Unlike other ordinary anti-lost trackers, when there is no signal for a certain period of time predefined according to your life-style, Keepbo automatically recognizes the situation and sends a notification to its host device. Fast and effective in the event of a lost item or child.

Keepbo automatically keeps track of the distance and location of the item and sends you alerts when you leave your item behind or in an emergency situation.

When the subject with Keepbo attached and the user’s smartphone are detected to be in separation beyond the preset distance, an alert notification message will be sent out to the user’s smartphone, allowing for preventative measures to be taken in advance. If, for any reason, the alerts went unnoticed, the exact time and location of the latest signal will allow for fast tracking and retrieval.


Crowd GPS

Connected to ALL Keepbo enabled smartphones, the Crowd GPS feature allows users to locate their Keepbo in real time.

Step 1: If the connection between the user’s Keepbo and their smartphone disconnects, it will automatically switch to Beacon mode.
Step 2: Once in Beacon Mode, ALL the Keepbo enabled smartphones connected to the Crowd GPS network will turn active and locate the missing subject.
Step 3: Once located, an alert message with time and location of the subject will be sent through the network.

More specifically, the Crowd GPS network works by reaching out to ALL Keepbo enabled smartphones nearby that are connected to the network, to help search for the missing subject. At the same time, the Keepbo device itself automatically recognizes it is lost and also reaches out back to the system. If any of the other Keepbo enabled smartphone comes in close proximity to the lost subject, the time and location information of the lost subject will be tracked and sent to the user.

Therefore, with Keepbo’s Crowd GPS feature, this system is truly effective in providing the necessary preventative measures and high quality tracking capability to keep what the user value most, safe and secure.


Wireless Button

Keepbo has one physical button, which can operate three different actions depending on how users press it. There are three options: Click, Double Click, Hold. Each type of press automatically activates a different function such as using the camera, listening to music, launching the navigation app, and using the SOS feature.

The SOS feature instantly calls or messages the phone number, which has been preset, for help during emergencies. All with just a single click of a button!


Fun and Cute Accessory with Switchable Face

With its creative and trendy design, Keepbo can also be a fun and fashionable accessory. Its ability to switch faces allows for you to customize it according to your needs and style. They come in various designs and ways to carry it, including as a necklace, a clip, or even a key chain.

With Keepbo on hand, you can feel assured and stylish, wherever you go!


Where & Why We Need Your Help

We’ve completed the working sample stage. In order to move forward with production, there are still lots of stages we have to go through. Tooling, Testing, Certification, Manufacturing, Packaging and Shipping etc. As a small company we need your help to fulfill our goal.

We want to give you as many faces as possible for more fun. We will give you more fun faces as we exceed the goal.


Perk List


Schedule

Dec. 2014 - Prototype
Jan. 2015 - First Keepbo Working Sample
Feb. 2015 - Indiegogo Campaign Launch
Feb. 2015 - Keepbo Design Tooling and Engineering Sample
Mar. 2015 - Pre-Production Sample
Apr. 2015 - Mass Production Begins
Apr. 2015 - Shipping


Technical Specification

Bluetooth Low Energy (4.1, Smart Ready, BLE)
Supported Profiles: GATT, Proximity, Battery, HID
Battery Life: more than 1 year (replaceable)
Compatible with both Android and iPhone (Android 4.3+ or later, iPhone 5 or later)
Size: 38.7 mm x 32.2 mm x 12.6 mm (includes clip)
Weight: less than 30g (includes battery)


Advertising message format

Keepbo can distinguish between normal disconnected state and emergent disconnected state. Keepbo sends out a different advertising message per each state. The below figures show each format. Keepbo sends out a normal BLE advertising message in a typical case. In an emergency, it sends out a beacon message which is compatible with iBeacon and has a specific UUID value.

<Normal mode>


<Emergency mode>


FAQ

Where can I ask questions or make suggestions?

Please email your questions or suggestions to info@gandst.com.

Which colors will be available?

Initially, only black Keepbo will be out in the market. White color will be added after the product launch.

What about international shipping?

Do not worry about the shipping fee. The shipping is free for everyone in the world. We want as many people as possible feel and enjoy our fun Keepbo.

When will I get my cute Keepbo?

We are going to ship Keepbo around end of April. The shipping will take about 2 ~ 3 weeks. If you want to have it sooner, please add EMS special delivery option. It will shorten the delivery time to 2 ~ 3 days.

Can I replace the battery of Keepbo?

Yes, you can easily replace coin cell battery. The battery type is CR2032.

When can I use KeepBo with iPhone?

We are working very hard on iOS version of the app. It will be available in 2Q 2015.

story:
Join the #buffbiketribe. Be inspired. Help us build Colorado's first bicycle resort...

The Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort Transformation Project is the beginning of something big! We are transforming this historic motor court motel into a resort for cyclists and adventurers while also inspiring people to follow their dreams, get outside, ride a bike, and live life's grand adventure. Join the movement of the #buffbiketribe by backing our project today!

Phase 1 of the Transformation includes: new paint in the rooms, linens, carpet/flooring and cycling- and adventurer-specific amenities in all rooms. Transforming the Buffalo Lodge into Colorado's first Bicycle Resort includes placing a bike rack in every rooms, bicycle-themed artwork and decor, adding comfy new pillows and finishes and unique amenities to cater to cyclists and adventurers. The vision for the bicycle lodge is to truly create "your basecamp for adventure in the Pikes Peak Region." This is only the beginning...

A local news station helps tell the story: http://fox21news.com/2016/06/17/hotel-for-cyclists-becoming-a-reality/

Each of our 46 rooms and suites is unique, and with each we are creating a distinct look. We are looking for sponsors to help us design, build out and customize each room. We are transforming the outdated rooms to serve the comforts of our guests - world travelers, weekenders, cyclists, and life adventurers of all kinds.

The basic refresh of the rooms and the first phase of transformation to a Bicycle Resort is based on a $1,500 budget for each of our standard rooms and $3,000 for each of our suites. We already have the support of one of our best friends and designers, Valarie Day, who has agreed to refresh all the rooms with help of our volunteer work force and our current team. The current fundraising goal ($105,745) is based on refreshing 34 standard rooms and 12 suites and the cost for the fulfillment of jerseys, VIP reception, stickers and Indiegogo costs. The budget for each room, though small, is well-crafted and accounts for a margin of error and even loss of business days, construction costs, and materials.  

Essential maintenance issues will be tackled during the refresh to bring this historical hotel back to life. We've already been working hard to landscape, clean up the rooms and fix any latent maintenance, and we have hired a brilliant staff to give our guests the best experience from hello to farewell.

More...the BIGGER Vision 

The long-term vision for the Bicycle Resort at Buffalo Lodge includes so much more than just new paint and decor. First, a patio and taproom off the southside of the lodge will provide a place for the community and guests to soak in the views of Pikes Peak and listen to our creek whispering close by. What a way to relax after a long ride or a great adventure! For your convenience, there'll be a bike washing and repair station and a rental fleet of fat bikes (we're working with our neighbors at Borealis - https://www.fatbike.com/ - on this!). On the north end of our property there's a recreation area where several small fire pits, picnic tables and an amphitheater and stage will allow us, upon build-out, to host local and regional bands and festivals. A full fitness center that will allow us to host cycling-specific clinics and workouts is also planned for the property, and there'll be a conference center and boardroom to host your business meetings.

We encourage the IndieGoGo community to reach out, give us feedback, ask questions or stop by for a tour! Send us an email: bicycleresort@gmail.com with the title Bicycle Resort Tour.

We have a unique story (see below) and a passion not only for cycling, but people and our community. We are ambassadors for cycling, the Pikes Peak region, and most of all the belief we all can achieve our dreams if we are willing to chase them. Find out more about us on our Facebook page and join us in our journey: https://www.facebook.com/BuffaloLodgeBicycleResort.

Details of our project, the team, the resort's current condition, and plans for the refresh can be found below in the Rewards section.

Visit our Pinterest board of inspiration for ideas of what we've been dreaming up for the resort's decor and design: https://www.pinterest.com/toriegiffin/bike-inn-ideas/

Also, see the media coverage section below for more information on the project.

Taproom and Patio-Stretch Goal #1-Phase 2

$190,795: Complete build-out of outdoor patio and bar and refresh of all rooms

What better way to cap a long day of riding incredible trails with breathtaking views than with a Colorado brew and a relaxing place to soak in the vibes? Our taproom and patio will feature a stellar view of Pikes Peak, known as America's Mountain, a front-row seat to cyclists passing by on the Cycling Highway to Pikes Peak, cycling-themed decor and a feature fireplace you'll never want to leave. It will be featured prominently right off the lodge and be a gathering place for both hotel guests and our local community.  

We will serve Colorado brews and spirits. Did you know that Colorado Springs has more craft breweries than any other city in Colorado? We plan to feature as many local brews as possible, and we're working to engage local food trucks for tapas and other bites. 

Rewards

Join the #buffbiketribe stickers - $12 pledge

Join the #buffbacktribe and share your passion with a unique, cut-out sticker. Stick it on your car window, your bike, your favorite water bottle, just about anything. Let people know you are part of the tribe! 

Come "Roll" with us at the Roll Art Bike Festival August 12, 2016, at the Buffalo Lodge. Share a few drinks with us, and enjoy the food and camaraderie in the midst of visually tantalizing art and the beautiful Colorado scenery. 

Limited Edition #buffbiketribe cycling jersey - $150

A custom, limited-edition Buffalo Lodge #buffbiketribe cycling jersey, available only to our early supporters.

Join the #buffbiketribe around the world and share your love of cycling and chasing your dreams. Ride with us every day in this beautifully designed jersey. Inspire your own dreams.

Send us your photo in your #buffbiketribe jersey to be added to our #buffbiketribe wall at the resort and to our Facebook page. There may be a few surprises in store for the best submission!

Also, you'll receive a #buffbiketribe sticker to show your support.

We'll send an email to you to determine the size of your jersey and collect address and shipping information.

Let's Roll Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort T-shirt - $25

Our "Let's Roll" T-shirt is a soft, comfortable tri-blend in both men's and women's cuts (women's cut shown). Show your support for the vision of the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort and join the movement. Right now only the steel blue shown is available, but other colors and other designs will be available.

An email will be sent to you for sizes in men's or women's styles at end of the campaign.

Roll Art Bike Festival VIP ticket - $55

Roll with us August 12, 2016 from 5 to 9 p.m., when the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort hosts the Roll Bike Art Festival Reception. There'll be a special VIP celebration for IndieGoGo backers.

VIP Guests will have access to the VIP Reception within the celebration at the Buffalo Lodge. Join in the Live Stream, make some art and/or join the Bicycle Parade.

Digital Guests will be able to attend via a livestream feed and will be added to the names of supporters on our Facebook page.

Send us your favorite photo of you and your favorite piece of bike art or just you and your ride (bike). Submit via Facebook! There will be a reward for best submission. You'll also be featured on our Facebook cover photo.

Receive one free ride on the Levitator Lounge at the Roll Art Bike Festival. Levitator Lounge is a multi-person bicycle bar. Take a spin with us and create your own inspiration on wheels.

Each VIP Guest will also receive their choice of vinyl sticker to show they are part of the #buffbiketribe movement.

Jersey and 1 night stay at the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort -$275

What better way to find out what it's all about and really embrace what it truly means to be part of the #buffbiketribe! Meet our owner, Torie Giffin, the woman with all the vision and grit to make this dream a reality. Stay with us in a freshly renovated room ($159 value) and ride the awesome trails in Colorado's best cycling community while wearing your limited-edition jersey.

*Based on availability and limited to standard room ($159 value). No cash value.

Join the #buffbiketribe around the world and share your love of cycling and chasing dreams. Ride with us every day in this beautifully designed jersey. Inspire your own dreams.

Send us a photo of you wearing your #buffbiketribe jersey to be added to our #buffbiketribe wall at the resort and our Facebook page.

Also, receive a #buffbiketribe sticker to put on your car, favorite water bottle, laptop, bike or favorite place.

1st Bicycle Wedding at Buffalo Lodge - $12,500 (only 1 avail)

Be the first to celebrate your bicycle lifestyle and wedded bliss at the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort. Leave all the details to us to make your wedding day magical!

Your wedding day will be spectacular, with views of Pikes Peak, special cycling events and guided tour, and outdoors- and cycling-themed decor as your loved ones surround you.

This package includes 10 rooms for guests (2-night stay) and the bride and groom, including a VIP suite for the bride and groom the night of your nuptials. You'll also enjoy a hosted VIP reception (details apply) for up to 50 guests the night before your big day, wedding venue, tables and chairs, and rental of bikes for your wedding day or the day before. Also included is a special bicycle tour for the bride and groom. Each of the 10 guest rooms will be stocked with a complementary Colorado Welcome Basket upon arrival. Photography package (value of $3,000) will be provided for a full day of wedding photography from Holveck Designs Photography.

Special discounts on food and beverage will be applied from our preferred partners.

Your wedding will also be featured at the resort in a photo frame as the first bicycle wedding at the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort.

Your wedding day is sure to be a moment in history and one you shall never forget!

We are working on partnerships with bridal and outdoor magazines, retailers and websites for other rewards. Details to come!

*Discounts are at discretion of Buffalo Lodge and partners. Rooms and venue are based upon availabilty and are exclusive of taxes and fees. No cash value. 

Brick Workout with Ironman and USA Cycling-certified Coach Nic Ponsor - $425 (only 2 avail)

Get a 3- to 4-hour BRICK workout with Ironman and certified USA Cycling Coach Nic Ponsor, owner of Criterium Bicycles in Colorado Springs, and a 1-night stay in a standard room at the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort.

Included is your choice of #buffbiketribe sticker and a "Let's Roll" T-shirt.

What's a Brick workout you ask? Check this out: http://breakingmuscle.com/endurance-sports/what-is-a-brick-workout-and-why-do-triathletes-do-them

Take the time to visit Colorado Springs' miles of trails and roads where Olympians train, and test your mettle with Nic Ponsor.

This includes a 1-night stay at the Buffalo Lodge in a refreshed standard room (*based on availability).

Tribe pack (#buffbiketribe jerseys and VIP bike tour and 2-night stay) - $1,500

Outfit your tribe! Bring the family or a group of friends for a VIP #buffbiketribe tour of Garden of the Gods with our inspirational owner, Torie Giffin. Bring your own bikes or borrow some from our rental fleet (up to 4 bikes included, $140 value).

Don your brand new #buffbiketribe jerseys (4 included).

Enjoy a 2-night stay in our VIP suite with a hosted VIP reception with local Colorado products welcome package.

Also get your very own #buffbiketribe photo just like the one above from Holveck Designs Photography. We'll feature you on our Facebook wall of fame.  

*based on availability, exclusive of taxes and other applicable fees.

Sponsor a Sharrow (with 6 nights at Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort) - $2500 (only 6 avail) 

Be part of the pathway to a better biking community, and go down in history as a supporter of the sustainable lifestyle the #buffbiketribe represents.

The main driveway through the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort will be resurfaced and striped like a bike lane -- customized with your name or company logo. Go down in cycling history!

You'll be listed as a partner on our website and featured in photos used for media articles in any feature profiles for the next three years.

Included is a 2-night stay each year of your sponsorship (total of 6 nights). *based on availability, exclusive of taxes and other applicable fees.

Repair and Bike Washing Station Sponsorship (with 9 nights at Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort) - $8,500

A World-Class Bike Washing and Repair Station will be dedicated with your name or your company's name. Become an icon in the cycling world and dedicate your mark to the thousands of adventurers who stay at the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort each year.

You can help design and incorporate your name or your company's name, logo or design elements in the essential design of the bike station. Your company's name will be listed on our website and featured in media articles published about Colorado's first bicycle resort.

Receive a 3-night stay in a standard King or Double Queen room each year of your sponsorship (9 total nights over 3 years). *based on availability, exclusive of taxes and other applicable fees.

Room Sponsorship (3 years) -$12,500

Be a part of history! Design your own room, have a dedicated suite or room for your business, be a part of the media sensation that is the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort, and enjoy 10 nights each year at the Buff! (This sponsorship is available only to IndieGoGo supporters.)

Each room at the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort is unique and can be customized with your design and company's design elements. Each room features a plate above the door where your company or personal dedication will be featured. (Think: The "_________" room.) This is a more extensive renovation than just paint and decor (budget for each room is currently $1,500; this a $9,500 budget renovation). Help us choose paint, decor, bicycle accessories, furnishings, flat screen TV, and other cycling/adventure amenities. Design the room to your specification.

Receive 10 nights in a VIP suite or your designed room each year to host a company gathering, arrange for clients to stay at the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort, or a vacation for you or anyone you choose (10 nights each year for a total of 30 nights). *based on availability, exclusive of taxes and other applicable fees.

Your company will be featured in any related media articles featuring the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort and on our website as a partner for the next three years. Social media mentions on our pages and tags (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and our website). Your company's informational materials will be available in our lodge and featured in your themed room with approval from our design team.

(All design elements will be approved by our design team and construction costs are covered within the budget for each room. Any additional work outside of budgeted costs will not be covered by the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort.)

After 3 years, a sponsor renewal rate will offered for the first right of refusal.

This is an exclusive sponsorship opportuntiy for IndieGoGo backers only. Sponsorships outside this campaign will cost $15,000 while sponsorship of our VIP Suites will cost $22,500.

Contact bicycleresort@gmail.com to schedule a consult and tour to choose your room, work with our design team, and start making history.

About the Buffalo Lodge

Neighboring Garden of the Gods (literally, the property backs up to the park), the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort sports incredible views of Pikes Peak and is a quick ride from both downtown Manitou Springs and downtown Colorado Springs (try the safe and smooth Midland Trail!). We're adjacent to Colorado Avenue, a main street with boutique shopping and restaurants where historical Victorian-style homes line the streets. 

The Pikes Peak region is a mecca for mountain biking, with some of the best single track in Colorado, and the area sports hundreds of miles of road for the more asphalt-driven riders. (Other resources than links above: singletracks.com and COS Visitors Bureau or Trails.com.)

Location: 2 El Paso Blvd, Colorado Springs, CO 80904

This 4-acre motor court motel was built in the 1930s and is famed to have hosted many of our country's famous figures including President Teddy Roosevelt. It has always been a haven for those seeking adventure and exploring the wonders of the Pikes Peak region - Garden of the Gods, Cave of the Winds, Pikes Peak, The North Pole, Cheyenne Canyon, hundreds of miles of world-class mountain biking and road trails, historic Rock Ledge Ranch, United States Olympic Committee and high-altitude Olympic Training Center, the U.S. Air Force Academy, unique museums (pioneer Colorado, Western mining, money, insects and more), art galleries, many incredible breweries and distilleries, and more. Soon, you can tour the official U.S. Olympic Museum and relive stunning moments in athletic history and achievement.

Since we took ownership of the Buffalo Lodge less than a month ago, we have already hosted families from around the world and played host to a multitude of community events including a rest station on the annual Starlight Spectacular bike ride. http://www.trailsandopenspaces.org/newsevents/starlight-spectacular/

We are a community gathering spot, a space to grow the local and international cycling community, and a place to share the passion we have for life, the outdoors, and people. "Roll with us" into the future for the next phase of the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort! Please back our vision. 

Here's just a few photos of the resort:

There is so much to come as we make the Bicycle Resort a haven for adventurers of all kinds: gathering spots inside and out; suites with yards for yoga, exercising, enjoying nature; multiple small fire pits in our community recreation area and on our patio; and a new amphitheatre and stage. We are truly here to help transform this community!

Join the #buffbiketribe today!

Media Coverage

Fox 21 News-First Bicycle Resort in Colorado Springs-http://fox21news.com/2016/06/17/hotel-for-cyclists-becoming-a-reality/

Colorado Springs Independent-http://www.csindy.com/coloradosprings/buffalo-lodge-is-home-to-local-cyclings-latest-phenomenon/Content?oid=3801285

Joycyclingchicks-https://joycyclingchick.com/2016/06/26/buffalo-lodge-bicycle-resort/

 Our Story

Torie Giffin, the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort's visionary and intrepid leader, has always led with her heart and passion for others. Hospitality is at her core. So, when she decided to create a resort for cyclists there was no question she was going to make it great. Now, the real work has started and we need your help! Come visit, meet the team and back the vision of the Bicycle Resort.

The vision started a little over a year ago. There have been hundreds of conversations with friends and community and cycling advocates over more than a few cups of coffee and Colorado's famous brews. There are some wonderful hotels in Colorado Springs but none that caters specifically to the outdoor adventurer and especially the bicyclist. Our dreams, paired with a statewide bicycling campaign, Gov. John Hickenlooper's declarationthat Colorado will become the best state in the U.S.A. for cycling, and a realization of Outdoor Recreation as an economic driver, seemed the perfect storm and an inspiration to be a part of the transformation. 

After scouring many inviting locales, developed or not, Torie learned the historic Buffalo Lodge was for sale and it seemed to perfectly fit her vision because of location, price, history and so much more. It was love at first sight. Although there were quite a few issues to secure the property and a few setbacks, Torie and her family (husband Nathan, daughter Delanie, and sons Levi and Daniel) closed June 17, 2016 with the plans for refreshing and transforming the Buffalo Lodge into a haven for cyclists and adventurers, and got straight to work!

Most recently, Torie was the Community Relations Director for a local Chick-Fil-A and the Founder of the Patriots Festival Walk Run and Ride (http://patriotsfestival.com/). She is an avid cyclist, a community advocate appointed by Colorado's own "Bike Czar", and has the support of the local and statewide outdoors community to build her vision, including Luis Benitez, Colorado's newly appointed Director of Outdoor Recreation. 

Her passion is infectious and she has the entire community excited about the vision for the Bicycle Resort. Leaders in the community like Carrie Simison, publisher of the Colorado Springs Independent, Jennifer Furda of the Colorado Springs Business Journal, Dylan Scott of Colorado Mountain Bike Tours, and Robin Roberts, President of Pikes Peak National Bank, and all of the owners of cycling and outdoors shops in town are ready to support her. 

Support the vision of the Bicycle Resort at Buffalo Lodge. Pledge today and become part of the #buffbiketribe movement! "Roll on" and follow your dreams, inspire others to stay dedicated!


Your Impact 

This isn't just about a hotel and a haven for cyclists and adventurers. Your pledge will help to solidify the actions of believing in yourself, self-determination, following your dreams and inspiring others. 


What happens if we don't reach our goal?

We are in the process of refreshing every room and we're dedicating as much funding as possible to the endeavor. If we don't reach our goal the money raised still will go to further our renovations. All of the Rewards will be fulfilled for pledges and backers even if our goal is not reached.


Risks & Challenges

Challenges are something we faced at every step of the way to purchase the hotel. We are used to tackling them head on. Each and every obstacle, from investors to inspections, SBA loans and more, we've handled with a smile and community supporters working to make it happen. Problem solving and making things happen is second nature to us. 

With a large-scale project such as this one we understand there will always problems - in construction, especially in an older building, as well as the normal risks when hiring contractors or depending on volunteer labor. Our project budget is the bare minimum to refresh the rooms, but a margin is built in to ensure success. We have already engaged and gone through the bidding process for all of the projects, which is how we determined our budget.


Other Ways You Can Help

First, thank you so much to those who have helped already. There isn't enough space here to name you all. And thank you if you are considering pledging your support and backing the Bicycle Resort at Buffalo Lodge and the #buffbiketribe.

But you can help us even if you don't spend a time. How? Share this with your friends via Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, email or in person and ask people to back our efforts and to be inspired by the movement of the #buffbiketribe.

If you would like to help beyond backing us on IndieGoGo, you can always come and join our volunteer work days to clean up the hotel, paint, landscape, and tackle a myriad of other tasks. If you want to get involved, send us an email at bicycleresort@gmail.com

Thank you all! 

"Two wheels to the wind"

#buffbiketribe
story_txt:
Join the #buffbiketribe. Be inspired. Help us build Colorado's first bicycle resort...

Room Inspiration (what we want to see)


The Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort Transformation Project is the beginning of something big! We are transforming this historic motor court motel into a resort for cyclists and adventurers while also inspiring people to follow their dreams, get outside, ride a bike, and live life's grand adventure. Join the movement of the #buffbiketribe by backing our project today!
Phase 1 of the Transformation includes: new paint in the rooms, linens, carpet/flooring and cycling- and adventurer-specific amenities in all rooms. Transforming the Buffalo Lodge into Colorado's first Bicycle Resort includes placing a bike rack in every rooms, bicycle-themed artwork and decor, adding comfy new pillows and finishes and unique amenities to cater to cyclists and adventurers. The vision for the bicycle lodge is to truly create "your basecamp for adventure in the Pikes Peak Region." This is only the beginning...
A local news station helps tell the story: http://fox21news.com/2016/06/17/hotel-for-cyclists-becoming-a-reality/
Each of our 46 rooms and suites is unique, and with each we are creating a distinct look. We are looking for sponsors to help us design, build out and customize each room. We are transforming the outdated rooms to serve the comforts of our guests - world travelers, weekenders, cyclists, and life adventurers of all kinds.
The basic refresh of the rooms and the first phase of transformation to a Bicycle Resort is based on a $1,500 budget for each of our standard rooms and $3,000 for each of our suites. We already have the support of one of our best friends and designers, Valarie Day, who has agreed to refresh all the rooms with help of our volunteer work force and our current team. The current fundraising goal ($105,745) is based on refreshing 34 standard rooms and 12 suites and the cost for the fulfillment of jerseys, VIP reception, stickers and Indiegogo costs. The budget for each room, though small, is well-crafted and accounts for a margin of error and even loss of business days, construction costs, and materials.  
Essential maintenance issues will be tackled during the refresh to bring this historical hotel back to life. We've already been working hard to landscape, clean up the rooms and fix any latent maintenance, and we have hired a brilliant staff to give our guests the best experience from hello to farewell.
More...the BIGGER Vision 
The long-term vision for the Bicycle Resort at Buffalo Lodge includes so much more than just new paint and decor. First, a patio and taproom off the southside of the lodge will provide a place for the community and guests to soak in the views of Pikes Peak and listen to our creek whispering close by. What a way to relax after a long ride or a great adventure! For your convenience, there'll be a bike washing and repair station and a rental fleet of fat bikes (we're working with our neighbors at Borealis - https://www.fatbike.com/ - on this!). On the north end of our property there's a recreation area where several small fire pits, picnic tables and an amphitheater and stage will allow us, upon build-out, to host local and regional bands and festivals. A full fitness center that will allow us to host cycling-specific clinics and workouts is also planned for the property, and there'll be a conference center and boardroom to host your business meetings.
We encourage the IndieGoGo community to reach out, give us feedback, ask questions or stop by for a tour! Send us an email: bicycleresort@gmail.com with the title Bicycle Resort Tour.
We have a unique story (see below) and a passion not only for cycling, but people and our community. We are ambassadors for cycling, the Pikes Peak region, and most of all the belief we all can achieve our dreams if we are willing to chase them. Find out more about us on our Facebook page and join us in our journey: https://www.facebook.com/BuffaloLodgeBicycleResort.
Details of our project, the team, the resort's current condition, and plans for the refresh can be found below in the Rewards section.
Visit our Pinterest board of inspiration for ideas of what we've been dreaming up for the resort's decor and design: https://www.pinterest.com/toriegiffin/bike-inn-ideas/
Also, see the media coverage section below for more information on the project.

Bike Washing Station
A World-Class Bike Washing and Repair Station will be dedicated with your name or your company's name. Become an icon in the cycling world and dedicate your mark to the thousands of adventurers who stay at the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort each year.
You can help design and incorporate your name or your company's name, logo or design elements in the essential design of the bike station. Your company's name will be listed on our website and featured in media articles published about Colorado's first bicycle resort.
Receive a 3-night stay in a standard King or Double Queen room each year of your sponsorship (9 total nights over 3 years). *based on availability, exclusive of taxes and other applicable fees.
Room Sponsorship (3 years) -$12,500
Be a part of history! Design your own room, have a dedicated suite or room for your business, be a part of the media sensation that is the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort, and enjoy 10 nights each year at the Buff! (This sponsorship is available only to IndieGoGo supporters.)
Each room at the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort is unique and can be customized with your design and company's design elements. Each room features a plate above the door where your company or personal dedication will be featured. (Think: The "_________" room.) This is a more extensive renovation than just paint and decor (budget for each room is currently $1,500; this a $9,500 budget renovation). Help us choose paint, decor, bicycle accessories, furnishings, flat screen TV, and other cycling/adventure amenities. Design the room to your specification.
Receive 10 nights in a VIP suite or your designed room each year to host a company gathering, arrange for clients to stay at the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort, or a vacation for you or anyone you choose (10 nights each year for a total of 30 nights). *based on availability, exclusive of taxes and other applicable fees.
Your company will be featured in any related media articles featuring the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort and on our website as a partner for the next three years. Social media mentions on our pages and tags (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and our website). Your company's informational materials will be available in our lodge and featured in your themed room with approval from our design team.
(All design elements will be approved by our design team and construction costs are covered within the budget for each room. Any additional work outside of budgeted costs will not be covered by the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort.)
After 3 years, a sponsor renewal rate will offered for the first right of refusal.
This is an exclusive sponsorship opportuntiy for IndieGoGo backers only. Sponsorships outside this campaign will cost $15,000 while sponsorship of our VIP Suites will cost $22,500.
Contact bicycleresort@gmail.com to schedule a consult and tour to choose your room, work with our design team, and start making history.
About the Buffalo Lodge
Neighboring Garden of the Gods (literally, the property backs up to the park), the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort sports incredible views of Pikes Peak and is a quick ride from both downtown Manitou Springs and downtown Colorado Springs (try the safe and smooth Midland Trail!). We're adjacent to Colorado Avenue, a main street with boutique shopping and restaurants where historical Victorian-style homes line the streets. 
The Pikes Peak region is a mecca for mountain biking, with some of the best single track in Colorado, and the area sports hundreds of miles of road for the more asphalt-driven riders. (Other resources than links above: singletracks.com and COS Visitors Bureau or Trails.com.)
Location: 2 El Paso Blvd, Colorado Springs, CO 80904

 Google Map of Buffalo Lodge LocationThis 4-acre motor court motel was built in the 1930s and is famed to have hosted many of our country's famous figures including President Teddy Roosevelt. It has always been a haven for those seeking adventure and exploring the wonders of the Pikes Peak region - Garden of the Gods, Cave of the Winds, Pikes Peak, The North Pole, Cheyenne Canyon, hundreds of miles of world-class mountain biking and road trails, historic Rock Ledge Ranch, United States Olympic Committee and high-altitude Olympic Training Center, the U.S. Air Force Academy, unique museums (pioneer Colorado, Western mining, money, insects and more), art galleries, many incredible breweries and distilleries, and more. Soon, you can tour the official U.S. Olympic Museum and relive stunning moments in athletic history and achievement.
Since we took ownership of the Buffalo Lodge less than a month ago, we have already hosted families from around the world and played host to a multitude of community events including a rest station on the annual Starlight Spectacular bike ride. http://www.trailsandopenspaces.org/newsevents/starlight-spectacular/
We are a community gathering spot, a space to grow the local and international cycling community, and a place to share the passion we have for life, the outdoors, and people. "Roll with us" into the future for the next phase of the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort! Please back our vision. 
Here's just a few photos of the resort:

 Main Lodge and home to history

 Neon view of the main lodge

 Main entrance and future spot of our Taproom and Patio (inside fence)

 Buffalo Lodge main drive-will be repaved and striped with bicycle lanes and sharrows Room before Renovation

 Take a refreshing splash in the pool

 Future site of our amphitheater and community gathering and recreation area
There is so much to come as we make the Bicycle Resort a haven for adventurers of all kinds: gathering spots inside and out; suites with yards for yoga, exercising, enjoying nature; multiple small fire pits in our community recreation area and on our patio; and a new amphitheatre and stage. We are truly here to help transform this community!
Join the #buffbiketribe today!
Media Coverage
Fox 21 News-First Bicycle Resort in Colorado Springs-http://fox21news.com/2016/06/17/hotel-for-cyclists-becoming-a-reality/
Colorado Springs Independent-http://www.csindy.com/coloradosprings/buffalo-lodge-is-home-to-local-cyclings-latest-phenomenon/Content?oid=3801285
Joycyclingchicks-https://joycyclingchick.com/2016/06/26/buffalo-lodge-bicycle-resort/
 Our Story


Torie Giffin, the Buffalo Lodge Bicycle Resort's visionary and intrepid leader, has always led with her heart and passion for others. Hospitality is at her core. So, when she decided to create a resort for cyclists there was no question she was going to make it great. Now, the real work has started and we need your help! Come visit, meet the team and back the vision of the Bicycle Resort.
The vision started a little over a year ago. There have been hundreds of conversations with friends and community and cycling advocates over more than a few cups of coffee and Colorado's famous brews. There are some wonderful hotels in Colorado Springs but none that caters specifically to the outdoor adventurer and especially the bicyclist. Our dreams, paired with a statewide bicycling campaign, Gov. John Hickenlooper's declarationthat Colorado will become the best state in the U.S.A. for cycling, and a realization of Outdoor Recreation as an economic driver, seemed the perfect storm and an inspiration to be a part of the transformation. 
After scouring many inviting locales, developed or not, Torie learned the historic Buffalo Lodge was for sale and it seemed to perfectly fit her vision because of location, price, history and so much more. It was love at first sight. Although there were quite a few issues to secure the property and a few setbacks, Torie and her family (husband Nathan, daughter Delanie, and sons Levi and Daniel) closed June 17, 2016 with the plans for refreshing and transforming the Buffalo Lodge into a haven for cyclists and adventurers, and got straight to work!
Most recently, Torie was the Community Relations Director for a local Chick-Fil-A and the Founder of the Patriots Festival Walk Run and Ride (http://patriotsfestival.com/). She is an avid cyclist, a community advocate appointed by Colorado's own "Bike Czar", and has the support of the local and statewide outdoors community to build her vision, including Luis Benitez, Colorado's newly appointed Director of Outdoor Recreation. 
Her passion is infectious and she has the entire community excited about the vision for the Bicycle Resort. Leaders in the community like Carrie Simison, publisher of the Colorado Springs Independent, Jennifer Furda of the Colorado Springs Business Journal, Dylan Scott of Colorado Mountain Bike Tours, and Robin Roberts, President of Pikes Peak National Bank, and all of the owners of cycling and outdoors shops in town are ready to support her. 
Support the vision of the Bicycle Resort at Buffalo Lodge. Pledge today and become part of the #buffbiketribe movement! "Roll on" and follow your dreams, inspire others to stay dedicated!


Your Impact 
This isn't just about a hotel and a haven for cyclists and adventurers. Your pledge will help to solidify the actions of believing in yourself, self-determination, following your dreams and inspiring others. 

What happens if we don't reach our goal?
We are in the process of refreshing every room and we're dedicating as much funding as possible to the endeavor. If we don't reach our goal the money raised still will go to further our renovations. All of the Rewards will be fulfilled for pledges and backers even if our goal is not reached.

Risks & Challenges

Challenges are something we faced at every step of the way to purchase the hotel. We are used to tackling them head on. Each and every obstacle, from investors to inspections, SBA loans and more, we've handled with a smile and community supporters working to make it happen. Problem solving and making things happen is second nature to us. 
With a large-scale project such as this one we understand there will always problems - in construction, especially in an older building, as well as the normal risks when hiring contractors or depending on volunteer labor. Our project budget is the bare minimum to refresh the rooms, but a margin is built in to ensure success. We have already engaged and gone through the bidding process for all of the projects, which is how we determined our budget.


Other Ways You Can Help
First, thank you so much to those who have helped already. There isn't enough space here to name you all. And thank you if you are considering pledging your support and backing the Bicycle Resort at Buffalo Lodge and the #buffbiketribe.
But you can help us even if you don't spend a time. How? Share this with your friends via Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, email or in person and ask people to back our efforts and to be inspired by the movement of the #buffbiketribe.
If you would like to help beyond backing us on IndieGoGo, you can always come and join our volunteer work days to clean up the hotel, paint, landscape, and tackle a myriad of other tasks. If you want to get involved, send us an email at bicycleresort@gmail.com
Thank you all! 
"Two wheels to the wind"
#buffbiketribe

story:
Short Summary

My name is Skyler Farnes and I am the owner of UseePRO. I am a full-time student at Brigham Young University with a mind-set on the entrepreneurial world. I love the outdoors and make sure that with everything that I do that I am trying to give back in some way. I am innovative and always striving to come up with different ideas/products that is going to help change the way people see the world around you.


What We Need & What You Get

Our first product we are launching is our UseePRO 4K and 1080p Full HD Action Cameras. This is just a first of a whole line of products that we are striving to bring to you. From our first product with our action cameras to our future products with watches, ski goggles, sunglasses, lights etc., we are here to change the way you see! Action Cameras are just the beginning; we are an innovative company that will help you see the world differently through a whole line of products! 


The Impact

Capture a Moment and give someone their sight! Sight is part of life. It allows us to experience our amazing world around us. We are making capturing your elevated moments in life more affordable than ever before. All of you supporters will not only help us to achieve the ability to have the capital to create more products but also to help people around the world to see! We have teamed up with 20/20/20, which is an organization that helps blind people around the world see through a quick 15-minute surgery. We recognize that Light is LIFE.

Join the Movement and be apart of something bigger than yourself. Part of your purchase will go directly to changing someone's life by giving them the gift of sight. 


Risks & Challenges 

We want to take the UseePRO Action Camera to as many people as would like it--but going into major retail distribution is expensive. That's why the big brands can do it, but the small brands can't. So, here we are at Indiegogo--where all that goes out the window. We need your support to take the UseePRO Action Camera to markets around the world. We’re skipping the middle man and bringing it to you for way less than retail. With the profits we make from your contribution we will not only be able to achieve that goal with this product, but we will also have the funds needed to create and produce our other products into our line.


Other Ways You Can Help

We know and understand that not everyone can purchase a UseePRO but we still want you to be apart of the team so make sure you tell your friends and share our project with everyone. Also, look out for surveys to get your input!!!

Thanks for Supporting the UseePRO team! Share this link with your friends and spread the word about this amazing deals!!
