story:
About the Project

I'm Antonio Serna and I am the owner of a new business called The Wildlands. I go to school and work full time as a construction worker.

While this may seem boring and just an average lifestyle, I also have a passion for the outdoors and emergency preparedness. I view the outdoors as a fantastic escape from traditional life and urge people to take part in all and any outdoor recreation. However, the outdoors can be a dangerous place, which is why I am also including great emergency preparedness items in my store.

I want to create a website where all adventurers and survivalists can go to find the gear they need and can trust. This store will include items for all of your outdoor adventures, as well as prepping and survival gear. On top of that, customers will be able to rest easy buying from us because I will only sell items that I trust to get the job done.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise about $8,000 to get our store started up and running. This amount will help us cover any fees for starting a new business as well as stocking up a wide variety of inventory to provide for our customers.

In return for your generous contribution, we will give back to you with a Rewards Tier System, This can range anywhere from a 20% coupon to some sweet gear for you to take on your adventures.

The Importance of This Site

As you know, our store will act as a one-stop-shop for all adventurers and survivalists.

Throughout my years of outdoor recreation and prepping, I faced many challenges with finding the right gear with the right quality. I know that many other people out there face these same challenges, and I would like this project to make gear shopping an easier and more enjoyable experience.

With your help, we can ensure that all our customers find the gear they need with the quality they expect. Even more so, with enough support, our team can also provide blogs and personal chats to help adventurers find exactly what they need.

Risks & Challenges

You may be asking yourself, "Why would they need help starting a retail site? People do it all the time". And you're absolutely right. However, between school and a full-time job, I simply can't fund this project alone. Between domain costs, licensing fees, and start-up inventory, a lot of funds will be going into this project.

Nonetheless, I can assure that with your help, my team and I can push through any hurdles to help provide you with the products you need to help you and your friends get out and enjoy life!

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can contribute funds to projects, and we get that!

There are many more ways you can help out:

  • Follow us on Instagram @wildlandssurvival
  • Share this crowdfund using Indiegogo's share tools

story:
This is a 15 day project

 

High-quality materials, professional processing in combination with the manual assembly process ensure that each blade becomes a unique, non-standard knife.

It is light weight, brilliant design. And it costs about the same as a big pizza. An amazing deal with a knife that you will carry for years.

Not only is it extremely convenient to hold and use, it is also a beautiful knife to behold.

We have our own production, quite small at the moment, but our own, which is very important for us. This means that we can implement the most daring solutions and be confident in the quality of each product!

All production is carried out in our premises from A to Z. Everything is made by one master. Everything is tested, verified and sent directly to you.

 

Have you ever been in a situation where you urgently need a knife? Open the parcel, cut something. You, of course, have it. But how good is he? And is it convenient to carry it with you?

After the project with the Comet knife, I received many questions and requests from the backers. Gathering together all the wishes and comments, I thought it over and designed a new knife. You requested Kiridashi. He is in front of you! Meet me!

All you needed was a knife that you would like to carry with you and which could be used in any situation. Something reliable, practical, functional and made from the best materials. A knife that would be ready to work so that you could easily bring and use it both in the field and in the office.

Old Raven. This pocket knife has been carefully designed to be both very discreet and original. I wanted to give it an elegant look with a beautiful, sleek design. It is perfect to wear everywhere, stylish and practical. Thanks to the device on the sheath, it can be easily fixed on the keys, belt, hanged on the neck in the hole on the sheath. Can be put in pockets for everyday use.

On days when you need to keep a knife close at hand, we provided the Old Raven's sheath with a hole for hanging a cord that can be worn around the neck or easily pulled out of a deep pocket.

 1 - Amazing materials.

I don’t want bad steel for the blade. I do not want plastic pens. I want a knife made of great materials that I know will last a long time.

2- Good workmanship.

All knives are made by me personally in my workshop. I completely control the quality of materials and professional processing.

 3 - Have a reasonable price.

The price should correspond to the cost of materials and workmanship, but it must be fair. I believe that it is possible to create long-term quality at an honest price.

Every detail was taken into account: from the steel I choose, the shape of the blade, to the size of the suspension on the sheath.

My goal was to create a high-quality knife that will not bother you. Regardless of whether you decide to wear it on a cord around your neck, in your pocket or with a leather case. He will wear far and good. I believe in this knife, its feature, versatility.

The knife had to be small enough so that it could be worn quietly, but still large enough to be used as a functional knife. It should also be extremely long lasting.

The most useful tool is one that you can always carry with you. Usefulness depends on its weight and size. A large knife will not fit in your pocket. A small knife will not cope with all the tasks assigned to it. I chose the weight and size that you will be comfortable to use every day, without sacrificing performance.

One of the main reasons for the compact size of the knife is that it can be used in most countries (a 2-inch knife is small enough to be legal in almost all countries)

COMPACT SIZE: weighing just 1oz and shorter than many car keys, Kiridashi will feel right at home in your pocket. He will remain almost unnoticed until the task requires it. In addition, the unpretentious size of the fixed blade makes it an excellent choice in some places with a stricter knife law.

D2 is tool steel and has excellent corrosion resistance. This is a very strong steel that has a great balance of edge retention and can be subjected to tough handling. D2 steel allows high hardness (59-60 HRC) without becoming brittle. In order to find the right balance between elasticity and holding of the cutting edge, Kiridashi is subjected to cryogenic processing, which means that our blade can have a very sharp edge and hold for a long time, but it also easily prevents chips.

This steel offers a good balance between strength, hardness and wear resistance. Thus, your knife will not break, will not rust and will hold the blade longer.

In my workshop, I make knives by hand and with great care, one piece at a time. This approach to the process ensures that you get a special knife.

Each knife takes many hours of work, and the end result is a wonderful finished tool that its new owner will always cherish. Knife - Kickstarter exclusive.


Throw it in your pocket or hang it on a belt, and then forget about it. You will remember this when you need it for everyday tasks, this knife withstands daily violence. Do not underestimate the size of this little miracle, it can cut very well regardless of its size, you can add this as part of your EDC.

Risks and challenges

All production is carried out on our premises from A to Z, which allows us to control the timing of production. In any case, we will be transparent about the production process, and messages will be sent to all participants to track the parcels after they are sent. We worked long and hard to make sure that this knife exceeds all expectations, and we cannot wait to get it in your hands. Thanks for helping make this dream come true. We worked hard to ensure that we had the ​first-class production. It is extremely important to make sure that we have reliable production and reliable delivery times.

story:
Dutch version

Elektrisch varen op de Dommel “

Omdat Boxtel een lange geschiedenis heeft, is er veel te beleven en te ontdekken.”

Ir. Ing. Rob A.M. Strik

In samenwerking met: Dhr. A.P.M. Strik (Strik Recreatie)

Inhoudsopgave

1. INTRODUCTIE

2. ELEKTRISCH VAREN IN BOXTEL

2.1 De Dommel door Boxtel

2.2 De exploitatiemogelijkheden 

2.3 De voordelen voor Boxtel

3. ONDERNEMINGSKEUZES, SLOEPEN EN EXPLOITATIE

4. BEGROTING

4.1 ZWS-730 Elektrisch

4.2 E-sloep 650

4.3 E-sloep 550

4.4 Keuzecriteria vaartuig als productiemiddel

4.5 Verdienmodel

5. CONCLUSIES

1. Introductie

Omdat Boxtel een lange geschiedenis heeft, is er in Boxtel veel te beleven en te ontdekken. Inmiddels bestaan er in Boxtel diverse musea en monumenten. Met dit nieuwe plan wordt de verpreiding en vertelling van de boxtelse geschiedenis op een nieuwe manier verwezenlijkt. Kortom, dit plan gaat verder dan alleen elektrisch varen op de Dommel door Boxtel in een fluisterbootje (zie figuur 1). De geschiedenis van Boxtel wordt namelijk in een fluisterbootje ten gehore gebracht aan de deelnemers. Onderzoek op historie, kunst & cultuur, heemkunde en biotopen kan hiervoor tot een goed en mooi verhaal leiden. De vaartocht wordt nog extra versterkt door het verhaal via een koptelefoon of via een spreker te presenteren. Een dergelijke vaartocht kan op verschillende manieren geëxploiteerd worden. Daarvoor bestaat er een exploitatieplan met veel mogelijkheden. Het varen is mogelijk tussen Boxtel en Sint Oedenrode. Het exploitatievraagstuk wordt nog niet geheel opgelost en er bestaan nog vragen omtrent dit idee. Maar in goed overleg kan een realisatieplan gemaakt worden vanuit bestaande Boxtelse kringen. Denk hierbij aan Toeristisch platform Boxtel, Heemkundekring Boxtel, Brabants Landschap, Kunstroute De Rode Draad en Waterschap de Dommel. Inmiddels wordt in 2015 de eerste vaarbewegingen verwacht. Daarbij is de exploitatie en aanschaf van een elektrische sloep het hoofdonderwerp van dit plan.

2. Elektrisch varen in Boxtel

2.1 De Dommel door Boxtel

Het project Dommel door Boxtel van waterschap de Dommel is inmiddels afgerond. Deze rivier ziet er niet alleen prachtig uit, de functionaliteit op recreatie gebied is in sterke mate verbeterd. De rivier is geschikt geworden voor stille fluisterbootjes. Dit betreft dan de relatief “stille” elektrisch aangedreven fluisterbootjes en niet-gemotoriseerde bootjes. Met deze bootjes kan heen en weer gevaren worden tot sint Oedenrode en terug. Maar ook voor cultuurhistorische tochten kan in Boxtel bijvoorbeeld 1,5 uur gevaren worden. Onderweg wordt langs allerlei bezienswaardigheden gevaren. Ondanks dat de rivier geschikt is voor stille fluisterbootjes dient het vaarreglement in acht te worden genomen en met een klein vaarbewijs gevaren te worden.

2.2 De exploitatiemogelijkheden

Momenteel exploiteren diverse ondernemers en verenigingen verhuur van nietgemotoriseerde bootjes. Denk hierbij aan roeiboten, opblaasboten, kano’s en sups. De fluisterbootjes worden als toevoeging op deze Boxtelse activiteiten ingezet voor verhuur inclusief schipper. Daarvoor kan een elektrische platbodem sloep voor maximaal 12 personen uitkomst bieden. De exploitatie kan op verschillende manieren, waarbij de begroting de leidraad is. Op de volgende manieren kan de begroting gerealiseerd worden: · Eigen investeringen · Gemeentelijke ondersteuning · Crowdfunding (Social funding) Bovenstaande mogelijkheden tezamen kunnen leiden tot versterking en een goede startpositie voor dit plan. Dit plan kan voor een fluisterboot gerealiseerd worden. Inzet van vrijwilligers zou een uitweg kunnen bieden voor een sluitende exploitatiebegroting. De begroting omvat: a. Aanschaf elektrische platbodem boot maximaal 12 personen inclusief schipper. b. Uitgewerkt marketingplan voor de lange termijn. c. Onderzoek en realiseren van een begeleide vaartocht.

2.3 De voordelen voor Boxtel

Dit plan zal een aanwinst zijn voor de toeristische en recreatieve sector in Boxtel en het zet Boxtel nog meer op de kaart dan nu al het geval is; Denk hierbij aan versterking van het boxtelse centrum en daarbij het centrummanagement plan te versterken. Denk hierbij aan een verbrede doelgroep voor toerisme en recreëren in Boxtel. Denk hierbij aan de versterking van de “merken” Beleef Boxtel en Het groene woud. Bij crowdfunding wordt dit plan onder de mensen gebracht. Door een vaartocht aan te bieden in ruil voor funding onder een grote groep mensen (Crowd).

3. Ondernemingskeuzes, sloepen en exploitatie

Voor een elektrische sloep kunnen verschillende keuzes gemaakt worden. Het komt erop neer dat de volgende karakteristieken deze keuze bepalen:

· De vaarmogelijkheden op de rivier

o De watereigenschappen van de rivier

o De bodemeigenschappen van de rivier

o De doorgangen en meandering van de rivier

· De functionaliteit van de sloep

o De zitruimte op de sloep

o De wendbaarheid van de sloep

o De doorgang van de sloep

o De diepgang van de sloep

· De faciliteiten bij aanlegplaatsen

o Het opladen van de sloep

o Het wenden van de sloep

o De voorzieningen voor aanleggen

De vergelijking van diverse elektrische sloepen en de daarbij behorende begrotingen, kunnen voor 3 verschillende elektrische sloepen (capaciteit 12 personen) gemaakt worden.

Sloep: Prijs (ex. btw) Maximum motorvermogen:

ZWS-730 Elektrisch € 25.257,- of € 28.383,- ca. 4,0 kW

E-sloep 650 € 32.500,- ca. 7,5 kW

E-sloep 550 € 16.900,- ca. 3,5 kW

Inmiddels zijn bovenstaande sloepen in de praktijk uitgetest in Amsterdam en respectievelijk in Giethoorn. De kooponderhandelingen over de bovenstaande sloepen willen we spoedig starten. De bovenstaande sloepen leveren ongeveer 250,- euro per dag op indien deze verhuurd wordt met vrijwilligers die het roer besturen.

4. Begroting

Op aanvraag.

5. Conclusies

Aan de hand van dit plan kunnen de volgende conclusies worden getrokken: Voor uitrol van dit ondernemingsplan wordt een functionele elektrisch aangedreven sloep ingezet. Deze sloep draagt een mooie uitstraling uit voor exploitatie bij de steiger nabij de Zwaanse brug. Daarbij is het comfort en de sociale functie voor de gasten belangrijk. De begroting is onderhevig aan de volgende mogelijkheden:

· Het elektrisch varen op de Dommel

· Het aantal boten en de markt voor vaartochten op de Dommel

· De startbegroting en planning ervan

Afhankelijk van de kooponderhandelingen kan tot koop van een sloep overgegaan worden. Daarbij is de doorgang en diepgang van de elektrische sloep bepalend voor het varen op de Dommel.

Voordelen: Versterking van het centrumplan en centrummanagement is mogelijk Stimuleeert de recreatieve & toeristische sector in Boxtel Locale en regionale “merken” worden versterkt. (Beleef Boxtel, landschappen van Allure, Brabants Landschap en HGW)
story_txt:
Dutch version
Elektrisch varen op de Dommel “
Omdat Boxtel een lange geschiedenis heeft, is er veel te beleven en te ontdekken.”
Ir. Ing. Rob A.M. Strik
In samenwerking met: Dhr. A.P.M. Strik (Strik Recreatie)
Inhoudsopgave
1. INTRODUCTIE
2. ELEKTRISCH VAREN IN BOXTEL
2.1 De Dommel door Boxtel
2.2 De exploitatiemogelijkheden 
2.3 De voordelen voor Boxtel
3. ONDERNEMINGSKEUZES, SLOEPEN EN EXPLOITATIE
4. BEGROTING
4.1 ZWS-730 Elektrisch
4.2 E-sloep 650
4.3 E-sloep 550
4.4 Keuzecriteria vaartuig als productiemiddel
4.5 Verdienmodel
5. CONCLUSIES
1. Introductie
Omdat Boxtel een lange geschiedenis heeft, is er in Boxtel veel te beleven en te ontdekken. Inmiddels bestaan er in Boxtel diverse musea en monumenten. Met dit nieuwe plan wordt de verpreiding en vertelling van de boxtelse geschiedenis op een nieuwe manier verwezenlijkt. Kortom, dit plan gaat verder dan alleen elektrisch varen op de Dommel door Boxtel in een fluisterbootje (zie figuur 1). De geschiedenis van Boxtel wordt namelijk in een fluisterbootje ten gehore gebracht aan de deelnemers. Onderzoek op historie, kunst & cultuur, heemkunde en biotopen kan hiervoor tot een goed en mooi verhaal leiden. De vaartocht wordt nog extra versterkt door het verhaal via een koptelefoon of via een spreker te presenteren. Een dergelijke vaartocht kan op verschillende manieren geëxploiteerd worden. Daarvoor bestaat er een exploitatieplan met veel mogelijkheden. Het varen is mogelijk tussen Boxtel en Sint Oedenrode. Het exploitatievraagstuk wordt nog niet geheel opgelost en er bestaan nog vragen omtrent dit idee. Maar in goed overleg kan een realisatieplan gemaakt worden vanuit bestaande Boxtelse kringen. Denk hierbij aan Toeristisch platform Boxtel, Heemkundekring Boxtel, Brabants Landschap, Kunstroute De Rode Draad en Waterschap de Dommel. Inmiddels wordt in 2015 de eerste vaarbewegingen verwacht. Daarbij is de exploitatie en aanschaf van een elektrische sloep het hoofdonderwerp van dit plan.
2. Elektrisch varen in Boxtel
2.1 De Dommel door Boxtel
Het project Dommel door Boxtel van waterschap de Dommel is inmiddels afgerond. Deze rivier ziet er niet alleen prachtig uit, de functionaliteit op recreatie gebied is in sterke mate verbeterd. De rivier is geschikt geworden voor stille fluisterbootjes. Dit betreft dan de relatief “stille” elektrisch aangedreven fluisterbootjes en niet-gemotoriseerde bootjes. Met deze bootjes kan heen en weer gevaren worden tot sint Oedenrode en terug. Maar ook voor cultuurhistorische tochten kan in Boxtel bijvoorbeeld 1,5 uur gevaren worden. Onderweg wordt langs allerlei bezienswaardigheden gevaren. Ondanks dat de rivier geschikt is voor stille fluisterbootjes dient het vaarreglement in acht te worden genomen en met een klein vaarbewijs gevaren te worden.
2.2 De exploitatiemogelijkheden
Momenteel exploiteren diverse ondernemers en verenigingen verhuur van nietgemotoriseerde bootjes. Denk hierbij aan roeiboten, opblaasboten, kano’s en sups. De fluisterbootjes worden als toevoeging op deze Boxtelse activiteiten ingezet voor verhuur inclusief schipper. Daarvoor kan een elektrische platbodem sloep voor maximaal 12 personen uitkomst bieden. De exploitatie kan op verschillende manieren, waarbij de begroting de leidraad is. Op de volgende manieren kan de begroting gerealiseerd worden: · Eigen investeringen · Gemeentelijke ondersteuning · Crowdfunding (Social funding) Bovenstaande mogelijkheden tezamen kunnen leiden tot versterking en een goede startpositie voor dit plan. Dit plan kan voor een fluisterboot gerealiseerd worden. Inzet van vrijwilligers zou een uitweg kunnen bieden voor een sluitende exploitatiebegroting. De begroting omvat: a. Aanschaf elektrische platbodem boot maximaal 12 personen inclusief schipper. b. Uitgewerkt marketingplan voor de lange termijn. c. Onderzoek en realiseren van een begeleide vaartocht.
2.3 De voordelen voor Boxtel
Dit plan zal een aanwinst zijn voor de toeristische en recreatieve sector in Boxtel en het zet Boxtel nog meer op de kaart dan nu al het geval is; Denk hierbij aan versterking van het boxtelse centrum en daarbij het centrummanagement plan te versterken. Denk hierbij aan een verbrede doelgroep voor toerisme en recreëren in Boxtel. Denk hierbij aan de versterking van de “merken” Beleef Boxtel en Het groene woud. Bij crowdfunding wordt dit plan onder de mensen gebracht. Door een vaartocht aan te bieden in ruil voor funding onder een grote groep mensen (Crowd).
3. Ondernemingskeuzes, sloepen en exploitatie
Voor een elektrische sloep kunnen verschillende keuzes gemaakt worden. Het komt erop neer dat de volgende karakteristieken deze keuze bepalen:
· De vaarmogelijkheden op de rivier
o De watereigenschappen van de rivier
o De bodemeigenschappen van de rivier
o De doorgangen en meandering van de rivier
· De functionaliteit van de sloep
o De zitruimte op de sloep
o De wendbaarheid van de sloep
o De doorgang van de sloep
o De diepgang van de sloep
· De faciliteiten bij aanlegplaatsen
o Het opladen van de sloep
o Het wenden van de sloep
o De voorzieningen voor aanleggen
De vergelijking van diverse elektrische sloepen en de daarbij behorende begrotingen, kunnen voor 3 verschillende elektrische sloepen (capaciteit 12 personen) gemaakt worden.
Sloep: Prijs (ex. btw) Maximum motorvermogen:
ZWS-730 Elektrisch € 25.257,- of € 28.383,- ca. 4,0 kW
E-sloep 650 € 32.500,- ca. 7,5 kW
E-sloep 550 € 16.900,- ca. 3,5 kW
Inmiddels zijn bovenstaande sloepen in de praktijk uitgetest in Amsterdam en respectievelijk in Giethoorn. De kooponderhandelingen over de bovenstaande sloepen willen we spoedig starten. De bovenstaande sloepen leveren ongeveer 250,- euro per dag op indien deze verhuurd wordt met vrijwilligers die het roer besturen.
4. Begroting
Op aanvraag.
5. Conclusies
Aan de hand van dit plan kunnen de volgende conclusies worden getrokken: Voor uitrol van dit ondernemingsplan wordt een functionele elektrisch aangedreven sloep ingezet. Deze sloep draagt een mooie uitstraling uit voor exploitatie bij de steiger nabij de Zwaanse brug. Daarbij is het comfort en de sociale functie voor de gasten belangrijk. De begroting is onderhevig aan de volgende mogelijkheden:
· Het elektrisch varen op de Dommel
· Het aantal boten en de markt voor vaartochten op de Dommel
· De startbegroting en planning ervan
Afhankelijk van de kooponderhandelingen kan tot koop van een sloep overgegaan worden. Daarbij is de doorgang en diepgang van de elektrische sloep bepalend voor het varen op de Dommel.
Voordelen: Versterking van het centrumplan en centrummanagement is mogelijk Stimuleeert de recreatieve & toeristische sector in Boxtel Locale en regionale “merken” worden versterkt. (Beleef Boxtel, landschappen van Allure, Brabants Landschap en HGW)

story:
Remember those big and expensive coolers you used to carry when spending time outdoors? The ones that made the whole experience a bit uncomfortable and otherwise were mostly left in your garage to collect dust? And remember those other small coolers that were actually cheap and easy to carry, but you totally gave up on because they simply did not store all you needed to carry nor kept your drinks cold for very long? Awesome; now that you remembered both, feel free to forget all about them!

TOURIT is proud to introduce the ZOOM Trailer, the multifunctional cooler/messenger bag. It will ensure your cooler is never forgotten in the garage and no food or beverage is left behind.

 

As a cooler, the ZOOM Trailer is truly unique. It's designed to have huge storage capacity (it can fit 20 cans) while still compact enough for easy carrying. And the best part? It's designed to keep food and beverages cool for up to 24 hours with freeze packs.

The ZOOM Trailer is an all-weather soft cooler utility bag that covers all your outdoor needs while meeting FDA requirements for food packaging.

What’s more, with the ZOOM Trailer, one bag is all you need! As a messenger bag, you can easily use it to transport your laptop (it comes with a removable pouch to safely carry laptops up to 15.6 inches), documents, chargers, and other small items like granola bars so you can enjoy healthy snacks throughout your day!

In fact, the ZOOM Trailer is so convenient as a messenger bag that it features a unique three-strap shoulder system that eases the burden on your shoulders while also allowing you to conveniently keep it to one side of your body.

 

That's why the ZOOM Trailer is more than just a cooler, it's the perfect multifunctional bag for your everyday needs...

... whether you're going to the office in the morning or you're heading to the gym in the afternoon.

And as if that weren't enough, we've added even more storage to the ZOOM Trailer. The front pocket is actually a detachable fanny pack that can be used completely separately. Fanny packs have made an official comeback this year with convenient hands-free storage for jogging or exploring a new area without lugging around a giant bag. 

Because you never know where you’ll need to go or how you’ll need to get there, the ZOOM Trailer even comes with adjustable bicycle cruiser straps that make it ridiculously easy to attach to your bike. Whether for your commuting needs or outdoor recreation, taking this unique bag on your bike is as smart and easy as it gets!

The adjustable bike straps aren't the only extra feature increasing capacity and versatility of the ZOOM Trailer. The bag's bottom straps allow you to easily take clothing, towels, and blankets to the beach and on camping and other short trips.

 

The nature-lover in you will be very happy to know that the ZOOM Trailer is an eco-friendly bag. However, its environmentally-friendly nature does not compromise the bag's strength and durability, since the ZOOM Trailer is made with a durable and resistant TPU (Thermoplastic Polyurethane) material, which means the bag can withstand scratching and folding without getting worn out.

Did you know?

-Between 100 and 200 billion pounds of plastic is manufactured annually

-An estimated 10% of plastic ends up in the oceans every year

-About 20% comes from ships and platforms in the sea 

-The remaining 80% comes from the land – garbage that travels through storm drains or watersheds and accumulates in streams, rivers, and bays. Eventually, this plastic garbage finds its way into our world's vast oceans.

We strive to reduce the environmental burden and provide higher quality materials to our customers, partners and consumers.

The ZOOM Trailer has been successfully tested for its FDA & BPA-Free features.

 

Believe it or not, the ZOOM Trailer gets even better: all its zippers are water-repellent!

The ZOOM Trailer comes in black, navy, red, green & camo grey, giving you five incredible colors to choose from. With super early bird discounts, you can get one for up to 43% off! Get yours now!

You can support our campaign by ordering your ZOOM Trailer today. You can also support our project by liking it and sharing it on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube.

We currently have a fully developed, designed and working prototype of the ZOOM Trailer. Since TOURIT has a long history of creating special coolers and bags for outdoor enthusiasts, the only challenge we face now is spreading the word. We need YOUR help getting this product funded. We need you to let your friends, family, co-workers and community know about our innovative ZOOM Trailer.

Once you have one in your hands, we have no doubt you'll fall in love with the ZOOM Trailer. As a company, we have a long history of honoring our commitments and making our customers happy. All we need now is for you to join us in getting the word out about this next-level cooler. Help us get this messenger bag cooler to you by sharing with others. We hope you enjoy!

story:
Meet PARAGO PG20, probably the coolest portable cooler that you have ever met and your new lifestyle partner in crime to keep your drinks & food as cool as you want.

PARAGO: Smart Solutions, Reliable Quality, Unique Design

 

 

PG20 – German timeless design meets cutting-edge technology.

This coolest portable cooler that stands out in the market was made just for you.

Its unique design stands out, its retractable handle & robust wheels allow for maximum flexibility & its various cooling modes put you in charge.

 

 


 

  • The Multi-Use Divider

As we said, you are in control. No matter if you want to cool all of your drinks & food in one big compartment or split the cooling tub into 2 separate cooling areas, the choice is up to you.

If you decide not to use the divider you can conveniently store it inside PG20’s lid or you can use it as a chopping board for some last-minute chopping before your BBQ.

 

  • Full Temperature Control

Our products are designed and developed for one purpose only: To make your life cooler, more convenient and less stressful.

Only when you can live out your outdoor passion to the fullest, we did a good job. Simple as that.

By using only the best quality compressors in the market (made in E.U.) we make sure you can not only enjoy a wide cooling temperature range of -8℉ to +50℉, but also select one of 5 preset cooling modes (low, medium, high, MAX, ECO).

And the best thing? You don’t need to keep PG20 running 24/7. Thanks to our smart insulation technology, once fully cooled down to -8℉, PG20 will keep your drinks & food cool for up to 72 hrs before it reaches room temperature again. Pretty cool huh?

 

  • MAX & ECO Cooling Modes

If you’re running late MAX mode can cool down your goods to -8℉ in only 15 mins. If you put PG20 into ECO mode you’ll keep saving energy (only 1kWh) and if you power PG20 via our PARAGO Power Bank you can keep cooling for up to 25 hrs!

 

  • Maximum Convenience – Retractable Handle, Wheels & Interior Light

Let’s face it. When summer’s calling probably the last thing you want to do is lifting heavy stuff around. Most portable coolers though don’t leave you another choice. PG20 is different. We care about your back and make backaches a thing of the past.

Provided with robust and noise-free wheels and a retractable handle PG20 is as convenient to carry around as a small suitcase.

You will probably not even notice PG20 having your back.

The only thing you need to worry about is where to go next.

With our in-built light you become master of time. If you should forget about time we are here to light your PG20 up no matter how dark it gets.

 

  • Easy Charging

Providing you with the ultimate outdoor experience is our promise.

By using the DC charging port on your PG20 you can charge PG20 either via our PARAGO Adapter or Power Bank.

Both can be used to charge your PG20 either outdoor, in your car or at home.

If you charge PG20 in your car or at home we recommend you to use the H2 (Medium) or H3 (High) mode in combination with our PARAGO adapter.

You can connect the adapter conveniently to the cigarette lighter socket of your car.

The length of the adapter cable is about 2.5m (8 ft 2 in) so you can store your PG20 in the trunk while connecting the other end of the adapter to the cigarette lighter socket of your car.

 

 

 

  • Outdoor Sports Companion

We all know the importance of fitness to live a healthy lifestyle. While some of us prefer to exercise in a gym, others choose walking, jogging or playing an outdoor sport in nature. But what do all of them have in common? After a fulfilling yet exhausting sports session we all crave for a cold refreshment, no matter if water, an isotonic drink or a tasty beer. But let’s be honest. Who of us wants to drag their exhausted body to the next store to get their refreshment? Why don’t you just bring your own convenience store along with you? We know your feeling and we got your back, with our PG20 Portable Cooler.

 

  • Camping Buddy

It's Friday afternoon and you’re counting the minutes to finally call it a day at work and get home. How about this weekend you escape the city’s rush together with your beloved ones & explore some wild nature instead? Whether it’s a road trip with your family, a BBQ with colleagues or a camping weekend with friends, we make sure that along the way your basic needs are met. We make spoiled food, warm drinks, melting ice cubes in your ordinary cooler a thing of the past. Our PG20 makes sure that your foods, drinks and even medicine are stored as cool as you want, for up to 72hrs! Just relax, lay back and we take care of the rest. Simple as that. 

 

 

 

  • Emergency Override Function​

If your car’s battery is running low PG20 will automatically shut into emergency override mode to shut down all non-essential features to protect your car battery. Your safety and convenience is our top priority.

  • Durability

In our manufacturing hub in Shenzhen (China) we make sure to thoroughly test each individual PG20 before it gets delivered to you and your friends. Reliability is one of our 3 core values: Reliable Quality, Smart Solutions, Unique Design

Anti-Vibration Testing

You know it better. Sometimes the road to your pristine destination might be a bit bumpy. Your PG20 portable cooler comes with in-built anti-vibration protection, so don’t worry. Before we have delivered your PG20 to you we have thoroughly tested its resilience under extreme conditions for hours and hours to make sure bumpy roads will not affect PG20 in any way.

Heat & Humidity Testing

You decide where and when to go. So no matter if you’re traveling through hot-humid Florida or burning-dry Arizona, we have already put up your PG20 to the ultimate heat & humidity test.

Retractable Handle & Wheels Testing

*Actual Photos taken in our Manufacturing Hub

 

 

 

  • Power Bank

For maximum outdoor comfort you can keep charging PG20 via our Power Bank

Fully charged our Power Bank can charge your PG20 (H1 Mode) for up to 8 hours!

By the way, you can use our Power Bank to also charge other external devices, such as your smart phone (type-C).

Small-sized (a hand full) and slim (only 4.14lbs) our PARAGO Power Bank is a true mobile outdoor buddy.

 

  • Heat Protect Bag

Our bag consists of 3 layers. The outer layer is made of canvas and thus easy to clean and repels dirt. The middle layer is a thermal insulation film. The inner layer is made of aluminum foil to keep heat out and cool inside.

 

  • AC Adapter

This adapter converts 110v wall plug voltage into stable and safe power for PG20.

The outer layer is made of canvas and thus easy to clean and repels dirt. The middle layer is a thermal insulation film. The inner layer is made of aluminum foil to keep heat out and cool inside. AC AdapterThis adapter converts 110v wall plug voltage into stable and safe power for PG20.

story:
Ready to Ship -  first 500 units to be shipped right when campaign ends!!! 

 

We will ship the perks even if we will not reach the goal!!

 

What is AllBe1 Plus?

 

AllBe1: The perfect solution for tracking and protecting everything close to your heart.

Allbe1 Plus is an advanced version of the Allbe1 ,

We have sold more than 10k units so far since the previous version, We have improved the sensors data processing algorithm and more cool features that backers have asked for.

New additional features!!

  •  Last known GPS Location

Now you can easily know where you were connected to yours key-chain, for example.

  • We have extended up to 3 contacts when sending an SMS panic alert

 

  • Hidden Audio Recorder

Just click on AllBe1 Audio Voice Recorder secretly in your pocket and your phone will start recording. Nothing will show on the screen as well

We have  fulfilled all our commitments to our backers from the successful Indiegogo campaign we ran 3 years ago,

We have collected feedback from users and have improved the AllBe1.

We also have Improved the production processes - so the AllBe1 Plus price is much lower than that of the previous version.

 

Movement Detection clip - Open a drawer alert

 

 

Movement Detection - Car Burglar Alert

 
 

  • Easy to use app for Android and IOS.

  • Rechargeable battery (One hour of charging is good for 3 weeks).

  • X10 Times longer range than standard BT devices.

  • Keeps events time stamp on internal memory.

          (You can leave it in your drawer and know if someone opened it in your absence)

 
 

App screen video:

 

  •  

 

  • What is in the package:

(Burglar Alarm Sensor Stand, Belt Clip, Necklace)

Elegant package for the perfect  gift

 

Additional device  - Everywhere USB stick

Everywhere USB stick PC app.

AllBe1 Everywhere USB stick connects up to 3 AllBe1 Plus devices to a PC,

The PC app sends alerts to your mobile phone by Emails.

The PC app is already available to download on: www.allbe1.com

 

 

Independent Review Video:

 

What You Get

AllBe1 Plus is an advanced version of the AllBe1,

We have sold more than 10k units so far since the previous version,

We have fulfilled all of our commitments to our backers from the 1st Indiegogo campaign

We have collected feedback from users and have improved the sensors data - processing algorithm and have added a new feature - Last Known GPS Location (Read on text above) 

Help us make it happen!

We have completed the design and we need your help to fund the production.

 

 

 

 

About the Team:

We are 4  skilled Engineers and we are good friends that have worked together for many years.

We are responsible for more than 5 millions products in the fields of security, medical & wireless sensors.

We are experts in bringing  high technology products to market.

Team Members:

Ofer Lugasi -CEO,  HW engineer - sensor expert with more than 15 years of experience responsible for  more than 5 millions products in the field, designing and pushing to mass production.

Zvi Rozenfeld - Sales & Marketing Mgr. Zvi worked for an international semi-conductor vendor and bring vast experience of over 30 years in the hi-tech market.

Dotan Ruhama- Mechanical Engineering Designer, with more than 20 years of experience in designing high-tech products, 

Ehud Drin - SW engineer, Ehud has more than 25 years of experience in developing SW and PC SW for sensors and wireless devices

 

FAQ:

  • What are the differences between AllBe1 and AllBe1 Plus?

We have added the "Last Known GPS" which helps you in many life activities (e.g where I parked my car, where I lost my key and more) and we also have added the "Hidden Audio Recording"

By pushing on the AllBe1 button your phone will start recording the ambient audio without any visible sign on the phone.

AllBe1 Plus is more accurate than the previous AllBe1 , In general they have the same sensors and all previous features.

  • Will the former AllBe1 Backers benefit from the new app?

Yes, they helped us make it happen and they deserve to have the new features. Just download the new app.

  • What is the "Extended Range" mentioned in the campaign movie?

AllBe1 Plus is a state-of-the-art design. We have added a power amplifier to the BLE, so the AllBe1 Plus responds significantly better than a regular BLE device (x 5-10 better).  

  • How does AllBe1 PLUS connected to my mobile phone and with which phone does it works?

It connects with a BLE (Bluetooth low energy) connection that is supported by iPhone 4 and up as well as various Android mobiles ( Samsung Galaxy S4 and up, LG G2 and up, Nexus 4 and up and many more devices) 

  • Does AllBe1 include a camera?

No, it does not include a camera, but since AllBe1 is an open platform developers can use one of the sensors as a trigger for your smartphone camera.

  • What is the battery operating time of AllBe1?

Its depends on the user's profile. With average use, it remains charged for up to 2 months.  AllBe1 charges with a regular micro USB connector. Charging time is about 1 hour

  • Is AllBe1 waterproof?

It meets the IP-52 standard requirements. You can take a shower with it but you can't swim with it.

  • What is a PIR sensor?

PIR = Passive Infra Red, it’s a sensor that can feel the IR wavelength emitted by the human body. AllBe1 contains a PIR sensor that can detect the presence of humans if they are moving.

  • How many AllBe1 devices can I connect to my mobile phone at the same time?

Basically the BLE can support many devices connected at the same time. With the first release it will be able to support up to 6 units. We plan to upgrade it a few months later so  it will be able to connect to many more devices at the same time.

 

  • How many AllBe1 features can work at the same time?

All of the features can work simultaneously.

 

  • Does AllBe1 include a GPS receiver?

No. AllBe1 uses your Smartphone GPS to send your location, it use the mobile phone GPS.

 

  • What can I do with the Smart  Button on the AllBe1?

By pushing the button the AllBe1 will send an emergency SMS with your location and will call to a pre-set number. Sends GPS location to selected contact person, shortcuts to selected apps, a function of "Find my Phone". Also allows your smartphone to make a "selfie" picture  and start/stop hidden audio recording with your phone.

 

  • How will I know when it is time to charge my AllBe1 capsule?

Your Smartphone will alert you when the battery reaches 15% of capacity.  You have a capacity bar in the phone.

 

  • With how many AllBe1 devices can one smartphone communicate?”

6 AllBe1s, we will upgrade it later

 

  • How do I pair AllBe1 with my smartphone?

Pairing will be done from within the AllBe1 app. +  pressing on the button. No need to set the  Bluetooth menu on your phone. From within the smartphone app, you will only be able to pair with an AllBe1 that is very close to the phone. (About 1 foot or less). This will ensure that you only pair with your device.

 

  • Does each AllBe1 have a unique ID?

Yes. Each AllBe1 has its own MAC address.

 

  • Is what I see on the video what I get?

Basically, yes. However, since we made the videos, we’ve added more features such as the selfie pic, hidden audio recording and the kid in the car alert. We have removed the fitness feature.

Also, we stopped the sale of the SDK protocol to developers.

* *  Do you sell SDK to developers?

In some cases yes. Please contact support for additional details

 

  • Can multiple phones in my area connect to an AllBe1 capsule?

You can pair the AllBe1’s to many phones, and even see all the AllBe1’s in range on the radar screen from many phones at the same time, but only one phone can control all the AllBe1’s.  

 

  • Is there any interference with or from other people's AllBe1’s?

No. BLE protocol is designed to eliminate this possibility.

 

  • What happens if the AllBe1 triggered an alarm when I’m out of the AllBe1 range?

The AllBe1 will save the time when alarm triggered and show you on the app when you connect again to the AllBe1.

story:
NEW Portable Painter® MICRO

The original Portable Painter® CLASSIC was launched on Indiegogo in November 2016.  Thanks to the enthusiasm and generosity of our indiegogo supporters, we reached our goal.  As a result, the original Portable Painter® is now a staple part of the art materials world.  It’s available at many fine retailers including Blick Art Materials and Amazon, among others.

We have spent much of 2019 developing an entirely new tiny palette, called the Portable Painter® MICRO.  It’s credit card size and just one inch thick. Yet it converts in seconds to a fully functional watercolor painting rig.

It features six, standard size half-pans, ready for your favorite colors, plus plenty of mixing wells and a convertible water container, plus a handy T-bar finger grip on the base. It can also hold standard size full pans if desired. Please take a look at our short animation to see all the useful features.  

Tooling for this great new MICRO palette is almost complete.   We expect to receive pre-production samples soon. Initial supplies will be limited, so if you would like to own one of the World’s first Portable Painter® MICROs, at a significant discount, please choose one of our perks. We anticipate shipping them in February 2020.  Your contribution will be a huge help in funding the first full production run. 

Kind regards,

Steve Padden

Designer and Founder, Portable Painter

----------------------------

Images of the most recent MICRO samples (December 19th) showing the T Bar Finger grip and the palette held in the hand:

----------------------------------

The Original Portable Painter Classic: Campaign Overview

The Portable Painter™ came from my art college roots.  Since student days I’ve always carried a small watercolor set and other art supplies with me whenever I traveled.  I realized that I could probably design a better watercolor set if I put my mind to it!  This began a yearlong effort to identify all the elements I wanted and to combine them in a single, elegant set.

In the design process I discovered a novel way to have the water containers connect securely with the case and form a pedestal base. This even allows the set to balance on a painter’s knee for totally hands-free use: So it has the potential of making open-air painting and urban sketching much simpler.

Around the world, people of all ages observe and paint from life, as tourists or locals.  The best of their work is nothing short of spectacular. When I look at the beauty they are creating every day, just for the love of it, it urges me to use the Portable Painter™ to connect with my old art college self: To turn off my devices and turn on my powers of observation. I hope you’ll choose to join me!

Tooling for this great new watercolor palette has already been created.  Your support is vital to help me fund a full production run of the Portable Painter™ and start to get it into the hands of as many painters and urban sketchers as possible.  In turn, you can own one of the World’s first Portable Painters with my gratitude!

Thank you for your enthusiasm about the Portable Painter, your generosity in supporting the campaign and the trust you placed in me to deliver.  I believe that you will be delighted by the result!

Kind regards,

Steve Padden

Designer and Founder, Portable Painter

TOOLING SAMPLES:

The photos shown here are of the first pre-production test of the Portable Painter molds.

story:
I am 18 and sailing around the world is a dream of mine. I love the idea of being on the open sea with no rules, no one telling me what I can and can't do or where to go. We all have that dream of feeling completely free from all our troubles and worries, of starting over in a better life. I really want to see the world and experience some of life's greatest things. I want to meet people and learn how much different we all are, yet how were all the same. My family and I all traveled around the US and had a Blast doing it. We got to see all kind of places and meet some of the coolest people.
I miss that. That is why I would love your help supporting me accomplishing my dream of sailing around the world.

We got to see all kind of places and meet some of the coolest people. I miss that. That is why I would love your help supporting me accomplishing my dream of sailing around the world.

story:
Creating A World Class Centre

The Project Climbing Centre is a community focused enterprise - we're here to give the local  community the very best alternative sport facilities we possibly can. We've got all sorts going on here from zumba and yoga right through to parkour and aerial silks. Our main focus, though, is our climbers. We are, first and foremost, a climbing facility and as part of our desire to create one of the best bouldering centres in the world we're looking for your support. With your help we can take what we think is already a pretty good facility and start to turn it into something incredible.


What We Want To Give You

Because we're a socially focused enterprise we don't make an awful lot of money and because of the size of The Project our overheads are pretty big. We've decided that the best way to help realise our dreams is to ask you, our crowd, for a bit of help. We're looking to raise money in order to be able to bring you a bigger and better facility:

  • New holds and volumes
  • A new traversing wall with lower grade climbs for warming up and technique development
  • New equipment for the conditioning and stretching areas
  • A huge new competition wall
As a bit of incentive we've set out some rewards but more than anything we're looking to expand and improve the climbing centre to benefit all of our users from our youngest newbies through to our top level competitors. The more you're able to put toward The Project the more we'll be able to do so please dig deep and don't forget to tell all of your friends! We've got plans in place for some fantastic lead climbing as well as our ambitions with the bouldering so if lead climbing is more up your street than bouldering, don't worry, there's still plenty to get excited about!
As well as all of our climbing plans we'll need to put a little bit of funding aside to help with our operating overheads and, if we raise enough, we'll also be looking to make improvements elsewhere in the building on areas such as changing rooms, showers and lockers.


Building Our Community

We hope that you've all enjoyed what we've produced at The Project so far and that you can feel confident that your funding will go 100% towards helping to sustain and develop what we've got on offer here.

As our fundamental purpose is to create an amazing community based venue and essentially a second home for all of our customers. We're really proud of what we've achieved with you so far and we'd like to build on this. We'll keep working hard to help introduce new people to our great range of sports and to help sustain everyone's passion. We think we've got an opportunity, with your help, to build one of the very best climbing centres in the world, not just in terms of facilities but also in terms of atmosphere and friendships.

The developments we're looking to bring you will help us to be able to set a greater range of climbs at all levels, from the easiest through to international level competition routes, specifically:

  • New holds and volumes will help us to keep setting interesting, creative, technical and fun problems which will obviously directly benefit everyone!
  • Our new traversing wall will provide the ideal place to warm up, work on your footwork, improve your endurance and technique and, hopefully make the step up to climbing on our existing endurance boards.
  • Everyone can benefit from proper conditioning areas, even if it's just a space to have a little stretch or play around on the exercise balls - we're looking to mat out a bigger area (including the area around the pull up bars) with thin exercise mats, introduce some new exercise balls and balance kit as well as a load of other little goodies.
  • The big one is obviously building our new section of wall! We're looking to build what will be the second biggest competition wall in the UK currently (just as an interim fix, eventually we'll be building the biggest!) This won't just allow us to host events of national and international importance, it will also allow us to set some amazing problems on world class climbing walls for everyone who climbs here. If nothing else, it'll help to ease congestion a little on the walls so when you come in for your sessions you'll be able to move around a little more easily!

“Nothing in the world is worth having or worth doing unless it means effort, pain, difficulty…"

As climbers we all know Theodore Roosevelt had it right when he said those words and The Project is no different. It's been a whole lot of hard work to get us here and it'll require a whole lot more to keep us going and moving forwards. We've enjoyed every minute of it so far and your help and support has made all the difference. There are still challenges to be overcome, however, and your support will help us to know that what we're doing is valued and that we're well on the way to building a very successful community based project.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you know of an individual or a business who might be able to help us out them please spread the word.
  • If you've got aunts, uncles, brothers, sisters, mums, dads, friends please let them know about us and what we do here. If we can raise just a tiny amount of money from everyone you know then we'll be well on the way towards reaching our target.
  • Don't forget you can always contribute on someone else's behalf or even buy someone a Perk as a present!
  • It's easy to share, just use the buttons that are built in to this page and encourage all of your connections to make a contribution.

Thanks for taking the time to have a read of our page and thank you for even thinking about helping us out. We hope that you value what we're doing and what we're about enough to help us reach our target and keeping improving what we offer here.

A huge new competition wallAs a bit of incentive we've set out some rewards but more than anything we're looking to expand and improve the climbing centre to benefit all of our users from our youngest newbies through to our top level competitors. The more you're able to put toward The Project the more we'll be able to do so please dig deep and don't forget to tell all of your friends! We've got plans in place for some fantastic lead climbing as well as our ambitions with the bouldering so if lead climbing is more up your street than bouldering, don't worry, there's still plenty to get excited about!As well as all of our climbing plans we'll need to put a little bit of funding aside to help with our operating overheads and, if we raise enough, we'll also be looking to make improvements elsewhere in the building on areas such as changing rooms, showers and lockers.


  Building Our Community We hope that you've all enjoyed what we've produced at The Project so far and that you can feel confident that your funding will go 100% towards helping to sustain and develop what we've got on offer here.
As our fundamental purpose is to create an amazing community based venue and essentially a second home for all of our customers. We're really proud of what we've achieved with you so far and we'd like to build on this. We'll keep working hard to help introduce new people to our great range of sports and to help sustain everyone's passion. We think we've got an opportunity, with your help, to build one of the very best climbing centres in the world, not just in terms of facilities but also in terms of atmosphere and friendships.
The developments we're looking to bring you will help us to be able to set a greater range of climbs at all levels, from the easiest through to international level competition routes, specifically:


New holds and volumes will help us to keep setting interesting, creative, technical and fun problems which will obviously directly benefit everyone!
Our new traversing wall will provide the ideal place to warm up, work on your footwork, improve your endurance and technique and, hopefully make the step up to climbing on our existing endurance boards.
Everyone can benefit from proper conditioning areas, even if it's just a space to have a little stretch or play around on the exercise balls - we're looking to mat out a bigger area (including the area around the pull up bars) with thin exercise mats, introduce some new exercise balls and balance kit as well as a load of other little goodies.
The big one is obviously building our new section of wall! We're looking to build what will be the second biggest competition wall in the UK currently (just as an interim fix, eventually we'll be building the biggest!) This won't just allow us to host events of national and international importance, it will also allow us to set some amazing problems on world class climbing walls for everyone who climbs here. If nothing else, it'll help to ease congestion a little on the walls so when you come in for your sessions you'll be able to move around a little more easily!


 
“Nothing in the world is worth having or worth doing unless it means effort, pain, difficulty…"
As climbers we all know Theodore Roosevelt had it right when he said those words and The Project is no different. It's been a whole lot of hard work to get us here and it'll require a whole lot more to keep us going and moving forwards. We've enjoyed every minute of it so far and your help and support has made all the difference. There are still challenges to be overcome, however, and your support will help us to know that what we're doing is valued and that we're well on the way to building a very successful community based project.

Other Ways You Can Help
 Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  If you know of an individual or a business who might be able to help us out them please spread the word.
If you've got aunts, uncles, brothers, sisters, mums, dads, friends please let them know about us and what we do here. If we can raise just a tiny amount of money from everyone you know then we'll be well on the way towards reaching our target.
Don't forget you can always contribute on someone else's behalf or even buy someone a Perk as a present! It's easy to share, just use the buttons that are built in to this page and encourage all of your connections to make a contribution.   Thanks for taking the time to have a read of our page and thank you for even thinking about helping us out. We hope that you value what we're doing and what we're about enough to help us reach our target and keeping improving what we offer here.

story:
Everybody is looking for an adventure! Now it’s easy to find one.

Poket Nomad is specifically designed to help travelers find and book tours, activities and adventures!

That’s why Poket Nomad brings everything to one place and makes it quick and easy to find and book adventures, scout out restaurants, ‘free stuff’ to do and more. We are your go-to for adventure destinations. 

The Poket Nomad app has a streamlined design to make it quick and easy for users to find what they are looking for.


Poket Nomad launched November 2014

It is currently available in 5 destinations in the middle of one of the adventure meccas of the world.

How it works!

Hotel stands that travelers can tap or scan to pipe into the local activities using GPS.

Poket Nomad helps every one to reduce paper brochure waste by using the app instead of taking and tossing tour brochures.

Search function allows users who aren't in one of our current destinations to search a location and plan ahead. 

We need your help!

We want Poket Nomad to be in EVERY adventure destination in America and eventually the entire world. We want to make the app the best it can be and that is why Poket Nomad is looking additional funding. This is your chance to be a part of the adventure travel movement.

Can't contribute? You can still help us!

  • Just downloading the app helps us a ton! 
  • We also love positive reviews when you realize what an awesome app it is!
  • Lastly, we love any and all feedback on your experience of using the app. Send it to contact@poketnomad.com

story:
About me.

My name is Stanislav, 30 years old, security specialist and motoserviceman. Riding a motorcycle for more than 11 years, and I like to best places of the World.

So what I have:

- Motorcycling expirience for over 11 years

- I can drive any regular class of motorcycle, plus quadro, plus cars

- Experience in maintaining and servicing transport with gasoline internal combustion engine

- Two formal "Iron Butt" achievements (1700km for 25 hours, 2000km for 28 hours)

- My GOOZ. BMW R1150GS (maybe I will swap it to R1200GS)

- Equipment gear for all weather conditions

- All necessary gadgets including dashcams, gps, laptop and so on and so on

Route is planned, summer is coming. Ready to go.

Participation.

As I mentioned before - I have little starting budget, so I plan to ride anyway. Though it is far not enough to complete journey and I need some help. I really appreciate your support and telling your friends about this project. Feel free to ask me any questions about expedition and if you want to meet me on my route : you can check it on my travel-blog, or planned by FURKOT here:  https://trips.furkot.com/ts/l9mkep

And in the end - here's my future travel blog! http://motolight.gortw.org/?lang=en

story:
Are you tired of this?                           

 

Then stop clapping

And start slinging

 

Tackle any mess 

The 5 in 1 tool lets you clean any kind of mess off any kind of shoe

 

It can clean

  • Dirt
  • Mud
  • Grass
  • Gravel
  • More

Stop slipping around in muddy shoes

Improve performance and avoid injuries

It's as simple as this

Rinses clean in seconds

Easily attaches to any sports bag

Good for all kinds of sports and outdoor activities like

  • Football
  • Baseball
  • Soccer
  • Lacrosse
  • Golf
  • Track & Field
  • Hunting
  • Hiking
  • Gardening
  • Also great for snow removal

The Backstory

Like most parents I love watching my kids play sports. I love rooting for them and seeing them excel at something they enjoy. But as much as I love watching them play, I'm sick of dealing with muddy cleats after lacrosse or football practice. I hate the mud in my kids bags, in my car and in my house. Not to mention slipping around on muddy cleats can lead to common sports injuries.

My daughter Kara and I after her lacrosse game

The kids aren't the only one's who spend time outdoors. My wife loves gardening and more often than not you can catch me working on some kind of project around the house.

So I tried to find a solution to my families mud problem. You can imagine my surprise when I couldn't find a single product on the market for cleaning muddy shoes on the go. But I refused to surrender in my war against mud. So I set out to make the ultimate outdoor footwear cleaning tool for people in the field. Something affordable that could easily attach to any sports bag or fit in your pocket and could clean any type of shoe from sports cleats to construction boots.

After perfecting  the preliminary design my son used his friend’s 3D printer  to create the original prototype.

After several iterations, field tests and lots of feedback I've refined the design of the Mudslinger to tackle any kind of mess. My daughter has helped me apply for the patent, and I've found three engineers that can bring this product to life. This is where you come in.

We're ready to go

I've already figured out all of the manufacturing details including cost and lead time. I'm proud to say that the Mudslinger will be made entirely in the good ol USA.

Check out pictures of our complete tooling process below

 

The money we raise here will help pay for 

  • Development
  • Trademarks/Patents
  • Production
  • Packaging
  • Marketing

You can be sure that when you back this campaign you will get your perk delivered on time and that your money is helping support American ingenuity and manufacturing. Back us today and lets keep dirt where it belongs, on the field!

story:
The ENKEEO Lite is world’s first 4-in-1 camping fan that has been specifically designed to make your upcoming outdoor trips more comfortable. With its built-in fan, flashlight, power bank and LED lantern, our multipurpose mini fan offers a solution for any occasion.

 

Thanks to it’s compact and lightweight design, the ENKEEO lite camping fan can be easily carried around anywhere you go. It furthermore features a sleek and stylish body which makes a great gizmo for indoor use as well. Whether you use it at home, in the office, or outdoors - our wireless fan well keep you comfortable anywhere you go.

 

The Unboxing Video: 

 

 

 

Powered by a built-in battery, the mini fan quietly brings you fresh and cool air for up to 12 hours continuously. You’ll be treated to three different wind speeds and a 180-degree rotating head. No matter where you are, our mini fan will always keep you cool.

 

The powerful built-in battery of the ENKEEO mini camping fan can be used as a portable power bank. Treating you to a whopping 4000mAh, it will charge your phone, tablet or any other device on the go. Simply use the included USB cable to connect your electronic gadget to our 4-in-1 camping fan and you’ll never have to worry about running out of juice again.


This amazing multipurpose outdoor gadget comes with a built-in 80 lumen flashlight that has been fitted in its 180-degree rotating head. With its three different lighting modes, this torch will light up the path in front of you while heading out after dark. Your camping fan furthermore features a 220 lumen LED lantern/desk-light which is great for lighting up your room or tent at night.
 

This lightweight mini fan treats you to a total of three different cooling modes that will keep you comfortable throughout the day. Thanks to its compact design it can be easily fitted on your desk, kitchen table, or outdoor tent. Your gizmo furthermore comes with a handy hanger which allows you to hang your mini fan upside down from the ceiling of your tent or from a tree. This beautiful outdoor camping fan is available in both black and green.

 

Timeline

 

2016.11.01--Idea Incubation
2017.02.01--Appearance Design
2017.03.20--First Fully Functional Prototype
2017.04.28--Performance Test
2017.05.10--Apply For Design Patent (EU, US)
2017.08.02--Improved Internal Structure
2017.09.04--Get EU Patent
2017.11.01--Tests and Enhancement
2018.2.01--Trial Production
2018.3.31--Indiegogo Crowdfunding
2018.4.30--Start Shipping to Backer


FAQ


Does the Lantern Lite come with a warranty?
All Enkeeo products have a 12-month warranty.

Is the fan safe to use?
Yes, our 4-in-1 camping fan is 100% safe to use. The fan blades itself have been built in a strong casing which protects you from accidentally getting hurt by the running blades.

Why set such a high funding goal for the lantern?
We want to bring the final product to life at a competitive price. To do so, we need a large funding to reduce the unit costs. Moreover, the whole technology and testing behind each step of the process are expensive yet essential costs that we have to take into account to create a successful product that can be sold globally. We believe in this product and its funding goal, and we are ready to accomplish it!

My PayPal transaction doesn’t work, what should I do?
Email the Indiegogo Customer Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any payment issues.

I contributed to a perk but I forgot to add the extra $$ for shipping. How can I fix that?
If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make another contribution.

How much will it cost to ship the Lantern to my country?
We ship globally, and we will begin to fulfill the orders after the crowdfunding campaign finishes in one month from its launching date.
Our warehouses are located in the USA and Europe. Fulfillment within USA and EU will be 5-10 business days. International orders may take longer, up to 30 days.
Shipping costs are different per region and calculated upon checkout as soon as you enter your receiving address.

I have more questions. Who can help me?
We’re happy to respond to any further queries you might have about the ENKEEO Lite. Visit our official website: www.enkeeo.com or email us at support@enkeeo.com

story:
I am Dimitrios Nikou and here is where i get precise. I need money for travelling to various ski resorts in Greece with the purpose of filming video parts to promote myself and the sport I love which is freeskiing. The basic problem is that I also am a philosophy student in the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki which means that I will have to attend my classes. That is why I will constantly have to be on the road if I want to ski at all this season. I could easily move to a resort and stay there but my studies will have me travelling back and forth. I really hope that you can help me follow my dream and not have to choose between two things tha I love! Here you can see what I have been up to : https://www.instagram.com/dimitrios_nikou/?hl=el

https://www.facebook.com/dimitriosnolies.nikou

story:
WELCOME!

Here at KitinaTin, we select the best stuff you need for Festivals, Camping & Travel! As well as constantly adding new products and ensuring we offer you the best price, we test each item for durability. We are all keen outdoors people at KitinaTin and our passion is good gear to make the most of any trip. We also manufacture our very own Kits the  KAMPING KIT and the KHAZI KIT. Each tin contains all sorts of useful and essential items. The tin itself is attractively designed and carefully made to last and last. 


What We Need:

  • Help! This business has proven to be very popular and has gotten great reviews and feedback - It just needs working capital!
  • Our Kits are unique and the company is up and running.
  • All funding will go straight to marketing these great products which are all ready to go and send to customers.
  • Online marketing, social media and events are the main focus.
  • Other Kits are already in the pipeline - so much more to come!

So far,

This has been completely Director funded and the business has no debt and is now self funding through sales.
I am the only Director and hold all shares in the company.

Risks & Challenges

Obviously, nothing is a sure thing but figures show constant and continual growth backed up and evidenced by sales figures. Plus you will be sent a 'perk' just select which one!

Other Ways You Can Help

Magazine reviews, social media shares, radio adverts, trade space at events, and even just word of mouth will really really help me to continue to build this company. It is my dream to make a success of this and provide people with great gear, gifts and gadgets!

story:
What do you think of One tool that replaces 14 tools..

 

The story about the customers who want all the tools for a low price..

I am Theo Lock from the Netherlands. I am working as a salesman in a DIY shop (under this page more about my), and have many customers find the tools to expensive. Especially people who have little or small jobs to do, want it easier and cheaper.

Until now we had nothing and no suppliers, but we found one want to produce the following great product, The Multitool!

The Multitool! is a great convenient tool that have several tools in itself.

 

 

Discover The Multitool! with the following tools in it:  knife, hammer, pliers, cutting pliers, saw, saw branches, screwdrivers, beer opener, wrench, ax, kind of file. That are 14 functions in one tool, easily carrying through a canvas belt sleeve. Made of Stainless Steel and wooden handle it looks nice, works very nice and do not rust.

 

 

Be the first to have this great tool, and make our wish come true, to sell this tool to the customers and all other shops who want this great tool.

I have the first samples, and already have one in my own car and one at home in our kitchen, its a fantastic tool and even my wife do using it..  Quickly a nail in the wall, cut a rope or unscrew without having to look for the toolbox. For work and fun, because The Multitool have a (beer) opener too ;) 

 

 

Easy, fast and everything at hand! (and on your belt)

 

 

See our Great perks for the first 5 backers and 100 early birds!!

And the other perks to get this tool for a nice price, do you want them for business or gift, or do you also want to sell them, your own logo on The Multitool! and a gift box with logo is also possible.

 

As I said, I had some samples, and let some people try, including myself and my wife, but also sell on an auction site for collectable items, to see what other people finding of this Multitool, And they are loving it, and bid and pay on auction 75 an 95!! Euro (excl. shipping and auction fee 9%) for this Multitool!!

 

What you can do with The Multitool..

That's a lot.. The most convenient is that this tool have so many in one, you Always can use this tool for something in your home, caravan, garden, holyday, survival tour, car, on your work and many places more.
 
Here are in pictures all the functions of The Multitool, all made by myself.

 

 And some Ideas how to use The Multitool.

 

 

 More Details:

 The Multitool is made of Stainless steel, wooden side. The Multitool is very durable, and made for high duty. The weight is 400 gram, hold easily, and simple to carry with the black belt sleeve. The Multitool dimensions are 16 x 9 x 3CM. The belt sleeve, there are 2 types of this sleeve, almost the same, there is no option to choose the belt sleeve, I am sorry.. If you make a order for more pcs we try to deliver all with the same belt sleeve.

  

     Choose your best deal. The Perks..

     There are some different types of perks, so let my explain.

    1: The home and family perks, one loose tool to some more tools. 

    2: The small business lots, nice for resale in your shop/online/market/business gift.

    3: Wholesale for big business, also gift box and own logo is possible. Shop/retailer/distributor/business gift.

     

    TIP >> The Twins or the Quartet. Combine the shipping cost  <<

     

     

    The orders with giftbox and logo.

    If you choose this perk, thank you very much. We take contact with you for the Logo.

    There are 2 types of boxes, the black one is standard. If you want box 2, the luxe box, please add the Luxe Box perk!!

    Please see the picture gallery for the boxes, thank you.

     

     

    What are the risks?

    We have a long and weekly contact with the factory, and they will help my if there is any problem. The tools can be produced directly, and will send quickly to my.  

    What can happen? Suggest that the package to you does not arrive, we ship all packages with track and trace, so your order can be tracked, And is insured. 
     
    Orders over 500€ will be shipped with high value insured shipping, also with track and trace. Note that it is possible you have to pay import tax in your country. All packages will be shipped out from the Netherlands, Europe.
    All the tools will be checked personally on damages, but it can be happen that you receive one with a damage. If so, please send us an email with pictures and we will send a new one if its clearly manufacturing fault. Broken parts by normal use are warranty 1 jear.
    We can not be held liable for injuries caused by use or misuse of this Multitool. Follow the instructions for more information and secure use of the Multitool. 
     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    First of all, thank you very much for watching and reading this.

     I know this do not looks like professional, it is not, I do this all by my one. There is no big team with specialist after this, no publicity agancy, only my and my wife, and some family ready to help pack the orders.

    The target is that I can do more business with the supplier and work some more ideas out. A boost for my business. But I need your help with this.

     

     That is why I want to ask you, if you like this but not buying, maybe you know a person who might be interested, please share this.

    And If you are buying, Thank you very much.

story:
Whats in it for you?

We would love you to join our family and as a small thank you we will be offering the following perks.

£50 - Get your gloves at a special indiegogo price! Saving you a massive  £30
£100 - Get two pairs gloves at a special indiegogo price! Saving you a massive £60

£3 - Love Inc owner to do a full Red run in the Alps wearing nothing but a Leopard Skin thong. Run will be videoed and everyone that has donated will be thanked

£5 - Limited Edition Sticker Pack
£10 - Free Beenie
£250 - A full Set up. Free Beenie, Tshirt, Jacket, Beenie, Sweater, Gloves
£300 - Grab a snowboard for a special indiegogo price (Personalised for you)
£500 - 50% off any snowboard for life

 

So why do we need you

Quality and functionality are the core of our business and even thought its cheaper to get our gloves manufactured abroad, as a small uk firm we believe in the quality of UK manufacturing. Your funding will allow us to push our products to new levels and develop more customer focused products made in the UK.

So far we have gotten part of the way to making the next step a reality but we need your help to get us to the next level.

Why not help shape the future of snowboarding and join us for the Ride, by donating to our campaign…

Your funding will allow us to push our products to new levels and develop more customer focused products.

What will your funding and loyalty be spent on?

If you are able to fund us and help us reach our goal of £25000 we can secure the manufacture of our gloves in the UK for years to come bringing you a better quality product. This funding will go to  the following areas £10,000 will be spent on product development and £15,000 on manufacturing new lines.

 

Perks

 

Please note you can donate as much or as little as you wish. Every penny really does count.

We believe this project and products are extremely important to our customers and investors, never before has a company given their customers so much opportunity to shape the products they will wear. Coupled with this we offer unrivalled quality at an affordable price!

We appreciate not everyone is in a position to contribute, if that’s the case we would please urge you to share our story and reach as many people as possible. Please share via social media, word of mouth or using the Indiegogo share tool. Thanks

 

Whats so great about our gloves?
