story:
Overview:

Outdoor enthusiasts! Campers! Fishermen! And anyone who plans on leaving their home at any point in the future! X-Bite is a patented anti-itch innovation that uses a dual action process to relieve your worst bug bites fast.  

 

How it works:

 1. First, a patented "X" tip applicator is pressed into the bite - a scientifically proven method that displaces and weakens the potency of the insect's saliva. 

2. Simultaneously, a powerful antihistamine ointment is applied through the tip directly onto the bite, providing relief and speeding the healing process.

This winning combination is the only one of its kind!

 

Formula

Our formula combines the following ingredients for the most effective itch relief without the drying effect of some other relief products that contain ammonia.

BENZOCAINE

Sometimes used for tooth and throat pain, this is a powerful yet mild topical pain reliever.

CAMPHOR

Commonly used to relieve itchy bites, but also can be found in a variety of products such as cough relief topical rubs. It works by slowing bacteria growth and cooling the skin.

PHENOL

Commonly used in mouthwash, this safe and effective compound kills germs, relieves pain and helps to relieve the occurrence of infection.

 

But wait... there's more!

 

FAST RELIEF

Our powerful topical ointment is combined with the natural yet scientifically proven method of pressing an “x” into your bite

 

SMART DESIGN

We wanted to make a product that would work for people who love being outside, from experienced campers to first time fishers. We've designed X Bite to be small, portable and sturdy so you can take it with you no matter where the summer takes you. Plus, with a modern sleek design, no matter what you're doing people will assume you know what you're doing. Even if you don't.

 

SOCIAL CONSCIENCE

In addition to helping you enjoy your time outdoors, we want to do our part to fight mosquito borne illness. Did you know that nearly half of the world's population is at risk for Malaria exposure? Each year, hundreds of millions of people contract the disease. With each purchase of X Bite, we intend to contribute a portion to help fight this curable disease.

 

About the campaign:

After years of development, patent lawyers, meetings, phone calls, and incredibly long group chats we're finally ready to launch X-Bite and share our invention with the world. An invention that is fully patented by the USPTO office.  

 

Why your help is important to us:

Help us help you, by helping us first. With a contribution from you, we can create the first large-scale production of X-Bite devices and begin the next step on our journey as a small business, so you can journey into the outdoors with more confidence.  

 

What we need & what you get

We are looking to raise $30,000 to create 20,000 devices and help pay for marketing and advertising in order to get the word out for this revolutionary new product. Your $10 donation will be directly responsible for manufacturing, shipping, distributing, and marketing of 5 units.

Contributors to this campaign will receive a variety of perks - check out the perks section of this page to see all the great rewards available to you.

 

What happens if we don't achieve our campaign goal?

If we don't achieve our campaign goal your funds will still be used to help us launch X-Bite. We're a group of dedicated individuals, and we are confident that people will love our product. We aim to produce 20,000 devices with our first run, but have the ability to launch a smaller production if necessary.

 

Risks & Challenges

After years of effort in making X-Bite a reality, we've encountered many challenges. Navigating the legalities of both patenting and trademarking a technology has been difficult, but we have accomplished just that.

Our next challenge is getting X-Bite produced in a responsible way that respects our desire to make a high quality, well designed product. Our biggest challenge now is getting a small run produced that passes the regulatory requirements of the FDA. We have found the right manufacturing partners to do just that. Together, we will deliver a great product at a great price and solve a problem we all deal with every summer.  

 

Other ways you can help

We understand that you may not be in a position to contribute funds at this time, but that doesn't mean you can't help us.

We need all the grassroots help we can get in order to spread the word about our campaign, so be sure to follow us and share with your social media friends!

Follow us on:

Facebook

Instagram

Twitter

 

 

Journalists & Bloggers

If you’re a journalist or a blogger and you would like to write about us, please reach out!

We’re more than happy to support your efforts. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours, but sometimes we do get busy so please bear with us.

story:
GET READY TO DIVE

Self Fill - Dive up to 20 minutes - Refill by Hand - Fits in your bag ​

• A special collapsible high pressure hand pump (just like a bicycle pump) can fill the entire tank anywhere you are. A carrying case for the pump is included!

• Turn the valve to 150psi and just breath, an on demand flow of air is then released from the regulator allowing you to dive hands free for 15-20 minutes

•The cross-body bag ensures tight universal and comfortable fitting - just clip it on and dive.

• Simple and ready to go! just take it along with you anywhere and you can Scuba Dive!

 Included in your Dive Portable Lungs Kit: Dive Portable Lungs tank, cross-body bag, 4 stage regulator, 3-Stage 3000psi hand pump with carrying case & a safety and instruction manual.

How to Below

----Release & Liability Purchasing Terms----  

Safety Concerns!

Read the included safety instruction manual before diving.

 Maintain good mental and physical fitness for diving. Avoid being under the influence of alcohol or dangerous drugs when diving. 

 Avoid overexertion while in and underwater. Limit your maximum dive depth to 9 meters/30 feet.

 Breathe properly while diving - never hold in the air you breathe. Diving compressed air can be very dangerous and always a good idea to be certified for your own safety.

Never ascend to the surface without releasing air from your lungs to avoid Over Lung Expansion 

Pulmonary Barotrauma: During rapid ascent the air in the lungs expand, causing lung over expansion and rupture releasing bubbles into the bloodstream.

If you are not a certified diver: Practice in a pool until you get comfortable with breathing underwater "it is a mental training" to avoid underwater panick

Never Dive Alone: safety procedures that are intended to improve divers' chances of avoiding or surviving accidents in or under water by diving in a group of two

 When purchasing the Dive Portable Lungs Kit you understand that you are using it at your own risk.

As an avid adventuring myself, I spend all of my time outdoors in the beautiful Pacific Northwest and now I am never found outdoors without Dive Kit. I can't even put in to words how amazing it is to have a lightweight, portable, and self refill scuba tank to take with me on every, single, adventure. This is why I'm so passionate about making my tank available for all Everyone World Wide

story:
Risks and challenges

Going from concept to reality is always difficult. Many projects fail because of inability to predict supply chain difficulties. To partially mitigate this problem, we have endeavored to create redundant channels in the supply chain. This does not fully eliminate the challenge, but we are confident that we will be able to ship our product on time.

This backpack is made of Bullet Proof Material -- Cuben Fibre, but it doesn't mean this backpack itself is bullet proof.

This backpack is NOT bullet proof.

Please don't try any dangerous way to test this backpack and we are not responsible for any injury or damage caused by misusing this backpack.

story:
Short Summary

There are more than 300 million street lights around the world that cost more than 40 billion dollars to run. These lights release more than 100 million tons of carbon dioxide every year. (Carbon Dioxide is the main cause for Global Warming.) Sadly, still, billions of people do not have access to the power grid and public lights. Free and clean energy is all around us, but we do not have the right infrastructure in place to produce that energy.  We want to change that. And we have an idea on how to do it.

Our company, EngoPlanet is a clean tech startup from New York City. We have developed the World's  First Smart Street Light powered by footsteps and the sun. We combined two clean and free energy sources to provide light and electricity. We have installations in Las Vegas, Philadelphia, Saint Louis and Oman where people are benefiting from these free & clean energy solutions.

So How Does it Work? Kinetic pads are installed near our EnGoPlanet Smart Street Lights, which harvest energy from pedestrians footsteps every time someone steps over them, while specially designed solar panels utilize the energy of the sun.

All power is produced by clean energy, stored into the batteries which provides free and bright lighting during the night . Each EnGoPlanet Smart Street Light also provides a free WiFi connection and a Charging Station for mobile phones.

We want to invite you to join us on this exciting project! By installing EnGoPlanet Smart Street Lights in 10 areas that lack electricity access in Africa, we will help those who live in the dark and disconnected from the rest of the world to light up their roads, get access to WiFi and finally have an option to charge a mobile phone; which will help them to stay connected. (In many areas in Africa they have to pay astronomical fees to charge a mobile phone!).

Support us on this journey and let's together turn the lights ON in areas that need it the most!

What We Need

In order to produce, ship and install EnGoPlanet Smart Street Lights for 10 areas in Africa we need to raise at least $300,000.00. The collected money will be specifically used for the production, shipping and installation of at least 60 units.

In the end of the campaign we will send an email to all our supporters and backers with more information on the 10 areas in Africa where EnGoPlanet Smart Street Lights will be installed. We will tell you more about each place, how people live there and why they need our Smart Street Lights. 

What our backers get?

For each contribution we will send unique perks to our backers. 

Glow In The Dark Wristband

Key Chain with LED and bottle opener

USB Flash 4gb memory

EnGoPlanet T-Shirt

EnGoPlanet Hoodie

Solar Case for Mobile Phone

Portable Solar Charger 

EnGoPlanet Solar BackPack

Platinum Sponsorship: Example (we are not affiliated with Pepsico):

Other Ways You Can Help

There may be some of you who love this idea, but may not be in the position to financially contribute. We'd welcome your help in other ways:

  • Make some noise about our campaign.
  • Share our Indiegogo's page on your social networks. 
  • Share our video.
  • Be an EnGoPlanet's ambassador and ask your employer to consider Corporate option.
 
                                                                Spread a word Share !

We want to invite you to join us on this exciting project! By installing EnGoPlanet Smart Street Lights in 10 areas that lack electricity access in Africa, we will help those who live in the dark and disconnected from the rest of the world to light up their roads, get access to WiFi and finally have an option to charge a mobile phone; which will help them to stay connected. (In many areas in Africa they have to pay astronomical fees to charge a mobile phone!).

Support us on this journey and let's together turn the lights ON in areas that need it the most!

What We Need
In order to produce, ship and install EnGoPlanet Smart Street Lights for 10 areas in Africa we need to raise at least $300,000.00. The collected money will be specifically used for the production, shipping and installation of at least 60 units.
In the end of the campaign we will send an email to all our supporters and backers with more information on the 10 areas in Africa where EnGoPlanet Smart Street Lights will be installed. We will tell you more about each place, how people live there and why they need our Smart Street Lights. 
What our backers get?
For each contribution we will send unique perks to our backers. 
Glow In The Dark Wristband

Key Chain with LED and bottle opener

USB Flash 4gb memory

EnGoPlanet T-Shirt

EnGoPlanet Hoodie

Solar Case for Mobile Phone

Portable Solar Charger 

EnGoPlanet Solar BackPack

Platinum Sponsorship: Example (we are not affiliated with Pepsico):


Other Ways You Can Help
There may be some of you who love this idea, but may not be in the position to financially contribute. We'd welcome your help in other ways:

Make some noise about our campaign.
Share our Indiegogo's page on your social networks. 
Share our video.
Be an EnGoPlanet's ambassador and ask your employer to consider Corporate option.

                                                                 Spread a word Share !

story:
Did you miss the Indiegogo campaign? No worries! You can still order your Blinkers here!

 

Why Blinkers?

The future of mobility is autonomous driving and V2V communication. And in this age of technology, where are the advances that should be making bicycles safer?

Cyclists are the most vulnerable road users: two wheels to balance, no chassis to protect us and no devices to communicate with other vehicles.

As cyclists, we find ourselves in many risky situations while riding in the city: other vehicles don’t respect our space, or don’t understand our intentions, and we feel it’s unfair that cyclists are not seen as a natural part of the road.

We want to improve safety on bikes, by building the next generation of bike lights. It’s not about making them more powerful, but about adding a set of extra safety functionalities, including turning indicators, a brake light and a laser projection.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About Blinkers

Blinkers is the one thing that was missing for cyclists to be safer and to be a natural part of the road. It packs everything you need to be seen, understood and respected by everyone else in the road.

 

More visible

It starts with the regular bike lights that you know: a front white light with 100 lumens power and a rear red light with 30 lumens power.

White headlamp

 

Red rear light
 

More predictable

Blinkers includes turning indicators that allow cars to always know when and a where you are turning.

Front turning indicators

 

Rear turning indicators
 

There is also an accelerometer that measures the motion of the cyclist and triggers the brake light when the cyclist is slowing down. In that way, you let vehicles behind you know when you are braking.

Rear brake light 

 

More respected

A laser semi-circle projected to the ground behind the bicycle makes you even more visible at night and helps other vehicles to understand what is your space in the road.

Laser projection
 

Easy to use

Blinkers are very easy to use. A remote control on the handlebar will allow you to control the turning indicators, switch on and off the laser projection and to switch between the different modes of light.

Remote control

Blinkers comes with a front and a rear mount that you fix onto your bike. Thanks to its magnetic attachment, you only have to plug them in when you hop on your bike, and out when you hop off. Also, Blinkers automatically turns on when you plug them in, so that you can start riding right away.

Automatic switch

You can also recharge the battery with a micro USB cable. On top of that, the battery level will be displayed into the optical screen for 2 seconds after you plug in your cable.

USB rechargeable

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Blinkers utility study: Is Blinkers making me safer?

“Is this really solving a problem?”, “Am I actually going to be safer when I ride my bike?”, “Isn’t this just giving the feeling that I am safer? The risk is still there!”, etc. Those are some of the questions and feedback that we have received from several cyclists since we started with Blinkers. These are fair and serious concerns, and we have taken them very seriously.

To be able answer those questions, at the beginning of 2017 we started working with the Human Factors Engineering Laboratory of ETH (Swiss Institute of Technology) Zürich that specializes in product development, driving simulation, experimental design, photometry, and behavioral sciences.

Together with the Human Factors Engineering lab, we have designed three types of experiments in which we will invite a certain number of participants in order to evaluate the utility of Blinkers:

  • Visibility of direction indicators at various distances and under various traffic situations (daytime, night)
  • Understandability of direction indicators and brake light: will car drivers notice and understand the light signals coming from Blinkers?
  • Laser utility: will car drivers leave more space when overtaking a cyclist with Blinkers’ laser projection?

In mid-March this year, we provided a set of Blinkers for the tests and experiments mentioned above and in May 2017, the HFE lab will deliver a report on the results of the experiments and include conclusions on the utility of Blinkers in view of improved traffic safety.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Technical specifications

Water resistant​​​

Is it raining outside? Snowing? No worries, you can still ride your bike with Blinkers. It is fully water resistant and complies with IP-64 standards of International Protecting Marking.

 

Battery

You don't want to charge your battery everyday? Every two days? Or even every week? No problem! Blinkers has a very powerful battery with a capacity of 3200mAh which will allow you to use it for as long as 2 weeks in a normal usage (2h riding per day). 

Light Power

In dark conditions, cyclists need to see the road ahead, and city light is not always intense enough. Blinkers comes with a front white light having 100 lumens of power output, which will allow cars to see you and you to illuminate the road ahead. 

​​​On the other hand, you want cars to see you from behind. Blinkers' rear red light has 30 lumens of power ouput and when the brake light is triggered, it goes up to 100 lumens.

 

 

 

Dimensions and Weight

Dimensions of Blinkers

Weight of Blinkers

Bike mounts

Front and Rear mounts

Both the rear (either under the saddle or in the rack) and the front mount only have to be fixed once onto the bike.

The front mount can be fixed in any kind of handlebar between 22-31.8mm diameter.

The saddle mount is fixed just right under the saddle, and can be fixed in almost every kind of bike.

Types of saddles

The rack mount can also be fixed in virtually every kind of racks: they often have fastening holes with standard measures at the back for red position lights. We have designed a mount which can be fastened to any of these standard holes with a pair of bolts and nuts.

Rack with standard holes

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our perks

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Where we are and what we need

Blinkers went live for the first time in June last year when we launched a Kickstarter campaign in which we raised +50’000€ from +500 backers. This successful campaign made us realize that Blinkers is something that people and cyclists want because it helps solving a very important problem: cyclist’s safety in the road. Since the completion of that campaign we have been working hard to craft a top quality product in terms of functionality, durability, price and design.

We partnered with Zuhlke Technology Group, a top Swiss Engineering Firm, with vast expertise in Manufacturing and Electronics, and Sapetti, a top design studio, to achieve those goals, and we are currently very close to have a final product: the electronic circuit design is complete (component selection & PCB) and it only needs to be put into production; and the casing and the optics of Blinkers just need some small optimizations, but they are in the last steps of development.

So, as you read, the technical development is almost complete. At the same time, we are also in advanced conversations with manufacturing firms in Europe (mainly Germany and Spain) for the serial production of Blinkers: one that manufactures the tooling for the plastic parts, and another one that can produce the electronic circuit boards and assemble everything together. We have offers on the table, now we have to chose which one is the most suitable for us!

The reason why we are now coming to Indiegogo is very simple: we need more cash to finance the first production batch of Blinkers. Even though last year we raised capital from private investors, hardware development is very complex, cost intensive and requires a lot of upfront investment. The best way to overcome these financial challenges is with pre-orders, and a new crowdfunding campaign is the best option for us. And we believe that Indiegogo will allow us to attract even more backers.

Delivery timeline

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Who are we?

This is Velohub! A team of 5 young engineers and cyclists with the ambition of getting more and more people to hop on their bikes. Thanks to the countless kilometers in our bicycles and our backgrounds in mechanics, electronics and business, we have created Blinkers. But Velohub goes beyond that! Blinkers is only our first product...

Velohub makes smart technology for cyclists. It’s in this last sentence where you can find our three main singularities:

Smart

We build products that match our customer’s lives. Creating nice and smart designs that fit incredibly well on everybody’s bicycle.

Technology

Technology is our passion and our daily subject of discussion, and we want to use it to improve not only cyclists safety, but also their riding experience.

Cyclists

Why driving a car if we can ride a bicycle? Healthy, clean, fast, cheap and quiet. We know what it takes to be a cyclist and we always look for solutions to the problems we have.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Risks and Challenges

Blinkers is in its last steps of product development, so we have eliminated the main risks related to component selection and technical feasibility. Right now, we are preparing and planning the start-of-production by talking with manufacturers. The biggest risks here are lead times and supply chain risks: we are estimating reasonable lead times for manufacturing the tools, assembling the electronics components, and assembling the casing, the circuit board and the optics; but we are also very exposed to manufacturers delays.

story:
Short Summary

My Grandfather came here from Greece for the opportunity to work and live the American dream.   My father, the oldest of six, kept Greek traditions alive, by hosting big Orthodox Easter feasts.  I want to travel to the old country in search of traditions and flavors.   My love for food is shared with my love for Roller Skating.   I have reached out to the Athens Roller Girls, and Chicks in Bowls Italy. I am very much looking forward to Skating the Blue Enigma Bowl on the Island of Andros in September with a few of my skate sisters.  Roll with me as I explore the Mediterranean Diet, I'll share the wonderful recipes and experiences for creating wellness with flavor.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Hiring an editor $500.00
  • Hire the  artist to create the cover $500.00
  • Plane ticket SFO to Paris, Return Flight  Athens back to SFO~ $800 - $1200.00 round trip
  • Train and transfers 205.00
  • Ferry to Athens 30.00
  • Rooms for 14 Nights 80.00 $1120.00
  • Food 30@14 $420.00
  • Cost to print book TBD
  • Food Cost, Container and labor $10.00 per qt
  • Art work for T-shirt and graphic artist to screen 500.00

The Impact

I am a seasoned chef and Roller Skater.   I am in search of traditions and flavors that I will bring back to our community to create wellness with flavor. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Traveling in a foreign country

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Donate a Mediterranean Recipe from your family or simply use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
ENGLISH 

------------- 

ESPAÑOL



_________________________________________________________________________

ENGLISH

_________________________________________________________________________


First of all... give us a "like" in our Facebook site:


https://www.facebook.com/Saúl-Demonio-233040980418562/


And now here is...


A brief explanation just for you ; )


 

Once upon a time Saúl decided to become an artist...

He went to the university and studied performing arts. But he combined it with social sciences! D : This mix imploded in his head and made a mess.

One day he said: 


"Oh, I need to do something for the world!...

But I'm just an artist.

What can I do?"


So he decided to move on... and go further of what art actually is (at least for him). He left his home


... and this is what he decided to do:


- 1 -

Take "ART out of ART"

and keep the

ARTISTIC EXPERIENCE

The premise is art as a tool for social change and the artist as an active agent of society. Art has an impressive and powerful energy to move people... but its impact is very low because there is always locked in a "hall".

... It is time for the mountain of going to Mohammed.


- 2 -

Lead that experience

to

THE

S-T-R-E-E-T

The street is where it all happens. It is where the society becomes present, exchange ideas and evolves. Streets perform reality.

What if art became real too then?


- 3 - 

Let

COMMUNITIES 

be

ACTIVE AGENTS

In this real-living-theater-out of-theater spectators are called "participants" and this art-out of-art is like a lump of clay. Participants are invited to (must) touch it, play with it, make it their own, bring their part...

... And among all build a collective piece of art.


- 4 -

Build

SHARED EXPERIENCES

and raise

AWARENESS

The power of art lies in the emotions.

How much can you be touched by a piece of art?

Now how much can WE be touched by OUR OWN piece of art?

... And then be moved. That is to raise awareness:


- Move a soul closer to the light -


- 5 -

Turn

AWARENESS

into

ACTION

This is the

"How"

Now we are aware that something must be done by US ... How do we do that?

(The answer:) 

Materializing wishes into actions!



... and then WE will see how WE can...



CHANGE

THE

WORLD




So... What's the money for?

  • Vehicle

The intention is to buy a beautiful van we could modify : )


  • Transfer fees

These are charges that Government makes for transferring a vehicle from an owner to another.


  • Reconditioning

The vehicle must be modified to provide suitable conditions for living and carrying the equipment.


  • Gas for the first stage

This is gonna be the energy for visiting the first communities in the US southern border.


  • Incidentals

When you carry out a project, lots of thing can happen. We must be prepared for it!


Indiegogo, PayPal and bank fees

Well... Financial services that must be paid.



Just a van for traveling?... Or...

The vehicle is not the aim ... it is... the vehicle! We see potential in every tool we use. Achieving this goal, we can evolve to a next stage where we are gonna perform many more activities, such as:


Promotion

of artistic activity in young people and adults as a serious discipline


Exchange

of artistic works in conjunction with communities


Arts festivals

where social integration is promoted


Workshops

to train citizens in the defense of human rights through art


Dissemination

of information about social issues not covered by the mass-media


Investigation and documentation

of the illegitimate Latin American art scene



And what if we don't get all the money? 


That's easy...

we just buy a cheaper van... 



The Impact (PUM!)

 

The main impact is art turned into action and the incalculable power that individual actions have all over the world. The two primary ways are:


1. Bringing out the ARTIST people have INSIDE

We are not bringing art to the people. Our job is to promote the art they have inside and let them know that is not only about beauty. It's about touching your soul and changing the way you feel, think and act.

It's let them know that art can be more than a hobby. It's a powerful tool they have in their hands. It can be leaded toward a cause... toward making a better world.

Also let know to parents that YES! Their children can be artists for living and that possibility must exist in the decision of "what you're gonna when you grow up?".


2. Turning "ART" into "ACT"

Usually, the hardest part is "how to start?"

 "What's your problem?" is an artistic production we play in communities where we ask about the main issues the community is going through.

Then we offer our help to generate action plans in which they - by themselves - can solve their problems step by step. This is done through workshops using techniques such as:

  • Project management
  • "Dragon Dreaming"
  • Popular education
  • Socio-cultural animation
  • Recreation
  • Theatre of the Oppressed

By this way, communities become again in active agents of society at the time that self-management is promoted to fight social welfarism and government dependence.



Our last projects in Chiapas, Mexico



Maestr@ me hiciste artista

Festival artístico rebelde

("Teacher you made me artist" - Artistic rebel festival)

Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas, México

It's been three months that teachers are in strike in the whole Mexican country agains a law reform. Since then, they're camping in public zones and they're not leaving until this reform falls. This festival was organized in the central park of Tuxtla Gutiérrez with teachers, artist and friends of the cause to let them know our support, give them strength and bring an "artistic breeze" to the hot Tuxtlecan summer. 


¿Cuál es su problema?

("What's your problem?)

Festival CompArte por la Humanidad - CIDECI-UniTierra

San Cristóbal de las Casas, Chiapas, México

 A street theatre play in which the people are asked about the main problems of their communities and are called up to resolve them by themselves.



Teacher's camp photo-documentation

San Cristóbal de las Casas, Chiapas, México

Session of photos made at San Cristóbal's teacher's camp that remain is strike against a law reform. The album were shared in social networks and also some of the pics were printed and sold as "Non touristic postal cards" to spread the information internationally in the touristic area.



Other ways you can help...

 

If you feel like an artist... BE AN ARTIST... and let art thrive from your heart...


SHARE SHARE SHARE

SHARE SHARE SHARE

SHARE SHARE SHARE

SHARE SHARE SHARE

THIS BEAUTIFUL PROJECT


And again...

PLEASE

give us a "like":


https://www.facebook.com/Saúl-Demonio-233040980418562/



Hugs,



Saúl Demonio




                                                             



_________________________________________________________________________

ESPAÑOL

_________________________________________________________________________


Primero que nada... danos un "me gusta" en nuestra página de Facebook:


https://www.facebook.com/Saúl-Demonio-233040980418562/


Y ahora te presentamos...


Una breve explicación sólo para vos   ; )

 


 

Un día de tantos - hace mucho tiempo - Saúl decidió convertirse en artista...

Él fue a la universidad y estudió artes dramáticas. Pero lo combinó con ciencias sociales! D : Esta mezcla implosionó en su cabeza e hizo un desastre.

Hasta que un día él dijo: 


"¡Oh, necesito hacer algo por el mundo!... 

Pero soy sólo un artista. 

¿Qué puedo hacer?"


Así que decidió seguir adelante... e ir más allá de lo que el arte es actualmente (al menos para él). Dejó su casa

... y esto es lo que decidió hacer:


- 1 -

Sacar el "ARTE fuera del ARTE"

y mantener la

EXPERIENCIA ARTÍSITCA

La premisa es el arte como herramienta para el cambio social y el/la artista como agente activo de la sociedad. El arte tiene la impresionante y poderosa energía de mover a las personas... pero su impacto es muy bajo porque siempre está encerrado en una "sala".

... Es tiempo de que la montaña vaya a Mahoma.


- 2 -

Llevar

esa

experiencia

a

LA

C-A-L-L-E

En la calle es donde todo pasa. Es donde la sociedad se hace presente, intercambia ideas y evoluciona. Las calles representan la realidad.

¿Qué pasaría si el arte se volviera real también?


- 3 - 
Permitir a las
COMUNIDADES 
ser
AGENTES ACTIVOS

En este teatro-de-la-vida-real-fuera-del-teatro los espectadores son llamados participantes y este arte-fuera-del-arte es como una masa de arcilla. Los participantes son invitados a (deben de) tocarla, jugar con ella, hacerla suya, aportar algo desde sí...

... Y todos de manera conjunta construir una obra colectiva de arte.


- 4 -

Costruir

EXPERIENCIAS CONJUNTAS

y generar

CONCIENCIA

El poder del arte radica en las emociones.

Qué tanto podés ser tocado(a) por una obra de arte?

Ahora qué tanto PODEMOS ser tocados por NUESTRA PROPIA obra de arte?

... Y luego ser movidos. Eso es generar conciencia:


- Mover el alma más cerca de la luz -


- 5 -

Convertir la

CONCIENCIA

en

ACCIÓN

Este es el

"Cómo"

Ahora somos conscientes de que algo debe de ser hecho por NOSOTROS...

¿Cómo hacemos eso?

(La respuesta:) 


¡Materializando

los deseos

en acciones!



... y entonces NOSOTROS veremos cómo NOSOTROS podemos...



CAMBIAR
EL
MUNDO





Entonces... ¿Para qué es el dinero?


  • Vehículo

La intención es comprar un hermoso vehículo que podamos modificar : )


  • Costos de transferencia

Estos son los cargos que el Gobierno hace por transferir un vehículo de una persona a otra.


  • Reacondicionamiento

El vehículo debe ser modificado para proveer las condiciones adecuadas para vivir en él y transportar el equipo.


  • Combustible para la primera etapa

Esta va a ser la energía para visitar las primeras comunidades en la frontera sur de los Estados Unidos.


  • Imprevistos

Cuando se lleva a cabo un proyecto, montones de cosas pueden suceder. 'Debemos de estar preparado para ello!


Honorarios de Indiegogo, PayPal y el banco

Bueno... servicios financieros que deben ser pagados.



¿Sólo una microbús para viajar?... 


O...


El vehículo no es la meta ... es más bien... ¡el vehículo! Nosotros vemos potencial en cada herramienta que utilizamos. Alcanzando este objetivo, podremos evolucionar a un siguiente fase donde realizaremos muchas más actividades, tales como:


Promoción

de la actividad artística en jóvenes y adultos como una disciplina seria


Intercambio

de trabajos artísticos en conjunto con las comunidades


Festivales artísticos

donde la integración social sea promovida


Talleres

para entrenar a los ciudadanos en la defensa

de los derechos humanos a través del arte


Difusión

de información acerca de problemáticas sociales

no cubiertas por los medios masivos


Investigación y documentación

de la escena artística ilegítima latinoamericana



Y qué pasa si no conseguimos todo el dinero?

 

Sencillo... 

compramos una microbús

más barata... 



El impacto (¡PUM!)

 

El principal impacto es "arte convertido en acción" y el incalculable poder que las acciones individuales tienen alrededor del mundo. Las dos vías principales son:


1. Sacar la/el ARTISTA que las artista que las personas llevan DENTRO

Nosotros no llevamos el arte a los pueblos. Nuestro trabajo es promover el arte que las personas tienen adentro y hacerles saber que no es sólo una cuestión de belleza. Trata más bien de tocar el alma y cambiar la manera en que se siente se piensa y se actúa.

Es hacerles saber que el arte puede ser más que un pasatiempo. Es una herramienta poderosa que tienen en sus manos. Puede ser conducido hacia una causa... hacia la creación de un mundo mejor para todos.

También hacer saber a padres y madres que ¡SÍ! Sus hijas e hijos pueden dedicarse al arte y que esa posibilidad debe de existir en la decisión de "¿qué querés ser cuando seás grande?".


2. Convertir "ARTE" en "ACCIÓN"

Generalmente, la parte más difícil es "cómo empezar?"

 "¿Cuál es su problema?" es una producción artística que "jugamos" en comunidades, donde preguntamos acerca de las principales problemáticas que están atravesando.

Luego ofrecemos nuestra ayuda para generar planes de acción en el que éstas - por sí mismas - puedan resolver sus problemas paso a paso. Esto es realizado a través de talleres, usando técnicas tales como:

  • Gestión de proyectos
  • "Dragon Dreaming"
  • Educación popular
  • Animación socio-cultural
  • Recreación
  • Teatro del Oprimido

De esta manera, las comunidades pueden ser agentes activos de la sociedad al mismo tiempo que la autogestión es promovida para combatir el asistencialismo social y la dependencia del gobierno.



Nuestros últimos proyectos en Chiapas, México



Maestr@ me hiciste artista

Festival artístico rebelde

Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas, México

Ya van tres meses de que los maestros y maestras se encuentran en huelga en todo el territorio mexicano en contra de una reforma de ley. Desde entonces, ellos acampan en zonas públicas y no planean irse hasta que esta reforma caiga. Este festival fue organizado en el plantón del parque central de Tuxtla Gutiérrez con educadores, artistas y amigos de la causa para hacerles saber nuestro apoyo, darles fortaleza y brindarles un "respiro" en su ardua y desgastante lucha. 


¿Cuál es su problema?

Festival CompArte por la Humanidad - CIDECI-UniTierra

San Cristóbal de las Casas, Chiapas, México

Un "juego" de teatro callejero en el cual se le pregunta a las personas acerca de los principales problemas de sus comunidades y son invitadas a resolverlos por sí mismas.


Foto-documentación del campamento de maestros

San Cristóbal de las Casas, Chiapas, México

Sesión realizada en el bloqueo de maestros de San Cristóbal de las Casas, quienes mantiene una huelga contra una reforma de ley. El álbum fue compartido en redes sociales y algunas de las fotos fueron impresas y vendidas como "Tarjetas postales no turísticas" para difundir la información internacionalmente en el casco histórico.



Otras maneras en las que podés colaborar...

 

Si te sentís artista... SÉ ARTISTA... y dejá que el arte florezca de tu corazón...

COMPARTÍ COMPARTÍ

COMPARTÍ COMPARTÍ

COMPARTÍ COMPARTÍ

ESTE HERMOSO PROYECTO


Y de nuevo...

danos un "me gusta":


https://www.facebook.com/Saúl-Demonio-233040980418562/



Besos,



Saúl Demonio
story_txt:
ENGLISH ------------- ESPAÑOL_________________________________________________________________________ENGLISH_________________________________________________________________________First of all... give us a "like" in our Facebook site:https://www.facebook.com/Saúl-Demonio-233040980418562/And now here is...A brief explanation just for you ; ) 
Once upon a time Saúl decided to become an artist...
He went to the university and studied performing arts. But he combined it with social sciences! D : This mix imploded in his head and made a mess.
One day he said: 

"Oh, I need to do something for the world!... 
But I'm just an artist. 
What can I do?"

So he decided to move on... and go further of what art actually is (at least for him). He left his home

... and this is what he decided to do:

- 1 -
Take "ART out of ART"
and keep the
ARTISTIC EXPERIENCE


The premise is art as a tool for social change and the artist as an active agent of society. Art has an impressive and powerful energy to move people... but its impact is very low because there is always locked in a "hall".
... It is time for the mountain of going to Mohammed.


- 2 -
Lead that experience
to
THE
S-T-R-E-E-T

The street is where it all happens. It is where the society becomes present, exchange ideas and evolves. Streets perform reality.
What if art became real too then?

- 3 - 
Let
COMMUNITIES 
be
ACTIVE AGENTS



In this real-living-theater-out of-theater spectators are called "participants" and this art-out of-art is like a lump of clay. Participants are invited to (must) touch it, play with it, make it their own, bring their part...
... And among all build a collective piece of art.


- 4 -
Build
SHARED EXPERIENCES
and raise
AWARENESS

The power of art lies in the emotions.
How much can you be touched by a piece of art?
Now how much can WE be touched by OUR OWN piece of art?
... And then be moved. That is to raise awareness:

- Move a soul closer to the light -



- 5 -
Turn
AWARENESS
into
ACTION

This is the
"How"
Now we are aware that something must be done by US ... How do we do that?
(The answer:) 
Materializing wishes into actions!


... and then WE will see how WE can...


CHANGE
THE
WORLD





So... What's the money for?

Vehicle

The intention is to buy a beautiful van we could modify : )

Transfer fees

These are charges that Government makes for transferring a vehicle from an owner to another.

Reconditioning

The vehicle must be modified to provide suitable conditions for living and carrying the equipment.

Gas for the first stage

This is gonna be the energy for visiting the first communities in the US southern border.

Incidentals

When you carry out a project, lots of thing can happen. We must be prepared for it!

Indiegogo, PayPal and bank fees

Well... Financial services that must be paid.


Just a van for traveling?... Or...
The vehicle is not the aim ... it is... the vehicle! We see potential in every tool we use. Achieving this goal, we can evolve to a next stage where we are gonna perform many more activities, such as:

Promotion
of artistic activity in young people and adults as a serious discipline


Exchange
of artistic works in conjunction with communities


Arts festivals
where social integration is promoted

Workshops
to train citizens in the defense of human rights through art


Dissemination
of information about social issues not covered by the mass-media

Investigation and documentation
of the illegitimate Latin American art scene



And what if we don't get all the money? 


That's easy... 
we just buy a cheaper van... 



The Impact (PUM!) The main impact is art turned into action and the incalculable power that individual actions have all over the world. The two primary ways are:

1. Bringing out the ARTIST people have INSIDE

We are not bringing art to the people. Our job is to promote the art they have inside and let them know that is not only about beauty. It's about touching your soul and changing the way you feel, think and act.
It's let them know that art can be more than a hobby. It's a powerful tool they have in their hands. It can be leaded toward a cause... toward making a better world.
Also let know to parents that YES! Their children can be artists for living and that possibility must exist in the decision of "what you're gonna when you grow up?".

2. Turning "ART" into "ACT"

Usually, the hardest part is "how to start?"
 "What's your problem?" is an artistic production we play in communities where we ask about the main issues the community is going through.
Then we offer our help to generate action plans in which they - by themselves - can solve their problems step by step. This is done through workshops using techniques such as:

Project management
"Dragon Dreaming"
Popular education
Socio-cultural animation
Recreation
Theatre of the Oppressed

By this way, communities become again in active agents of society at the time that self-management is promoted to fight social welfarism and government dependence.


Our last projects in Chiapas, Mexico



Maestr@ me hiciste artista
Festival artístico rebelde
("Teacher you made me artist" - Artistic rebel festival)
Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas, México
It's been three months that teachers are in strike in the whole Mexican country agains a law reform. Since then, they're camping in public zones and they're not leaving until this reform falls. This festival was organized in the central park of Tuxtla Gutiérrez with teachers, artist and friends of the cause to let them know our support, give them strength and bring an "artistic breeze" to the hot Tuxtlecan summer. 







¿Cuál es su problema?
("What's your problem?)
Festival CompArte por la Humanidad - CIDECI-UniTierra
San Cristóbal de las Casas, Chiapas, México
 A street theatre play in which the people are asked about the main problems of their communities and are called up to resolve them by themselves.







Teacher's camp photo-documentation
San Cristóbal de las Casas, Chiapas, México
Session of photos made at San Cristóbal's teacher's camp that remain is strike against a law reform. The album were shared in social networks and also some of the pics were printed and sold as "Non touristic postal cards" to spread the information internationally in the touristic area.







Other ways you can help... If you feel like an artist... BE AN ARTIST... and let art thrive from your heart...

SHARE SHARE SHARE
SHARE SHARE SHARE
SHARE SHARE SHARE
SHARE SHARE SHARE
THIS BEAUTIFUL PROJECT

And again...
PLEASE
give us a "like":

https://www.facebook.com/Saúl-Demonio-233040980418562/




Hugs,


Saúl Demonio

story:
Grim Workshop

Grim Workshop creates wearable tool kits designed, produced, and materials sourced in the USA. Our tools are able to be carried without ever taking up space or becoming a hindrance because they are under 1mm thick. we create everything from fishing kits the size of a credit card, to lockpicks that are the same size as a dog tag, Oh yeah , and they are all reusable to boot thanks to our tool retention system. Up next? A full line of 21 tools designed to be the same size as a large zipper pull, roughly the same size as a large paperclip. this means they can fit on a keychain, a zipper pull for a backpack or jacket, or even placed onto a necklace.  Our tools are as diverse as our customers are, so we have everything from suture kits for first aid, to multi wrenches and cutting tools for daily activities.  We want to provide people tools for their lives, regardless of their passions or their backgrounds. Farmers, City Folk, Military, Fishermen or a College Student we've got the tools for the life you lead. At the same size as a large paperclip, these are some of the smallest tool kits the world has ever seen. We want to create tool kits that anyone can carry, without having to keep a 15 pound purse or a 50 pound backpack with them at all times, but still made from tough, quality materialsf.  What you need, Where you need it.

Grim Tool Kits, Though they may be small, they are mighty.

story:
As busy professionals, we often find ourselves with too many items to conveniently carry, especially during business trips of 2 or 3 days when a suitcase is too much and a simple day pack isn’t enough. On top of that, typical backpacks don’t seem to accommodate the essential items we need like chargers, tablets, and laptops.

That’s why we designed OnePack, a super functional backpack for daily essentials, clothing, and mobile devices - the perfect companion for overnights and trips of up to 3 days.

OnePack is a backpack built for modern life. It’s compact, lightweight and designed with specialized compartments for school, business or travel. Its contemporary styling is cool as well as functional, with integrated USB and headphone ports to connect and protect your essential mobile devices. The OnePack is made for active, connected lifestyles and is the perfect all-in-one backpack for daily use.

 

 

Check the unbiased review of OnePack from ashens, an amazing channel featuring comedy videos and gadget reviews, thanks so much for his awesome work！

 
 
 

 

In the lower space, there are pockets to hold your laptop and tablet securely and safely. It’s snug and padded and adds protection in case of bumps and drops.

 

 

The upper space can be opened up 180 degrees, making it easy to organize clothing and other essentials that need easy access.

 

 

Unlike typical backpacks, all your items won’t get lost or disorganized by throwing them into a single compartment. OnePack has 19 specialized compartments to perfectly store everything you need with fast, easy access whenever you need them.

Safety was a very important consideration when we designed OnePack. The secure strap lock gives you convenient security and peace of mind when you are in public places such as cafes or airports.

Perfect Backpack for Everyday Essential & Travel
 
OnePack is a backpack built for modern life. It’s compact, lightweight and designed with specialized compartments for school, business or travel. Its contemporary styling is cool as well as functional, with integrated USB and headphone ports to connect and protect your essential mobile devices. The OnePack is made for active, connected lifestyles and is the perfect all-in-one backpack for daily use.
 
More functional than you can image

In the lower space, there are pockets to hold your laptop and tablet securely and safely. It’s snug and padded and adds protection in case of bumps and drops.
 

 
The upper space can be opened up 180 degrees, making it easy to organize clothing and other essentials that need easy access.
 

 
Unlike typical backpacks, all your items won’t get lost or disorganized by throwing them into a single compartment. OnePack has 19 specialized compartments to perfectly store everything you need with fast, easy access whenever you need them.

 

 
Safety was a very important consideration when we designed OnePack. The secure strap lock gives you convenient security and peace of mind when you are in public places such as cafes or airports.

story:
FreeFlow Ponchos

We love the outdoors, we love being cozy - and based on impromptu market research, 95% of people agree. Which is why we decided to create FreeFlow adventure ponchos. 

Adventure ponchos allow you to minimize time spent compulsively shivering, while maximizing the moments you say YES to jumping into bodies of water. They also eliminate the awkward "Err, let me just go change in my car" moments. 

So what exactly is an adventure poncho?

It’s microfiber towel material (either thick terry or thin chamois styles) sewn into a poncho with sleeves, a hood, and a handy pocket. It dries you quickly and keeps you warm while you hang out by the water. So whether you're headed to the beach, the pool, the river, your local lake or your shower this just might become the only towel you ever need!

And while they aren't necessarily slimming... we will say the sporty-chic look grows on you ;)

**Plus 5% of profits go directly to the River Network, an amazing organization working on the ground(water) level to protect some of our most beautiful & precious natural resources.**

 

Common Uses:

  • Paddleboarding
  • Kayaking
  • Rafting
  • Swimming
  • Hot tubs & hot springs (especially in the winter!)
  • Surfing
  • Triathlons 
  • Cycling
  • Showering at the gym or at home
  • Relaxing on your couch
  • Van life-ing 

Less common, but still totally reasonable uses:

  • Cliff jumping
  • Scuba diving
  • Polar plunges
  • Beach themed parties
  • Roasting marshmallows on a beach 
  • Casual Fridays at the office (assuming you work from home)

Benefits of Supporting Our Campaign

Everyone who supports us through Indiegogo will claim their spot as an early adopter of this sweeping trend, and be one of the first to receive a poncho.

You won’t need to wait long - ponchos are already in production and will be ready for delivery in April 2021. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Know someone who would love an adventure poncho? Tell your friends, your family, or the person standing behind you in line.

Become a FreeFlow ambassador. Send a message to Benjamin@freeflowponchos.com to learn more.

story:
Experience the joy of outdoor cooking with QubeStove, the world’s first rotating pizza oven and stove in one. Designed, engineered and crafted to bring insatiable heat, amazing versatility, with incredible innovation, the QubeStove is a pizza oven in its own category.

QubeStove features a 2-in-1 design to give you more bang for your buck. Easily detach the pizza oven to bring the portable stove on camping trips, BBQ’s at the beach or simply sit around the stove for unbeatable warmth on chilly nights.

 

Perfectly crispy yet tender crust, bubbling tomato sauce and ooey gooey cheese. That’s what you would get with QubeStove. Hidden beneath this dynamically sculpted stainless steel is 565°C of flaming heat, ready to cook a mouth watering pizza in just 90 seconds. Pineapples are optional.

 

QubeStove is more than meets the eye. Designed to be multifunctional, QubeStove features a detachable stove, allowing you to cook in more ways than one. BBQ meats, Stir fry vegetables, or roast some marshmallows, the possibilities are endless.

 

 

 

QubeStove can reach up to 1065°F or 575°C in just 10 minutes, ready to cook amazing meals for your family and friends. Cook a pizza in just 90 seconds, with the perfect amount of chewy crisp, without burning the crust. 

 

QubeStove features a rotating stone in its oven. Get the perfect char on your pizza crust every time. Rotate chickens, steak, bread or veggies to get the perfect roast!

 

 
 
 
QubeStove features foldable legs for easy storage. Designed to be user-friendly and easy to disassemble.
 
  
 

QubeStove is designed with a high-temp ceramic glass window so that users can easily check on the food, without opening the oven.

  

Check the temperature without using an extra infrared thermometer. QubeStove has a thermometer built-in on the surface so you can easily check the temperature.

 

We made QubeStove to let you cook anywhere, anytime. We don’t use any auger or electricity, the basic elements are the ones that we use: gravity and air. Here is how it work.

          

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

At Qstoves, we have been designing and testing QubeStove for nearly a year. We are now ready to launch QubeStove to the world and we are confident in our projected schedule. We expect to start shipping products to our backers by early January 2021. We cannot wait to see all the amazing creations our backers will make using QubeStove!

However, there always will be a chance that something may happen, but we have trusted partners that we’ve worked with for many years, so we’re confident that your QubeStove will be shipped within the projected timeline. If there are any changes in our schedule, we promise to be transparent and inform you as soon as possible. We want to thank you everyone for their support and kind words, thank you for being a part of our Kickstarter journey :)

story:
Zetazs series electric skateboard is a mini electric skateboard which fuses the future and the reality element by Zetazs designer. 

With a fully conceptual look and portable compact body, Zetazs is equipped with a handy flexible controller and safe braking, you can enjoy free shuttle in the city anytime.

 

 NOW Sling Bag is Coming！

Weighing only 4.5kg(9.9lb), Zetazs is incredibly powerful and boasts excellent stamina with a 15km(9.3mi) range. Eye-catching LED lights, together with an innovative and bold aesthetic design will turn heads whenever you ride this skateboard on the street. 

 

Collaborating with a top-level fashion designer and gaining creative inspiration from the science fiction film genre, we overturn traditional old-school skateboard concepts and present this unique board with a metallic texture. Fashionable, smart and fun appearance, coupled with durability and strength, results in a board that seeks to make travel safe and striking to watch.

 

Zetazs supports an extremely easy-to-use remote control. With a single click of a button, the skateboard can be switched from going forward to going backward. What’s more, the full range of traditional skateboard operations, such as braking, accelerating and changing gears can all be controlled by the remote. Starting stability and safe braking allow a beginner who has never ridden a skateboard before to almost immediately ride freely in differing traffic conditions.

 

Differing from a traditional skateboard -which cannot change speed, Zetazs has four modes:  Novice, Standard, Advanced and Pro, which make switching speeds possible. Making this skateboard suitable for beginners, enthusiasts and professional riders. Zetazs is simple to use, efficient, and exhilarating to ride.

 

The high-temperature brushless motor can withstand temperatures reaching hundreds of degrees Celsius. Compared to ordinary E-Skateboards, Zetazs offers a higher level of reliability and it’s built to be more durable. Torsional reaction results in unparalleled transmission efficiency and excellent motor performance, which serves up lots of torque and makes for rapid acceleration right through the speed range. Its excellent ability on steeper grades makes riding on a 25-degree slope as exciting as riding on a level surface.

 

The 18650mh high-quality lithium battery allows the skateboard to go a colossal 15km on one full charge. So, there’s no need to worry about running out of power - you can get on with riding to the max. Our skateboard can hit speeds of up to 25km per hour, giving you the agility and the freedom of the wind.

An intelligent engine cut-out system which prevents over-heating, short circuit, over-current and provides over-charge protection in the skateboard is constantly protecting your motor. If the temperature of the board gets too high, it will automatically start the power-off system to prevent damage occurring.

 

With intelligent sleep technology, Zetazs is able to constantly collect the battery data. When the skateboard is standby, the intelligent sleeping system will automatically switch to sleeping mode, which will greatly save power, prolong the battery life and extend service time.

Another genius feature is that Zetazs is equipped with two USB charging ports, for your convenience. You can charge your laptop, telephone or other mobile devices when the batteries are running low – no more looking for power points on the road. What’s more, your batteries provide 18650mh, meaning that your fashion skateboard doubles up as a handy portable power supply.

Larger diameter solid tires not only look cool, but they give improved wear resistance, better skid prevention, and aid superior control when compared to traditional skateboard tires. They require zero maintenance and enable riding in 20% more places and terrains than you can ride on an ordinary board.

Manufactured with an aviation-quality aluminum alloy frame, Zetazs weighs in at only 4.5kg (9.9lb) which makes it easy to pick up, carry, and store. Its good looks are only rivaled by its strength, agility and cutting-edge design.

All of the electronics and batteries are completely integrated into sealed container making sure it reaches IP54 waterproof grade, so you can safely ride the skateboard on the road where there are 3cm puddles. 

Determined to conceive a fashion skateboard with safe night-riding capabilities, our designers equipped Zetazs with a very cool and practical lighting system. Long life LED technology makes this board a 24-hour prospect by making it easier for you to see the road surface in the dark and be seen clearly by other road users. Dramatic illumination and breathtaking aesthetics combine perfectly to result in a very current and defined riding experience.

In order to make the skateboard easy to carry, whilst never compromising on the quality of reliability, the designers tried their best to make Zetazs thin and lightweight. Aluminum alloy – borrowed straight from the aviation industry, high-quality and durable tires, and the high-capacity battery are all neatly incorporated into 47.5cm(18.7in) of length, in an integrated design that houses the motor and battery container. Advanced electroplating gives Zetazs an attractive appearance. The design allows for the drive system, the energy system, the control system and the power recovery system to mesh perfectly, making the whole skateboard sleek and concise. Although weighing only 4.5kg(9.9lb), its reliability and performance are far better than those of traditional skateboards.

Creative structural design not only means you can ride the Zetazs smoothly and safely at high speeds, a clever melding of sci-fi looks and it’s slim, fashionable appearance clearly displays its reliability, carefully conceived quality and oozes futuristic character.

 

The whole skateboard is guaranteed for one year and can be repaired at local maintenance points, in the unlikely event that there is a problem. If there’s no maintenance point nearby, you can contact customer service and send the board back to the original factory for maintenance or repair. The skateboard is not eligible for our warranty replacement if it is damaged through misuse, abuse or negligence. If your skateboard needs to be repaired or replaced due to misuse, you will be liable to pay for the repairs or replacement.

 
 
 

Everyone harbors a spirit of adventure, but many complex and extreme sports are not accessible to all people. Skateboarding is an extreme sport that is easily accessible to the whole public. Zetazs was based on a traditional longboard. Our aim with this electric skateboard is to improve on the longboard, which can be less accessible and dangerous and difficult to learn on. Zetazs is a simple-to-learn-on design, great for beginners and seasoned pros alike, and it was conceived to be lightweight and portable, strong and practical, beautiful but mean on the streets. Zetazs is a tool for enjoyment and your ticket to fast and easy transport.

Zetazs was designed to take the stress out of the urban maze, and make city traveling a breeze. You can zip through the jams and beat the traffic – there’s no need to worry about ever being late again. Simply travel, look great and enjoy the ride. Our mission with Zetazs was to let more young people experience the thrill of electric skateboards. Our team brought together top software and hardware engineers and fashion designers. Zetazs has been two years in the making, resulting in this trendy remote-control electric skateboard, and we think we achieved our goal to bring you a very different, current and uniquely practical travel experience.

ZETAZS is an industrial design brand focusing on future travel and the joy of living. We specialize in avant-garde design concepts, made real with advanced manufacturing technology. We are committed to making the future concept accessible to all.

ZETAZS was established in Hong Kong in 2016. In the same year, the ZETAZS brand was created and production lines were set up in Guangdong factories in China.

Our foundation is a Hong Kong-funded Industrial Automation Development Company, set up in 1994, which has accumulated profound experience in the development of high-tech industrial and manufacturing systems, establishing a solid foundation for ZETAZS's innovative concept.

1. Is Zetazs waterproof?

It is IP54 and the bottom of the board is completely sealed so you can ride through almost any puddle and light rain.

 
2. The Weight of Zetazs.

The weight of Zetazs is 9.9lbs (4.5kg) and the Zetazs Pro is 12.1Ibs (5.5 kg).

 
3. What is the rider weight limit of Zetazs?

Zetazs can take a maximum of around 264 lbs (120 kg).

 
4. I never ride skateboards before, can I ride it?

Yes, absolutely! For those who are new to electric skateboards, here's something you need to know: electric skateboards are much simpler and easier to ride than ordinary skateboards, typically, beginners with no skateboard experience can learn to ride an electric skateboard within a few hours.

 
5. How to control Zetazs?

The board acceleration and braking are controlled by a wireless handheld remote.

 
6. When do you ship it?

Shipping will begin in July 2019.

 
7. Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we do ship Internationally! If there are any tariff issues and we hope that you can assist us to solve it.

 
8. What's the warranty period?

There will be one year warranty against manufacturing defects.

 
9.How to contact you if I have a question?

If you have any problems with the product, please feel free to email us at zetazs@outlook.com. We will try our best to solve problems.

story:
The Alpha Socks is a 7 in 1 sock designed to meet the expectations of the most rigorous situations. The Alpha Socks provides you with maximum strength, comfort and protection. Manufactured with Alpha CopperX which allows us to make one sock that does it all. The Alpha Socks is a smart blend of 60% merino wool, 20% copper bonded to cotton, 15% poliamida, and 5% elastane.

From trail to asphalt, Alpha socks is perfect for anyone.

The Alpha Socks has 3 cushion zones that users would appreciate cushion the most. These cushion points provide optimal comfort where needed the most. 

Heel Cushion - Protects the upper heel from rubbing and friction against your boots or sneakers. Excessive rubbing can lead to peeled skin, sores and blisters. These can be very painful and uncomfortable.

Arch Cushion - Relieves stress and fatigue over arches. This can cause fatigue throughout the whole feet if not protected properly.

Metatarsal Cushion - Located beneath the foot to help cushion impact.

 

Tri-Flex Zones - Close knit material placed in zones in your sock that stretch the most. These flex zones are built to withstand irregular and harsh stretching. During action sports, hiking, working or a daily wear, your socks will stretch to the motion of your feet. This will lead to wear and literal tear in most socks, in the Alpha Socks, we guarantee strength for 5 years. 

 

 

Alpha Team 6! We are 6 individuals who run Alpha Outdoors. Our office space is currently located in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. We strive to make the ultimate sock for outdoor setting and city setting. From our weekend adventures, to our corporate weekdays, Alpha Socks are always with us.

 

 

ADD ON PERKS (AVAILABLE DURING CHECKOUT)

 

International Backers

Carrier - We ship to most international countries via HK Post, SF Express and FedEx, to ensure the package is delivered to you safely in the shortest amount of time with tracking.

Duties & Taxes - Please be aware that all international shipments are subject to duties and taxes by your government and you are responsible for paying that. All Indiegogo perks will be declared 'gift', however, most countries will still assess a value and in certain cases FedEx will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you later.

story:
The Concept

 

The BoardSwag was dreamt up by a couple of road-tripping Aussie surfers who slept a night in their boardbags to catch the early session at a secluded break. While the surf was mind blowing, the wet, uncomfortable sleep sparked an idea. And the Boardswag was born.

With its inbuilt swag and mattress, BoardSwag makes your surfing adventures more spontaneous!

 

Features 

 

How It Works

On the outside BoardSwag looks like your typical travel cover, on the inside it's so much more. Featuring a top compartment that comfortably holds 3 boards and any other gear you can throw at it, and an additional bottom compartment that unzips to reveal an inflatable swag for you to crawl into at night. 

 

 

The SwagTrek

The SwagTrek is a camper friendly swag that comfortably fits in your carry bag or rucksack.

It comes with a dry lock, waterproof carry bag so you can be sure you have a dry sleep.

Features 

 

 

Dry lock waterproof bag to carry the tent.

 

The BoardSwag tent component can be completely inflated and set up in under a minute, and the pack up is even quicker! We've made the process as simple as possible so you can spend more time in the surf and less time setting up camp.

Watch the video below to see a full run through of the product.

 
The pump up! 40 seconds and you're set for the night
 
 
Boards and accommodation in one

Set up anywhere

Sleep under the stars
story_txt: The Concept The BoardSwag was dreamt up by a couple of road-tripping Aussie surfers who slept a night in their boardbags to catch the early session at a secluded break. While the surf was mind blowing, the wet, uncomfortable sleep sparked an idea. And the Boardswag was born.With its inbuilt swag and mattress, BoardSwag makes your surfing adventures more spontaneous! Features  How It WorksOn the outside BoardSwag looks like your typical travel cover, on the inside it's so much more. Featuring a top compartment that comfortably holds 3 boards and any other gear you can throw at it, and an additional bottom compartment that unzips to reveal an inflatable swag for you to crawl into at night.   The SwagTrekThe SwagTrek is a camper friendly swag that comfortably fits in your carry bag or rucksack.It comes with a dry lock, waterproof carry bag so you can be sure you have a dry sleep.Features   Dry lock waterproof bag to carry the tent. The BoardSwag tent component can be completely inflated and set up in under a minute, and the pack up is even quicker! story:
Short Summary

This Christmas, Team WE Stand. WE Go. will be traveling to rural India to partner with developing communities.  Our work will consist of securing clean water for communities, initiating micro-finance loans for women starting local businesses, and visiting families who are working their way out of poverty. It's work we are honoured to be part of, and excited to learn from. Yet, none of it is possible without your support.

What We Are Seeking & What You Get

We are seeking your support for our India Projects.  In particular, these fundraising efforts will make it possible for us to conduct our work with partner communities in Tamil Nadu, India.   

Everyone who provides funding will get an advanced opportunity to watch the feature video that will be produced to capture our work and adventures in India.  

The Impact

As local and global leaders, the WE Go. Team has won awards for their leadership and community service. They will be creating real change in India by empowering communities to positively change their future.

Your involvement is not only helping to elevate communities in India, but also the leadership capacity of team WE Go.

Other Ways You Can Support

Talk about us.  Tell your friends.  And, show up! Our event is happening in Edmonton in the evening of Dec.4. Tickets are available here.

story:
Kunai

Which is the basic tool you bring with you in every outdoor adventure?  The majority of answers says, a knife!

We interviewed also demanding spearfisher and freedivers, where a simple knife could make the difference between life and death… Or it simply is the only one tool to bring with you and with which you have to cover every need. 

Underwater uses are amazing because all components and materials are stressed to the limit, so if something works underwater it can works everywhere! 

We studied the history of the knife from the Bronze Age to the vanguard projects, studying materials and manufacturing processes but, first of all, the knives way of use.

We explored all the technical solutions developed and adopted in different cultures from the kitchen, to the war, underwater, trekking and in every else outdoor activity.

So we worked on the imaginary of the users, shaping Kunai, the essence of the tool/knife.


Why Kunai?

At the beginning, the kunai was a basic farming tool for gardening, used in Japan during the XVI century.  In that period, when the population was forbidden to have weapons, they adopted their farming tools as weapon, similarly those used by Shaolin monks in China, for self-defence.  

Kunai tools were cheaply produced farming tools, with a useful size and weight and could be easily sharpened: they were readily available to be converted into simple and lethal weapons. 

After four centuries, we re-designed the idea of the basic knife/tool, realizing the Kunai 4.

Kunai 4 is a sturdy, compact, pointed knife, developed to fit a great part of needs you may meet in outdoor activity, included underwater sports, remaining very compact and discrete, but mostly very easy and intuitive to use!  

…and also very cool!


Where is the innovation?

The first time you will grab Kunai in your hand, you will understand everything of this knife and you’ll love it!

Very thin profile, very light and flat, does not need any additional handle to be managed easily and safely. 

Why a so simple and essential design? Because what is lacks is not possible to break!

Would you like to know more?  Go further to read below technical information: 

Materials

After tons of test, we adopted a special stainless steel, able to be sharped as much as carbon-steel alloys but deeply resistant to oxidation and in addiction certified for food contact!

Ergonomics

The special design of the handle, allows to fit the knife in the hollow of your hand very smoothly, giving back the perfect sensation of direction and control of the blade. 

The special anti-skid profile was designed to assure the best grip on the handle, also with thick gloves, avoiding to slip on the sharp blade.

Practicality

Two edges are available, depending what you want to cut: smooth sharpen edge on a side and special serrated to the other one.  The serrated one starts near to the tip and have an efficiency of about 60% more than smooth blade. 




Magnetic sheath

Knife ergonomic is important, but without a good sheath, the use will be very uncomfortable!  So we designed a sturdy and flat sheath in Cordura, with a magnetic retention.

Yes, the special watertight magnet will help you to put away the knife driving the blade directly and easily inside his sheath. 

No mechanical part to maintain, no complex gesture to take off and put away the knife: just grab and pull, just approach the blade and push. 

Two ways to fix it: on you belt or on your arm by elastic belt (sold as optional, not supplied). 



Why we need your support and how you can help this project?

Do you like this project? We too! We’re working hard to bring to life this product and we need your help.

You can help us by pledging and pre-ordering our Kunai knives. Even if you can't afford to help us reach our goal, we would love it if you shared this with your friends and family.


How will the funds be used?

The funds generated in this campaign will be used for the mass production run of the Kunai one's.  We have already been paid for the pre-series production and also for most important components of the tooling machine, in order to verify all the details of the project.

Now we need your pre-orders only to justify our investment to start the mass production. 


What we offer as perks?



What you will find in the box?

·  One awesome Kunai knife

·  One amazing Kunai puller

·  One smart Kunai magnetic sheath

·  One comfortable anti-skid Velcro strap


Legal notice - Warning

Kunai is a knife and could be dangerous!  We advise to store and transport always the knife into their sheath.

The tip has not both sides sharp, it means that Kunai knife is a tool and not a weapon.  However we invite you to bring the knife only in your outdoor and diving adventures, together with the equipment.

Take information about laws of your country, in order to avoid any forbidden or dangerous behaviour.

We claim no responsibility for any injuries arising from the Kunai knifes, the user owns and operates the tool with the full knowledge that the Kunai trademark is not responsible, in anyway whatsoever, for any injuries that may arise from it’s use or ownership.



Risks and challenges

Risk is in everything we do but we've worked hard and carefully to reduce to zero the risks of this operation.

Design team

Our design team, drive by Antonio, is experienced in product development design projects, innovative materials and production lines processes.  So any potential issues that may arise will be easily handled and solved by our team.


Manufacturing

Blades production requests a special skill and tooling machine, more a long time experience in this field.

So we invested time and resources to selected many local manufacturer in order to find the best one to fit the needs of our project, taking care about quality, accuracy and price, in order to assure a 100% made in Italy production.

This means that we will be onsite for tooling manufacture, sampling, production and quality control. We have already worked through to optimise our design with our toolmaker.




Supply chain

Kunai 4 is a steady and simple product, as his production and supply chain.

Kunai 4 has been design to remove as much complexity as possible and to streamline the production process. As result, we have no need for assembly, multiple suppliers, offshore manufacture, foreign communications, etc. 

Kunai 4 is linear, sure, easy.

Distribution

Often the best plans fall against distribution!

We also have experience in logistics and supply chain so we designed Kunai 4 to minimize packing and distribution issues.

Moreover, we have a partnership with the best forwarders, in order to assure you a fast and smooth delivery of your Kuani 4, so you can enjoy your purchase very soon.


About us: Kunai project team

Who we are?

We are a specialized design company founded nearly 10 years ago, by the passion for architecture and industrial design. 

We have followed many companies in Italy and overseas, to develop single products or entire lines, included marketing and communication direction.

For each project we assemble different team, focused on the project needs.

Meet us on Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/Antolas-Design-751300548241864/



FAQ

Do you ship to anywhere?

Yes, global shipping is available BUT we cannot ship in Russia, Ukraine, Brazil and Argentina for customs reasons. Other international orders have to add shipping to the perk cost, please check below. 

What about shipping costs?

·  FREE shipping in Italy

·  Shipping in Europe? Please add 8,00€  (excluded Croatia, Norway, Switzerland and Canaries islands)

·  Shipping in USA, Canada, Croatia, Norway, Switzerland and Canaries islands? Please add 12,00€

·  Shipping in Turkey, Indonesia, Mexico, Emirates, Qatar, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa? Please add 14,00€

·  Shipping in Kazakhstan, Morocco or Israel? Please add 20,00€

·  Shipping in the rest of the world? Please ask for confirmation. 

Is Kunai suitable for food manipulations?

Yes sure! Used stainless steel alloy is the same used for professional cooking knives, more something!

What about maintenance?

Knife stainless steel has a tendency to spot after use in salt water.

All stainless steel knifes need a good rinsing in fresh water after use.

Wipe dry after using and apply a thin coat of silicone oil or paraffin, to prevent surface rusty.

Any surface rust can be easily removed by rubbing with a common eraser for ink or with a cotton cloth soaked in oil.


Forgot something? We are always available to answer your questions!
