story:
Get yours today at www.tallachouse.com

In stock and ready to ship

OUR GOAL

Was to design a bicycle flat tire kit that fits compactly and out of the way so you are always ready when the inevitable flat occurs.

OUR STORY

The Behold is just like the flat tire kit in your car but it’s for your bike. Pack the Kargo bag with your tools, CO2 and a tube (up to 29-inch). Snap the bag in place and you’re set. You’ll be ready when you get a flat.  It fits neatly on your water bottle bosses and has an attachment to mount a water bottle cage on top. Unlike a clanking bloated seat bag it’s completely out of your way on the frame. Attach any water bottle cage if you like.

As a avid bike rider I don't know how many times I got a flat or simply forgot to pack that one tool you really need.

The cages are made in America. We love the Behold and so will you.

Behold gives you 24/7 access to the emergency essentials you know you should always carry. 

To learn a bit more about us and see the other bike accessories we make please visit. TALLACHOUSE


Install Video: 



A better way to carry your emergency essentials

Behold is the world’s first flat repair kit cage. It lets you carry a simple flat repair kit (tools, CO2 cartridge and spare 700cc or 29er tube) on your bike’s frame. Unlike a seat bag it’s completely out of your way. The Behold mounts on your bicycle frame.

Behold attaches to your bike’s water bottle cage mounts (braze-ons). The down tube is the preferred location but some riders like to mount it on their seat tube. 

Need to carry a water bottle? Just attach any water bottle cage on top of the Behold (not included). 

Bags come in two sizes

The Kargo Road Bike Tube Bag fits a 700cc road bike tube and tools. The Kargo Mountain Bike Tube Bag holds a 29-inch (29er) tube and tools.

HEY WHAT CAN I FIT INTO A KARGO BAG?

Here’s what fits (snuggly) in a Kargo bag: The Behold does not include the shown tools.

Hey will my phone fit?

Both bags fit iPhone 4 and iphone 5. It does NOT fit an iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 plus.


We have a ship date of Jan 2017, we are hoping to ship sooner than that. 

Features

  • Mounts to your frame—out of your way will not interfere with muscular legs. Doesn’t rub on your riding shorts and wear them out prematurely. 
  • No more rattles over rough terrain. 
  • Attaches using two screws, not velcro straps. There’s nothing to come loose and rip your riding shorts. 
  • No ugly wear to the finish of your seat post or frame. 
  • Kargo bags don’t spill their guts Kargo bags don’t come open on the trail and dump your contents out. 
  • Carries only what you need to fix a flat no extra bulk or weight. Bags are sized to hold items snuggly which helps eliminate rattles. 
  • Kargo bags work in all of our carrying systems. 
  • Buying an extra cage lets you use one bag with two bikes. 
  • For example, use the larger Kargo Mountain bag for long rides and the smaller Kargo Road bag for short hops around town. 
  • Behold works with any water bottle cage 
  • Note: Screws that come with Behold are the right length for King Cage Lezyne water bottle cages. Your water bottle cage may require different length screws. 
  • Low profile button snaps. 
  • Large zipper pull for gloved hands keep your gloves on. 

Kargo bags are easily detached to prevent theft and the bags can fit easily into your jersey pocket. No logos on our products less environmental waste. With one less ad your bike will look even better. Adds extra space on your bike by taking advantage of the previously unused space under your water bottle cage. Always knowing where your tools are eliminates potential time wasted digging through your panniers. 

The Behold cage comes from Chicago. We are happy to meet the needs of a small group of discerning cyclists that demand quality. Enjoy the freedom of riding without a seat bag plus it looks better. As one rider said, “it just looks cool.”

FIT & INSTALLATION

Will Behold fit my bike?

If your bike’s frame is small, or if you own a mountain bike with a triangle of tubes at extreme angles, we recommend you print out the Behold Fit Guide Download: Behold Fit Guide. It’s a 1:1 scale version of the Behold you can use to be sure your frame has enough space.

Using Behold with a second water bottle cage

Installing the Behold raises your water bottle up slightly from the down tube of your frame. This decreases the clearance space between the two cages. Use the Behold Fit Guide (below) to confirm your frame still has enough space.

Using the Behold Fit Guide to check clearance space

Download and print out the Fit Guide. Follow the instructions to be sure your frame has enough space.

Down tube installation (recommended): Face your frame with the front tire of your bike to your right (as shown in the photo above). Seat tube installation: Face your frame with the front tire on your left.

Download: Behold Fit Guide (PDF - 66 KB) Fit Guide how to use.

Email allen@tallachouse.com if you have any fit questions. We are glad to help.

Installing Behold

To install Behold, follow the step-by-step installation instructions that come with the Behold cage.

Download: Behold Installation Guide (PDF - 233 KB)

Attaching a water bottle cage to your Behold

Please note: screws that come with the Behold are the correct length (8mm) for King Cage water bottle cages. You may need to purchase different length screws for your particular water bottle cage, most likely 6mm or 10mm long, but it’s impossible for us to say. Try to use the supplied screws first.

Probably the best place to purchase screws is at your local Ace Hardware store. Online, you can order screws (in multiple quantities) at McMaster-Carr. We recommend 18-8 stainless steel button head cap screws (M5—Pitch: 0.8 mm).

Specs

Weights Typical :

  • Behold with 7.5-inch Kargo Road Bike Tube Bag 5.0 ounces
  • Behold with 9.5-inch Kargo Mountain Bike Tube Bag 5.2 ounces
  • Behold Flat Repair Kit Cage (cage only) 3.8 ounces
  • 7.5-inch Kargo Road Bike Tube Bag (bag only) 1.2 ounces
  • 9.5-inch Kargo Mountain Bike Tube Bag (bag only) 1.4 ounces
  • Product weights provided are typical. Bags can vary by a few grams.

Volume

  • 7.5-inch Kargo Road Bag 19.5 cubic inches (322 cubic centimeters)
  • 9.5-inch Kargo Mountain Bag 25 cubic inches (408 cubic centimeters)
  • External dimensions
  • 7.5-inch Kargo Road Bag 7.5″ x 3.5″ x 1.0″ (190mm x 88mm x 25.4mm)*
  • 9.5-inch Kargo Road Bag 9.5″ x 3.5″ x 1.0″ (244mm x 88mm x 25.4mm)*
  • Behold Flat Repair Kit Cage 5.16″ x 3.03″ x 1.61″ (131mm x 77mm x 41mm)*
  • *Kargo bag filled to capacity.

Behold Flat Repair Kit Cage

Materials

  • USA Made, Strong, durable 304 stainless steel rod
  • 304 stainless steel mounting plates. 
  • Powered coated Black.
  • Construction Mig welded stainless steel and sheet. 

Handmade in Chicago

Kargo Bags

Materials

  • Ballistic nylon fabric with water resistant coating. It’s strong, puncture resistant, abrasion resistant and long lasting. The fabric is thick and gives the bag structure. It also makes bags look nicer and slide into the Behold cage easier.
  • Nylon thread is used for added strength and durability.

Hardware on bag:

  • An over-sized zipper helps you compress your gear inside the Kargo bag so it fits into the Behold cage snuggly.
  • Large silent zipper pull (easy to use with gloves). This may change to silent pull.
  • Stainless button snaps
  • Construction
  • Back stitching (lock stitching) at all seems is used to prevent unraveling or loosening.
  • Lock stitched to prevent chaining of broken threads.
  • Double stitching on zipper tape adds strength and durability.

BEHOLD REVIEWS:

SKUNKAWOMBAT

The other main thing is that I got the repair kit off the back of the seat. I went with the Tallac Design Behold cage. Originally designed to go under a waterbottle cage on the down tube, I have an extra set of bottle cage bolts on the underside of the down tube, so there it is.

http://skunkawombat.blogspot.com/

COMMUTE BY BIKE:

Once the Behold with the Cage was installed, it felt like it had always been there.

http://www.commutebybike.com/2011/10/05/king-cages-behold-tool-pouch-and-top-cap-cage-mount/

PALE SPRUCE

It allows you to carry your tube and tools on the frame instead of in a seat bag. And it does this without forcing you to choose between the pouch or a water bottle cage. After the Behold Pouch is attached to one of the frame’s water bottle mounts, a water bottle cage fits on top of the cage for the Behold Pouch. 

http://www.palespruce.com/gear-review-king-cage-behold-tool-pouch/

VIDEO: 

http://youtu.be/pvd3WUbozrM

DRUNK CYCLIST

Talking with Allen, the one thing that stood out was how genuinely excited and proud he was of his products. He sewed every bag personally and all of his material is sourced 100% from the good old U. S. of A. That is pretty rare for a small parts producer in the bicycle industry these days. I dig it.

http://drunkcyclist.com/2011/04/01/product-reviewtallac-behold/

ROAD BIKE REVIEW

Allen may not have known it, but he was preaching to the choir. Seat bags have a tendency to shake the heaviest items to the bottom, where they can make a knocking or banging noise against the seatpost (or the hard plastic skeleton of certain bags). Also, the contents can make a racket against each other if they’re not secured or padded.

http://www.roadbikerider.com/product-reviews/accessories/tallac-behold-tool-cage-and-kargo-bag

ADVENTURE CYCLING

Going this route can either replace or complement a saddle bag. One nice thing is that the pouch can quickly be removed from its cage and tossed into your pocket for time away from the bike.

http://www.adventurecycling.org/resources/blog/behold-the-tallac-behold/

TRAVELING TWO 

We like many things about the Behold. It’s well constructed and could be handy if you want a nifty place to store a few essential tools. Because the bag is stored on your frame, it can stay there and you never need to worry about leaving the tools behind.

http://travellingtwo.com/13039

ROAD CC

http://road.cc/content/tech-news/171130-behold-cargo-bag-goes-under-water-bottle-cage

BIKE SNOB NYC: Gets hungry for the Behold

Just like this is the Quesarito of tool carriers: What does everyone have against saddlebags all of a sudden? 

Now I'm oddly hungry for a Quesarito.

http://bikesnobnyc.blogspot.com/search?q=flat+tire+cage

CAPOVELO:

While very few cyclists can boast having their own SAG vehicle to follow them on a ride, the rest of us have to contend with finding somewhere to stash our cycling essentials. 

Alas, putting them all in our jersey pockets, leads to the dreaded pocket sag, while a saddle pack doesn’t look very stylish, and gets lots of wheel spray. And, riding without said essential is risk not worth taking. 

However, there maybe a solution that satisfies both fashion and function for even the most vein of “roadies” – called the Behold flat tire kit.

The Behold easily mounts to any bottle cage mount, and can carry all of the essentials needed to fix a flat tire and then some – in stylish and compact way. 

http://capovelo.com/behold-flat-tire-kit/

LEZYNE is a trademark of Lezyne. Images used by permission.

They do not endorse our products we love using them. 

MOOTS is a trademark of Moots Inc. Images used by permission. They do not endorse our products we love their bikes. 

iPhone is a trademark of Apple inc. 

Music Under License: Just A Little Hope, AGsoundtrax. 

Behold protected by USA patent number: 6,543,660 

About us: 
During our fifteen years of running Tallac Design we have learned a lot about working with factories and bringing new products to market. We have manufactured parts and have done exhaustive testing for performance and durability. We also have established a working relationship with proven manufacturers that gives us full confidence in the quality of the final product.

We have a thorough understanding of tooling, production and supply chain. We watch the process like a hawk and have the experience to understand how to keep it working towards a quality product. The final product you get is one that we will be proud to give you.

The final production samples will go through inspection before they ship. Also, the Tallac House team will be personally shipping each Behold to you.

You can be sure that your Behold will be of the highest quality. We will reply to all emails and keep you posted about each step of the process from tooling, first article and final shipping.


We have completed two other crowdfunded projects with no issues or long delays. www.tallachouse.com
story_txt:
Get yours today at www.tallachouse.com
In stock and ready to shipOUR GOAL
Was to design a bicycle flat tire kit that fits compactly and out of the way so you are always ready when the inevitable flat occurs.Introducing the BeholdOUR STORYThe Behold is just like the flat tire kit in your car but it’s for your bike. Pack the Kargo bag with your tools, CO2 and a tube (up to 29-inch). Snap the bag in place and you’re set. You’ll be ready when you get a flat.  It fits neatly on your water bottle bosses and has an attachment to mount a water bottle cage on top. Unlike a clanking bloated seat bag it’s completely out of your way on the frame. Attach any water bottle cage if you like.As a avid bike rider I don't know how many times I got a flat or simply forgot to pack that one tool you really need.The cages are made in America. We love the Behold and so will you.Behold gives you 24/7 access to the emergency essentials you know you should always carry. To learn a bit more about us and see the other bike accessories we make please visit. TALLACHOUSEInstall Video: Mounts under your current bottle cage.Behold mounted on the down tube.Behold with Kargo Mtn BagBehold with straps mounting locationsClose up of Kargo BagKargo Bag Snaps On / OffBEHOLD FeaturesA better way to carry your emergency essentialsBehold is the world’s first flat repair kit cage. It lets you carry a simple flat repair kit (tools, CO2 cartridge and spare 700cc or 29er tube) on your bike’s frame. Unlike a seat bag it’s completely out of your way. The Behold mounts on your bicycle frame.Behold attaches to your bike’s water bottle cage mounts (braze-ons). The down tube is the preferred location but some riders like to mount it on their seat tube. Need to carry a water bottle? Just attach any water bottle cage on top of the Behold (not included). Bags come in two sizesThe Kargo Road Bike Tube Bag fits a 700cc road bike tube and tools. The Kargo Mountain Bike Tube Bag holds a 29-inch (29er) tube and tools.KARGO BAG SIZES (BACK SIDE VIEW)HEY WHAT CAN I FIT INTO A KARGO BAG?Here’s what fits (snuggly) in a Kargo bag: The Behold does not include the shown tools.Hey will my phone fit?Both bags fit iPhone 4 and iphone 5. It does NOT fit an iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 plus.Road Bag with iphone 5We have a ship date of Jan 2017, we are hoping to ship sooner than that. Features
Mounts to your frame—out of your way will not interfere with muscular legs. Doesn’t rub on your riding shorts and wear them out prematurely. 
No more rattles over rough terrain. 
Attaches using two screws, not velcro straps. There’s nothing to come loose and rip your riding shorts. 
No ugly wear to the finish of your seat post or frame. 
Kargo bags don’t spill their guts Kargo bags don’t come open on the trail and dump your contents out. 
Carries only what you need to fix a flat no extra bulk or weight. Bags are sized to hold items snuggly which helps eliminate rattles. 
Kargo bags work in all of our carrying systems. 
Buying an extra cage lets you use one bag with two bikes. 
For example, use the larger Kargo Mountain bag for long rides and the smaller Kargo Road bag for short hops around town. 
Behold works with any water bottle cage 
Note: Screws that come with Behold are the right length for King Cage Lezyne water bottle cages. Your water bottle cage may require different length screws. 
Low profile button snaps. 
Large zipper pull for gloved hands keep your gloves on. 
Kargo bags are easily detached to prevent theft and the bags can fit easily into your jersey pocket. No logos on our products less environmental waste. With one less ad your bike will look even better. Adds extra space on your bike by taking advantage of the previously unused space under your water bottle cage. Always knowing where your tools are eliminates potential time wasted digging through your panniers. The Behold cage comes from Chicago. We are happy to meet the needs of a small group of discerning cyclists that demand quality. Enjoy the freedom of riding without a seat bag plus it looks better. As one rider said, “it just looks cool.”FIT & INSTALLATIONWill Behold fit my bike?If your bike’s frame is small, or if you own a mountain bike with a triangle of tubes at extreme angles, we recommend you print out the Behold Fit Guide Download: Behold Fit Guide. It’s a 1:1 scale version of the Behold you can use to be sure your frame has enough space.Fit guide how to useUsing Behold with a second water bottle cageInstalling the Behold raises your water bottle up slightly from the down tube of your frame. This decreases the clearance space between the two cages. Use the Behold Fit Guide (below) to confirm your frame still has enough space.Using the Behold Fit Guide to check clearance spaceDownload and print out the Fit Guide. Follow the instructions to be sure your frame has enough space.Down tube installation (recommended): Face your frame with the front tire of your bike to your right (as shown in the photo above). Seat tube installation: Face your frame with the front tire on your left.Download: Behold Fit Guide (PDF - 66 KB) Fit Guide how to use.Email allen@tallachouse.com if you have any fit questions. We are glad to help.Installing BeholdTo install Behold, follow the step-by-step installation instructions that come with the Behold cage.Download: Behold Installation Guide (PDF - 233 KB)Attaching a water bottle cage to your BeholdPlease note: screws that come with the Behold are the correct length (8mm) for King Cage water bottle cages. You may need to purchase different length screws for your particular water bottle cage, most likely 6mm or 10mm long, but it’s impossible for us to say. Try to use the supplied screws first.Probably the best place to purchase screws is at your local Ace Hardware store. Online, you can order screws (in multiple quantities) at McMaster-Carr. We recommend 18-8 stainless steel button head cap screws (M5—Pitch: 0.8 mm).SpecsWeights Typical :
Behold with 7.5-inch Kargo Road Bike Tube Bag 5.0 ounces
Behold with 9.5-inch Kargo Mountain Bike Tube Bag 5.2 ounces
Behold Flat Repair Kit Cage (cage only) 3.8 ounces
7.5-inch Kargo Road Bike Tube Bag (bag only) 1.2 ounces
9.5-inch Kargo Mountain Bike Tube Bag (bag only) 1.4 ounces
Product weights provided are typical. Bags can vary by a few grams.
Volume
7.5-inch Kargo Road Bag 19.5 cubic inches (322 cubic centimeters)
9.5-inch Kargo Mountain Bag 25 cubic inches (408 cubic centimeters)
External dimensions
7.5-inch Kargo Road Bag 7.5″ x 3.5″ x 1.0″ (190mm x 88mm x 25.4mm)*
9.5-inch Kargo Road Bag 9.5″ x 3.5″ x 1.0″ (244mm x 88mm x 25.4mm)*
Behold Flat Repair Kit Cage 5.16″ x 3.03″ x 1.61″ (131mm x 77mm x 41mm)*
*Kargo bag filled to capacity.
Behold Flat Repair Kit CageMaterials
USA Made, Strong, durable 304 stainless steel rod
304 stainless steel mounting plates. 
Powered coated Black.
Construction Mig welded stainless steel and sheet. 
Handmade in ChicagoKargo BagsMaterials
Ballistic nylon fabric with water resistant coating. It’s strong, puncture resistant, abrasion resistant and long lasting. The fabric is thick and gives the bag structure. It also makes bags look nicer and slide into the Behold cage easier.
Nylon thread is used for added strength and durability.
Hardware on bag:
An over-sized zipper helps you compress your gear inside the Kargo bag so it fits into the Behold cage snuggly.
Large silent zipper pull (easy to use with gloves). This may change to silent pull.
Stainless button snaps
Construction
Back stitching (lock stitching) at all seems is used to prevent unraveling or loosening.
Lock stitched to prevent chaining of broken threads.
Double stitching on zipper tape adds strength and durability.
BEHOLD REVIEWS:SKUNKAWOMBATThe other main thing is that I got the repair kit off the back of the seat. I went with the Tallac Design Behold cage. Originally designed to go under a waterbottle cage on the down tube, I have an extra set of bottle cage bolts on the underside of the down tube, so there it is.http://skunkawombat.blogspot.com/COMMUTE BY BIKE:Once the Behold with the Cage was installed, it felt like it had always been there.http://www.commutebybike.com/2011/10/05/king-cages-behold-tool-pouch-and-top-cap-cage-mount/PALE SPRUCEIt allows you to carry your tube and tools on the frame instead of in a seat bag. And it does this without forcing you to choose between the pouch or a water bottle cage. After the Behold Pouch is attached to one of the frame’s water bottle mounts, a water bottle cage fits on top of the cage for the Behold Pouch. http://www.palespruce.com/gear-review-king-cage-behold-tool-pouch/VIDEO: http://youtu.be/pvd3WUbozrMDRUNK CYCLISTTalking with Allen, the one thing that stood out was how genuinely excited and proud he was of his products. He sewed every bag personally and all of his material is sourced 100% from the good old U. S. of A. That is pretty rare for a small parts producer in the bicycle industry these days. I dig it.http://drunkcyclist.com/2011/04/01/product-reviewtallac-behold/ROAD BIKE REVIEWAllen may not have known it, but he was preaching to the choir. Seat bags have a tendency to shake the heaviest items to the bottom, where they can make a knocking or banging noise against the seatpost (or the hard plastic skeleton of certain bags). Also, the contents can make a racket against each other if they’re not secured or padded.http://www.roadbikerider.com/product-reviews/accessories/tallac-behold-tool-cage-and-kargo-bagADVENTURE CYCLINGGoing this route can either replace or complement a saddle bag. One nice thing is that the pouch can quickly be removed from its cage and tossed into your pocket for time away from the bike.http://www.adventurecycling.org/resources/blog/behold-the-tallac-behold/TRAVELING TWO We like many things about the Behold. It’s well constructed and could be handy if you want a nifty place to store a few essential tools. Because the bag is stored on your frame, it can stay there and you never need to worry about leaving the tools behind.http://travellingtwo.com/13039ROAD CChttp://road.cc/content/tech-news/171130-behold-cargo-bag-goes-under-water-bottle-cageBIKE SNOB NYC: Gets hungry for the BeholdJust like this is the Quesarito of tool carriers: What does everyone have against saddlebags all of a sudden? Now I'm oddly hungry for a Quesarito.http://bikesnobnyc.blogspot.com/search?q=flat+tire+cage
CAPOVELO:
While very few cyclists can boast having their own SAG vehicle to follow them on a ride, the rest of us have to contend with finding somewhere to stash our cycling essentials. 
Alas, putting them all in our jersey pockets, leads to the dreaded pocket sag, while a saddle pack doesn’t look very stylish, and gets lots of wheel spray. And, riding without said essential is risk not worth taking. 
However, there maybe a solution that satisfies both fashion and function for even the most vein of “roadies” – called the Behold flat tire kit.
The Behold easily mounts to any bottle cage mount, and can carry all of the essentials needed to fix a flat tire and then some – in stylish and compact way. 
http://capovelo.com/behold-flat-tire-kit/LEZYNE is a trademark of Lezyne. Images used by permission.They do not endorse our products we love using them. 
MOOTS is a trademark of Moots Inc. Images used by permission. They do not endorse our products we love their bikes. 
iPhone is a trademark of Apple inc. 
Music Under License: Just A Little Hope, AGsoundtrax. 
Behold protected by USA patent number: 6,543,660 
About us: During our fifteen years of running Tallac Design we have learned a lot about working with factories and bringing new products to market. We have manufactured parts and have done exhaustive testing for performance and durability. We also have established a working relationship with proven manufacturers that gives us full confidence in the quality of the final product.We have a thorough understanding of tooling, production and supply chain. We watch the process like a hawk and have the experience to understand how to keep it working towards a quality product. The final product you get is one that we will be proud to give you.The final production samples will go through inspection before they ship. Also, the Tallac House team will be personally shipping each Behold to you.You can be sure that your Behold will be of the highest quality. We will reply to all emails and keep you posted about each step of the process from tooling, first article and final shipping.We have completed two other crowdfunded projects with no issues or long delays. www.tallachouse.com

story:
THE ARCHER HOLSTER

___

 

We designed this holster to fit your daily values conveniently, with the comfort and steadiness of a backpack, so you won’t feel the weight on your shoulders.

 

 

We want you to have the greatest experience as we do when using this cool accessory. The holster lets you have everything under your shoulder, so everything is safe and at the same time easily reachable.

 

 

As we told you, this version of the holster, the Archer model, has the coolest feature we created so far, it is in fact what makes this fashion accessory so useful. 

You can wear two different accessories at the same time, one on each side, and you can change between accessories at any time you want!

____________________

 

 

LOCK AND UNLOCK YOUR ACCESSORIES SAFELY AND FAST

___

We use a very efficient and safe system of coupling to our accessories, the Loxx system, which holds up to 150kg, and won't unlock unless you pull de button.

 

To unlock and disengage your accessory, pull the button on the inside of the holster. To put back your accessory on,  just fit in and push until you feel a little click. Make sure it is locked by pulling a little bit.

____________________

 

 

THE ARCHER ALWAYS FITS YOU

___

You can resize the holster to fit you better and be more comfortable by adjusting the strap. If you want your holster to be the equivalent of an XL size, pull the buckle up, if you prefer the equivalent of an S size for a more tight position, pull the buckle down. 
This adjustment is also useful to level the accessories on your side body.

____________________

 

 

CHOOSE BETWEEN THE 10 ACCESSORIES ACCORDING TO YOUR DAILY NEED

___

 

 

 

ACCESSORIE: WORK FOLIO

___

The Work Folio is the perfect accessory for the workaholic, the thinker, the creative.

Always carry your notebook and important documents with you, and don't worry about losing your writing materials. If you urgently need to show something on your notebook to someone, don't bother taking it out of the backpack, just unlock the folio and slide it from the side.

 

Don't let any idea slip from your mind, write it at any time!

 

 

 

ACCESSORIE: SMALL POCKET

___

The Small Pocket is one of our favorites, because of its size and its multi-use.

We think this is the accessory for the minimalist. Or maybe for that person that always carry their pockets full, or even for a night out or a concert. It has the perfect size for the little stuff you always have to keep with you, and we even added a tiny pocket inside for some coins.

Don't judge by the size!

 

 

 

ACCESSORIE: NOTEBOOK CASE

___

The Notebook Case is actually a big case made for the academic.

Although it's called Notebook Case, you can use it for carrying your academic book, paperwork, documents... We wanted to give you the choice to literally use it for your own purpose.

Choose your own destiny!

 

 

 

ACCESSORIE: PHONE POCKET

___

This is the essential accessory, for the ones that never leave the phone at home (everyone).

Have your phone always easily reachable, but right under your shoulder. We, the creators of these accessories, have been using the Phone Case since the beginning, and we've perfected it. The ideal inclination allows you to easily slip the phone in and out, and the padded material protects your phone and keeps it tight. 

Don't ever miss that important call again!

 

 

 

ACCESSORIE: MINI-TABLET POCKET

___

We all know the opportunities a tablet can give us, but it isn't always easy to carry them. With the Tablet Case, on any occasion, you'll be prepared to use your gadget. Read the news in your job breaks, take some digital notes of your thoughts, or just buy some perks online!

It has the same design as the Phone Case, with the padded material so your tablet is always tight and protected, only it doesn't have the same inclination so the weight is well distributed.

Be always prepared!

 

 

 

ACCESSORIE: WHISKEY FLASK CASE

___

We consider the Whiskey Flask Case the most elegant accessory we developed. With this case you can bring your own drinks everywhere and share the good taste of life with others. Wear it at your most special occasions. Don't miss the parties life gives you.

Be responsible but enjoy the journey!

 

 

 

ACCESSORIE: BIG POCKET

___

We designed this bag sized accessory, especially for the traveler, the worker, the undecided.

It is very useful for your bigger days to know you have that bigger pocket. Some days you'll just need extra space. 

If the small it's not enough, this is the one!

 

 

 

ACCESSORIE: WALLET

___

For all the credit cards you have to carry, your ID cards, supermarket cards, and so on. And of course, for all the vintage money. The idea behind this wallet is to carry all of those in a very minimalist, simple and compact way. Be every day prepared to pay your taxi, buy a present, or to offer that romantic dinner.

It's not all about the money... Or is it?

 

 

 

ACCESSORIE: SUNGLASSES POCKET

___

Sunglasses or glasses deserve proper treatment. And that task isn't always an easy one. Made with leather and padded material, this case was designed to be soft, safe and adaptable.

Don't forget to see the perks...!

 

__________

 

The proposal is limited by the following conditions:

Dimension limit: 20cmx20cm 

Thickness limit: 4cm

Weight limit: 2.5kg

*all of them for comfort purposes 

It must be within the sensible budget, and it must preserve the aesthetic of archer holster and harmony of its materials.

We do not discriminate the function of the accessory!

 

Exclusive Perk Designs already proposed:

- paint-brushes case

- surgical materials case

- photometer

 

 

 

 

IRONMONGERY DEVELOPED AND PATENTED BY SCHAEFFERTEC

___

This hardware was the solution for our idea. It makes it really easy for you to change between accessories. Just one pull and one click, with no effort, and it's done, your accessory stays locked and secure. This ironmongery can hold up to 150kg.

 

 

 

ACCESSORIES MEASURES

___

 

OTHER INFORMATION

___

Hicarus developed gear for independent creators, and, Archer is one of the most versatile products we designed and built with the best materials we could possibly have:

       high-quality leather carefully chosen 

        (very smooth now, ten years from now it’s going to look like it belongs to Indiana Jones)

       highly resistant lining

        (a high technologically fabric, developed for autosports)

       hardware/ironmongery capable of holding up to 150kg 

       (Developed and Patented in Germany by Schaeffertec GmbH)

       high-quality elastics 

       (The shoulder as a high percentage of cotton to provide more comfort)

       waterproof 

        (both leather and lining)

       antiperspirant 

        (because of its high technologically fabric, it doesn't stain even in the hottest conditions)

       adaptable size 

        (form S size to Xl size)

       lots and lots of changeable accessories

        (in the most safe, fast and easy way you can imagine)

       warranty for life 

        (if your Archer has a defect, as long as I own Hicarus, I will fix it)

 

The Rise of Hicarus

 

Hi, my name is Hernani D’Almeida, and me and my dad founded Hicarus around the time we started to make machines and equipment for independent cinema.

As the experience grows, also grows the excitement and love for the process of development.

We became quite good at making and building custom gear for independent creators, not only in cinema, but also for journalists, photographers, musicians, vloggers, videographers, and other independent creators with less known activities, like stage people, djs, youtubers…

While developing this gear I always carried my notebook and tablet to save new ideas for equipment and scripts.

Because I work mostly outside of predetermined locations, like most independent creators, I carry my office with me everywhere. And because my work is actually to create solutions for that kind of activity, of course I had a lot of ideas to solve some of those problems. I made a very simple and handmade version for myself. I never thought it would interest anyone else, but my father, who is a very pragmatic man, got interested. I made one for him, and he instantly liked, but to my surprise, a lot of other people started to ask me to make more. That's when I realized I should make a campaign not only to offer a solution that others might need, but also, to get the chance to get Hicarus to a much broader community.

I found out that there were other products similar to my idea, some very pretty, but none offer something that I wanted, that is versatility, to any activity. I knew right away that was a difficult thing to achieve, but I started developing all sorts of ideas to make it possible. This was important for me because I really wanted to use different “terminal” or accessory in the same holster, but it had to be really easy to change, and extremely safe. Just when I thought it would be impossible to do what I wanted, because I didn’t have the resources to properly develop the solution, I found the Germany company that develops the ironmongery that I need. 

From that point forward, it was an intense process of design to make a beautiful, good, practical, cost-efficient product. The design will never end for me, I always want to upgrade, but I achieved a really good version with the help of experts in all the materials and process of manufacturing.

This is what lead to Archer, named after the character Sterling Archer, just cause its cool. I have five other designs for different holster styles, each one named after a character who uses a holster in their fictional activities.

I’m really proud to share all this with this community, and to be able to share this product and my work, and hopefully my future designs and solutions to any creative activity.

But mostly I’m really proud to be able to do this together in a collaborative process like I have always done, with the distinction that you can be on the other side of the world, but I will get you an Archer wherever you are, for whatever your need is.

 

Thank you all very much, 

Hernani D’Almeida.

 

_____

As you can see this is a very personal campaign, because we are still at the very beginning of a painful but amazing process, so we will need to team up with every single one of you, our client and partner, because we need every single one of your feedback and support.

Thank you!

 

 

 

NEXT IDEAS

___

We have dozens of drafts to launch in the future, drafts of more models of holsters, with amazing different designs, drafts of ironmongery with unique features, drafts of so many new accessories!

New ideas will never end, it's all up to you now...

 

 

CONTACTS

___

E-mail: info@hicarus.store

(Don't be shy, any questions feel free to ask)

I made one for him, and he instantly liked, but to my surprise, a lot of other people started to ask me to make more. That's when I realized I should make a campaign not only to offer a solution that others might need, but also, to get the chance to get Hicarus to a much broader community.I found out that there were other products similar to my idea, some very pretty, but none offer something that I wanted, that is versatility, to any activity. I knew right away that was a difficult thing to achieve, but I started developing all sorts of ideas to make it possible. This was important for me because I really wanted to use different “terminal” or accessory in the same holster, but it had to be really easy to change, and extremely safe. Just when I thought it would be impossible to do what I wanted, because I didn’t have the resources to properly develop the solution, I found the Germany company that develops the ironmongery that I need. From that point forward, it was an intense process of design to make a beautiful, good, practical, cost-efficient product. The design will never end for me, I always want to upgrade, but I achieved a really good version with the help of experts in all the materials and process of manufacturing.This is what lead to Archer, named after the character Sterling Archer, just cause its cool. I have five other designs for different holster styles, each one named after a character who uses a holster in their fictional activities.I’m really proud to share all this with this community, and to be able to share this product and my work, and hopefully my future designs and solutions to any creative activity.But mostly I’m really proud to be able to do this together in a collaborative process like I have always done, with the distinction that you can be on the other side of the world, but I will get you an Archer wherever you are, for whatever your need is. Thank you all very much, Hernani D’Almeida. _____As you can see this is a very personal campaign, because we are still at the very beginning of a painful but amazing process, so we will need to team up with every single one of you, our client and partner, because we need every single one of your feedback and support.Thank you!   NEXT IDEAS___We have dozens of drafts to launch in the future, drafts of more models of holsters, with amazing different designs, drafts of ironmongery with unique features, drafts of so many new accessories!New ideas will never end, it's all up to you now...  CONTACTS___E-mail: info@hicarus.store(Don't be shy, any questions feel free to ask)

story:
Our Story 

As husband & wife, we love nothing more than to be outside immersed in nature, discovering new places and adventures. As keen hikers, cyclists, climate activists, and animal lovers, Kiwano is our passion and personal mission to make a difference.

After feeling years of frustration from not being able to plan our own eco-conscious trips away, the lack of information at our fingertips, the greenwashing in the industry and a growing concern for the planet, we knew we had to take action. 

We empower users to do their own eco checks through our awarded leaf system, the Kiwano seal of approval. We provide you with accessible information across water, waste, energy, conservation, housekeeping and more for each property.

Visit more at kiwanohotels.com

You can gain further insight with 'behind the green' to read the stories behind these places, so you can be sure about your choice before you pack your bags. 

Ultimately, we want to be positively influencing both the travellers and hoteliers alike into adopting green practices and revolutionise the travel industry by rendering it sustainable.

What We Need & What You Get

Kiwano was created by the owners of the UK-based successful digital marketing agency Rebixit who invested the equivalent of $50,000 to get the project started. We are now looking to raise an extra $30,000 to further expand the platform and make an even bigger impact. In fact, the funds will be used as follows:

  • 20% Product Development - We will continue to add new features such as:
    • A booking system, to make it easy for you to book your next holidays
    • Better search features, so it is easier and faster for you to find the ideal vacation destination according to your criteria (e.g. price, destination, activities etc.)
    • The launch of the Kiwano membership, giving members points according to their travels, carbon offset and practices. Book your trips via us, post content showing your eco-practices, gain points and redeem them on your next trips!
      • We will also add the Green Bucketlist feature, enabling you to save the eco-friendly places you'd like to visit!
    • We’ll also migrate to a greener and faster server for optimum and carbon-free user experience
       


 

  • 20% Hiring
    • Business development staff to find and enrol more properties - meaning that whether you want to travel locally or internationally, there is always a green option for you
    • Travel consultants to help you book your next stay!
       

 

  • 60% Marketing
    • To further develop our blog with daily interesting and engaging content, so it can become the go-to resource for:
      • Anyone looking for tips on how to travel green as well as wider discussions on general topics about the environment and sustainability
      •  Any property owner who is keen to develop their green practices
    • Invest more online advertising to bring more traffic to the website
      • More visitors to the website => more properties interested to join => more options for you for your next trip
      • More visitors to the website => more properties getting inspired to join the green movement and adopt eco-friendly and sustainable practices
         


 

The Impact

FOR TRAVELLERS
As a traveller you can browse, search, discover eco-conscious properties and book your next trip, all from the Kiwano website. You can do you green checks by reading through the list of eco-practices for each property, assessed across the 8 core criteria: Architecture, Energy, Water, Waste, Food, Guest engagement, Housekeeping, Conservation; and there is also a Kiwano bonus point for any outstanding eco-practice.

FOR HOTELS, LODGES & VILLAS
Kiwano is giving eco-conscious hotels exposure to thousands of travellers browsing online and therefore increasing their brand awareness and number of bookings.

 

Substantial Accomplishments to Date

  • Enrolling on average 4 properties per week
  • 600 website visits per day
  • Nearly 5500 followers on Instagram in 7 months of being live
  • We facilitated the project “Solar Portraits” carried out by Ruben from National Geographic, putting him in touch with all the Kiwano properties that use solar panels
  • Kiwano is partnering with Considerate Hoteliers, a company that helps UK hospitality businesses operate responsibly
  • We plant trees according to the numbers of visits we receive, we have already planted 1!
     

Challenges

The challenges we are conscious of which are is on the roadmap for an even greener experience:

  • Partnering with a company/technology that can enable every traveller to offset their carbon footprint for each flight taken
  • Partnering with a company/technology that is working towards green and eco-friendly means of transport
     

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word, follow us on Instagram, join our mailing list on our website, visit our blog and more importantly, travel green!

story:
In 2015, in the midst of the ongoing economic crisis in Greece, the people of Lesvos extended a helping hand to nearly 600,000 refugees crossing the Aegean to escape war, famine and probable death.   But, although Lesvos has returned to normal for well over a year now, the publicity surrounding the refugee crisis has left the island’s tourism in ruins:  Businesses have been shuttered or are on the brink, thousands are unemployed, and young people are deserting their homes to seek a life on the mainland or abroad.   Yet the island is as ready as ever to welcome visitors as it always did.  So, we need you to help Lesvos recover.  We need you to help us spread the word and bring tourism back to Lesvos.

What happened

In 2015 the world’s attention was riveted on the island of Lesvos, as it suddenly and very literally became the crossroad between Asia Minor and Europe, a beacon of hope for human beings fleeing war and poverty. Setting aside their own burdens, the economic hardship and austerity measures they were already facing, the islanders rose to the occasion to help in any way they could. Without asking for acknowledgement, without taking into consideration how this would affect their own livelihood, without thinking that the help they were about to give would not be returned back to them.  For months, as thousands of refugees landed on its shores, the islanders worked tirelessly, alone, with no government assistance or NGOs on their side.  Unfortunately, they’re now alone yet again, facing a crisis no one seems to pay attention to.

What was the impact

The press has spoken about the islanders’ compassion, sense of duty, their solidarity with the refugees and the hope they gave to thousands. However, the same photos and coverage of its peoples’ courage and self-sacrifice drove tourists away. Tourist arrivals dropped nearly 80%. Businesses dependent on tourism across the vast majority of the island, were forced to close or are barely hanging on.  Thousands ended up unemployed.  Families and entire villages or farms that depended on tourism, were all left without incomes. Without hope.

What is happening now

The refugee waves diminished by mid 2016 and the island returned to normal.  Except that, even though the coastlines and roads are cleaner than they have ever been before, chartered flights are still cancelled to the island, tourist agencies are still not adding Lesvos to their programs and the Greek government and the EU have yet to acknowledge the economic hardship the refugee crisis has spawned and to put in place any measures to aid the affected small businesses and displaced workers. Had this been a natural disaster, such as an earthquake or flood, aid would have been provided immediately from national and international agencies. Unfortunately, nothing happened. The islanders are on their own yet again.

What we are fighting for

The publicity surrounding the refugee crisis and Lesvos’ central role in it has continued to be recycled with every bit of related news.  Lesvos is still mentioned in articles and blog posts distributed worldwide which are describing events associated with the refugee crisis taking place in parts of the world thousands of kilometers away, often causing misconceptions regarding the reality of life on Lesvos today.  We are fighting to win back our livelihoods, to rebuild the tourism industry that’s kept the vast majority of the islanders employed over the years.  We need to amplify our voices, we need to balance the story the world hears.  We need to reach out to travellers and tourists and share our message and bring them back to experience this beautiful island we refer to as The Other Aegean.  The less-travelled, the more authentic, the more welcoming Aegean.  We want to share with them the magic this island has to offer.  The natural beauty, the history and culture, the gastronomy, and most of all, the hospitality.   Lesvos is under the protection of UNESCO.  It is the hidden gem of the Aegean Sea. It is the island of hope and peace.  A place where you discover something new each time you visit. 

Over the last two years numerous NGOs have expended tremendous resources to deal with the plight of the refugees.  We need your help to deal with the plight of the islanders.  We need you to help Lesvos and the islanders whose livelihood depends on tourism. 


Why we are fighting

By raising awareness and asking support for the plight of the islanders, by no means should this ever mean diminishing or disregarding the severity of the plight of the refugees. Indeed they are totally two different predicaments, but they are united and intertwined at the same time. We have witnessed the power of thousands of everyday people uniting to provide whatever help they could in order to address the challenges presented by this unprecedented refugee crisis. We now ask to come together one more time. We ask for the help of everyday people to unite once again, this time to help Lesvos, to help the islanders’ whose future depends on tourism. The people of Lesvos need your help so they can continue to provide help to those that need it most.

What we plan

We aim to raise 50.000$, to help spread our story and amplify our voice.  Our plans include:

  • Boost online presence (travel websites, own site, social media advertising and presence, organic search presence and native advertising) - 25% of the funds
  • Content creation (photo and video shooting, copywriting, visual communication material)  - 20% of the funds
  • Traditional promotion initiatives (print advertising, billboard, trade exhibitions etc) - 35% of the funds
  • Events (arts, music, traditional culture, sports events, etc)

See what we've already done during the last 6 years:

 

What you can do to help…

You can make a contribution.  However small, it matters.

You can spread the word.  Share this campaign with your friends using the Indiegogo sharing tools. Follow us on Facebook and Instagram, like our posts, share them with your friends and colleagues. Check www.theotheraegean.com for more information about Lesvos and be one of the thousands of ambassadors of the island across the world!

You can visit Lesvos.  Experience the magic of The Other Aegean first hand. 

... and what we can do to recognize your contribution.

... and what we give you back

If you decide to join our effort to promote Lesvos island, you will have our love and gratitude! You will also get some gifts offered by The Olivewood House and Molyvos Tourism Association's members. Please check the perks for more details and the following pictures:

All the items above, are offered by The Olivewood House

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to our effort, that doesn't mean that you can't help. Feel free to share this campaign with your friends using the Indiegogo sharing tools. Check www.theotheraegean.com for more information about Lesvos and be one of the thousands of ambassadors of the island! Also, don't forget that Lesvos is waiting for you to visit this wonderful island and to feel its magic!

story:
What is BeasTi? What makes it unique?

 BeasTi is a first of its kind wolf shaped Grade 5 Titanium multi tool. Among all the multi tools available in the market, BeasTi stands out with its beautiful looks. It is crafted out using state of the art practices and best quality raw materials to achieve the desired output. Not only it is beautiful but is also packed with necessary tools which comes in handy to tackle the problems faced in our daily lives. 

 

Why Titanium?

 

Titanium Grade 5 (6Al4V) known for its highest strength-to-weight ratio.  Its 40% stronger and 40% lighter than stainless steel. Ti-6Al-4V is the same material used aerospace industry even in Space X Falcon 9 and  bio-mechanical applications (implants and prostheses). 

Its Highly corrosion-resistant even when exposed to sea water and chlorine. Oceanographers report that titanium immersed for 30 years in saltwater produces no measurable corrosion. This is because Titanium forms a protective oxide film instantly, when it’s exposed to a trace of air or water.

All of these attributes make Titanium an ideal metal of choice.

 

Concept

One can find a lot of multi tools in the market. All of them are made to replace the traditional tool box. Many of these tools are compact and well designed. But there are no tools which are elegant and designed to look like a fashion accessory; a tool which can make a style statement and make people go wow. For the first time, we have designed a tool which not only serves its purpose, but also enhances one’s style quotient. BeasTi is designed with an unique look inspired from a wolf. The use of Grade 5 Titanium not only makes it lightweight and powerful, but also enhances the beauty of the tool.

 

 

Process

Crafting of BeasTi undergoes a three step process.

  • Titanium sheets are cut with a high intensity laser machine.

  • It is then sent to be ground and deburred.

  • Tools undergo finishing process and gets laser engraved. 

  • BeasTi is born.

 

Features 

 

Along with these uses, it can be used for many other purposes and is limited only by your imagination.

 

BeasTi Specifications

 

Size : 85.3 X 54.75mm
Weight : 0.6oz / 16grams
Material : Titanium Grade 5 (6Al4V)
Color : Silver Grey
Tools : Mini Pry | Semi Sharp Convex Blade | Flat screw Driver | Hex Wrench 4,6,7,8,9,10mm | Spoke Wrench | Phillips Screw Driver

 

Please Note:

  • BeasTi tools shown in the video are only titanium prototypes. Its experimented with different bevels, and finishes. When it goes to actual production, it is subjected to superior quality finishing including a finer detailed deburring and a best quality etching. This way, the final outcome will be much superior than the prototypes. Some prototypes seen in the video and pictures were used for reference ,demonstrate functionality and comparing sizes only.
  • In some cases, there may be a small amount of taxes (like import duties) imposed by your home country. Please check with the rules of your country for the same. 

 

Questions/Comments?

If you have any questions about the BeasTi or this campaign, feel free to drop us a quick note in the comments section below or email us directly at: contact@beastitools.com

Please sign up for our Newsletter at: www.beastitools.com to receive updates and offers.

Thank you for your support!

 

Legal Disclaimer:

It is the responsibility of the buyer/owner, to ascertain, and obey, all applicable local, state, federal and international laws in regard to the possession, and/or use, of all BeasTi Products. The owner represents that they, he or she is of legal age and that Beasti products will be used in a lawful manner. BeasTi tools assumes no responsibility for any harm or injury resulting from the sale, trade, use or handling of any Beasti Products..

 

Challenges

We take care of our operations with care. The estimates provided by us are more than sufficient to cater the demands. But we are prone to general risks challenges faced by any organization. There may be a slight delay in our delivery if any unforeseen events occur and it impacts our production.

 

Note for Engraving:

 Few of the perks involves custom engraving on the BeasTi if requested. The following are the limitations of the engraving.

  • Engraving can be done on only one side of the BeasTi
  • The length of the text is limited to ten characters.
  • Characters are limited to English alphabet and Arabic numerals

It is the responsibility of the buyer/owner, to ascertain, and obey, all applicable local, state, federal and international laws in regard to the possession, and/or use, of all BeasTi Products. The owner represents that they, he or she is of legal age and that Beasti products will be used in a lawful manner. BeasTi tools assumes no responsibility for any harm or injury resulting from the sale, trade, use or handling of any Beasti Products..
 

Challenges
We take care of our operations with care. The estimates provided by us are more than sufficient to cater the demands. But we are prone to general risks challenges faced by any organization. There may be a slight delay in our delivery if any unforeseen events occur and it impacts our production.
 
Note for Engraving:
 Few of the perks involves custom engraving on the BeasTi if requested. The following are the limitations of the engraving.

Engraving can be done on only one side of the BeasTi
The length of the text is limited to ten characters.
Characters are limited to English alphabet and Arabic numerals

story:
Short Summary

We are a team of 2 students in Specialized Masters in Business Strategy and Innovation of the Institute of Higher Economic Studies of Paris in France. We complement each other to the extent that we combine Innovation and Specialty Strategy where we excel each. We realize this campaign because this application has a strong potential because of the volume and the frequency of its target and especially the improvement of the conditions of the travelers. Indeed the airlines in case of exeding weight luggage offers astronomical prices while in the same flight there are travelers who not a suitcase or who have room. Also long term jobs can be created at any airport where this application will be used. imagined all these jobs that will help people to have access to work. Finally the concept is magic because it makes money by selling empty spaces which is very attractive for our customers

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

To finance this project, we are asking for $ 50,000, which essentially goes into the development of the application with adequate payment security systems and especially advertising. We are aware that we are tackling a sector where we have in front of us the geniuses of the domain who have more resources but we believe that the concept is reliable and simple.

The Impact

Our project funded by contributors is valuable to the world in the sense that we will improve the conditions of travelers, we will create jobs and we will change habits. We tested our model on facebook by creating a page where a traveler posted his itténéraire and gave the space which he had. In those who wanted to send bills would come into contact with him and those who took the same flight or the same journey. With this success we are certain that better frame this would represent a real revolution

Risks & Challenges

this project, which is so dear to our hearts, carries risks but which represent an asset according to a certain point of view. The difficulty lies here in terms of security. Indeed to entrust these cases to a stranger is sometimes complicated. However to overcome this we will set up a customer rating system. Thus we will be able to determine as and when the credibility of a person. Also we say that it is an asset because to solve the security problem we want to create jobs which will consist of the verification of the materials and goods to transport. That's the beauty of the project.

Other Ways You Can Help

all contributions are welcome in kind as well as in cash. we will be honored that everyone has talked about him to promote the idea. Thanks in advance

story:
Short Summary

As a young successful entrepreneur I had always traveled  But it wan't until I was in my 40s and met a young Colombian photojournalist (while living in Buenos Aires) that I first went backpacking -- to northern Argentina. I was hooked, and it changed my entire life. I've been vagabonding ever since, with a passion to discover new places, cultures and adventures.

17 years later at the age of 60 I've now been living in India for 5 years, where I've taken many motorcycle trips.

With a background in media-entertainment-tech I'll combine that experience and, partnered up with PRCPTION Travel produce the full length documentary RIDE OF YOUR LIFE.   

As you get older (for me it was 50) you sense your own mortality; no longer the invincible version of your youth. But I'm up for the challenge; facing the elements and the limits of my own body and mental fatigue that this trip will present. 

This film is important to me. It is a way to document an adventure most people will never get the opportunity to do. And we'll deliver a well-produced reality show - documentary of value.  

What We Need & What You Get

You contributions and sponsorship will be used for :

  • Additional video and camera equipment.  
  • Drome operator and equipment.
  • Travel expenses to fly my lead cameraman to India.
  • Gear: camping gear, extra parts for the bikes, etc.
  • Jounrney expenses; fuel, home stays, permits etc. 

We'll provide content beginning months before the ride, including training, research, building our ride team, and planning. Then will begin rolling video from the time we leave Bangalore until our return, with continual advanced and behind the scenes video clips, photos, and blog posts to share everything with you, our vicarious passengers and sponsors. 

The Impact

You might ask yourself why you'd want to support such an undertaking. I've always believed that travel cures ignorance, and in this day and age to see people and cultures up close and personal expands ones world view To feel the struggle we endure and overcome, and to see the majesty of the places we're going to go, I believe will bring a slight shift in the viewers perceptions of life and people. I hope so.    

This project will kick start the relaunch of First Drum Films, a company I created in 2002 to facilitate the completion and distribution of The Last Poets, a documentary. It aired on Bravo TV (2003-2006), and exists now in libraries in Sweden and Australia. 

Jordan Urbanovich of PRCPTION Media , an up-and-coming non-profit 'smiling media' company, will be lead camera team and co-producer. 

Risks & Challenges

There is always risk in any venture, and this one is no different. I'm 60, who knows when my time will come.  Hopefully not before I complete this trek and deliver the final cut version of the documentary. However, I'm pretty damn healthy and been so all my life, thus far. So unless I am 6 feet under we will complete the journey, complete the documentary, and deliver a wondrous adventure to you. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't afford to financially contribute, you can still help:  Share this campaign to your constellation of family and friends, via email and/or social media. Help us go viral.

story:
*molimo listajte niž​e za  informacije na hrvatskom jeziku*

 

According to the UN's research, one billion people on Earth doesn't have access to medically safe drinking water. Only 2,5% of water is drinkable.

Almost 10% of all the world's diseases would not even exist if the water supply, sanitary conditions and hygiene were improved and if water resource management was on a higher level. That would, in return, also lower child mortality rates, improve human health and food status in a sustainable way.

 

Plastic is a material that the Earth cannot degrade, which represents a large environmental problem. Huge plastic islands that systematically destroy all wildlife are formed in the oceans, affecting human health as well.

We can recycle plastics the proper way, but we can also simply switch to using glass - the most natural material for water preservation that is also 100% recyclable.

 

Get Freewa glass bottle with an eco felt bag. Both are 100% recyclable.

Download the Freewa App, start mapping free drinking water sources and refilling your Freewa bottle each time you spot one.

If we work together, the dream of everyone in every corner of the Earth having access to free drinking water will very soon turn into reality.

 

...and next time when you are thirsty, just check the map for the nearest water source and fill up your Freewa bottle. 

Download Freewa App for your iPhone or Android: 

 

Choose some of the perk options - whether you are a city type, an adventurer, a businessman or an urban art lover, we have perks to thank you for supporting Freewa.

 

We are the Freewa team: Goran Ladisic, Vedrana Vrabec, Mihaela Ivanec and Marko Rasic.

Marko and Vedrana are Designers and Art Directors with 13 years of experience in interdisciplinary projects and multimedia, and internationally awarded cultural programs. Goran spent years on management positions in large companies. Mihaela is a lawyer with background in tourism and real estate.

What connects us all? Love for the nature, a firm believe that we need to protect this beautiful planet and preserve it for our children, and an idea that every human being has the right to receive the gifts that nature had given us. Like clean water. This is what brought us together and how Freewa project came to life.

 

 

  What does Free Water Project mean?

  What will you use funds for?

Donated funds will be used for producing the very first batch of Freewa glass bottles and eco felt bags, for the development of the App into eco network and monitoring of the quality of the drinking water.

  Why should I support Freewa?

Because it will be your contribution to the Earth, to every generation yet to come!

  Who created Freewa? 

We are Goran, Marko, Mihalea and Vedrana – team from Croatia who want to make a change of world's perspective of free drinking water.

  Where can I buy Freewa bottle?

Freewa bottle is not for sale at the moment, but you can get it in exchange for an Indiegogo donation (take a look at the perks which include Freewa bottle).

  What is the Freewa bottle made of?

Freewa bottle is made of glass, bottle cap is made of BPA and EA free material and it is 100% recyclable, the eco felt bag is made of recycled PET bottles which can be recycled again. 

  Why does Freewa bottle say Thank you?

The most beautiful word you can hear and say to a human being, to nature and to water is thank you and that's why we wrote it in 12 different languages on the first Freewa bottle edition.

  Where are Freewa bottles produced?

Freewa bottle, cap and the bag are all made in Croatia. By manufacturing in Croatia (EU), we are stimulating the local economy and creating jobs. 

  What is the difference between Freewa App and Freewa website water mapping?

There is no much difference – you can see, search or add a water spring with both. Use the one which suits you better in certain situation.

  How does Freewa App work?

With Freewa app you can search for free water sources all over the world. Any water source - drinking fountain or a spring you see, you can add to Freewa app – just enter its location and add a photo of it.

  Is Freewa App free?

Yes, just as the drinking water should be!

  Do I need to have an account to add a new spring to Freewa map?

You don't need to have an account to search for free water locations in the App, but if you would like to add a spring you will need to register.

  How can I download Freewa App?

Freewa App is available for download at Google Play Store for Android and AppStore for iOS users.

  When does Freewa perks' shipping begin?

We will start shipping Freewa perks at the end of November/beginning of December 2017. If production permits, some perks will be sent out even sooner.

  How much is the shipping?

It depends on which country are you from and which perk did you choose. Upon choosing the perk and entering the country you want to send it to, you will be able to see how much would the delivery cost.

  What if my town/city/country doesn't have free drinking water?

Freewa map will show you the nearest free drinking water sources! Even though you don't have the access to free drinking water at the location you live, where ever you travel pay attention to free drinking water sources and add it to the Freewa map. 

  I have a suggestion, offer or a question for Freewa.

Contact us at info@freewa.org

**

 

Mi iz Freewa tima vjerujemo da su sva ljudska bića rođena slobodna. Slobodna da hodaju zemljom, udišu čisti zrak i piju besplatnu, čistu vodu, što također spada u osnovna ljudska prava. Isto tako vjerujemo da je na nama i odgovornost očuvati ta ista prava za generacije koje tek dolaze. To će biti naš doprinos Zemlji. 

Podrži Freewa-u, hrvatski projekt za očuvanje slobodnih izvora pitke vode. Freewa je hrvatski proizvod – web platforma i mobilna aplikacija za mapiranje lokacija s besplatnom pitkom vodom u cijelome svijetu te eko boca za vodu i torbica. 

 

Prema UN-ovim istraživanjima, čak milijarda ljudi na Zemlji nema stalan pristup zdravstveno ispravnoj vodi za piće. Svega 2,5% svih voda zauzima pitka voda. Gotovo 10% svih bolesti na svijetu ne bi niti postojale poboljšanjem opskrbe vodom, sanitarnih uvjeta, higijene i boljim upravljanjem vodnim resursima. To bi i smanjilo smrtnost djece te poboljšalo zdravlje i prehrambeni status na održivi način.

 

Plastika je materijal koji Zemlja ne može razgraditi i predstavlja velik problem za okoliš. U oceanima se stvaraju ogromni plastični otoci koji sustavno uništavaju biljni i životinjski svijet, a time nedvojbeno utječu i na zdravlje ljudi. Možemo reciklirati plastiku na ispravan način, ali možemo je i zamijeniti staklom, koje je najprirodniji materijal za čuvanje vode i 100% reciklirajuće.

 

Freewa staklena boca s torbicom od eko filca. Oboje se mogu 100% reciklirati.

Skini Freewa Aplikaciju, počni označavati slobodne izvore pitke vode i puniti svoju Freewa bocu na njima.

Ako udružimo snage, san o tome da svaki čovjek u svakom kutu planeta ima pristup besplatnoj pitkoj vodi, vrlo brzo može postati stvarnost.

 

Skini Freewa aplikaciju ili otvori mapu na webu, označi lokacije slobodne pitke vode, uploadiraj ih u aplikaciju i učini dostupnima svima.

 

Freewa tim čine Goran Ladišić, Vedrana Vrabec, Mihaela Ivanec and Marko Rašić.

Marko i Vedrana su dizajneri s 13 godina iskustva na interdisciplinarnim i multimedijskim projektima, te međunarodno priznatim kulturnim programima. Goran iz sebe ima godine na menadžerskim pozicijama u velikim hrvatskim kompanijama. Mihaela je pravnik s iskustvom u turizmu i sektoru nekretnina.

što nas spaja? Ljubav prema prirodi, čvrsto uvjerenje da moramo zaštiti ovaj prekrasan planet i sačuvati ga za našu djecu te ideja da svako ljudsko biće ima pravo na darove koje nam je priroda ostavila – poput čiste vode. To su ideje koje su nas spojile i iz kojih se rodio Freewa projekt.

 

 

Za što će se koristiti novčani doprinosi? 

Sredstva koja skupimo kroz kampanju služit će nam za prvu proizvodnju Freewa boca, čepova i torbica, razvoj aplikacije u eko drustvenu mrezu te monitoring ispravnosti pitke vode.

Zašto bih trebao podržati Freewu?

Zato što će tvoja donacija biti doprinos Zemlji i svim generacijama koje dolaze!

Tko je stvorio Freewu?

Mi smo Goran, Marko, Mihaela i Vedrana – ekipa iz Hrvatske koja želi promijeniti percepciju o besplatnoj pitkoj vodi u svijetu!

Gdje mogu kupiti Freewa bocu?

Freewa boca trenutno nije na prodaju, ali je možeš dobiti u zamjenu za određeni iznos donacije (pregledaj naše perkove koji uključuju Freewa bocu).

Od čega je napravljena Freewa boca? 

Freewa boca je staklena, čep ne sadrži BPA i EA tvari te je napravljen od 100% recikliranog materijala, a torbica od recikliranih PET boca i može se opet reciklirati. 

Zašto  na Freewa boci piše Hvala? 

Na prvo izdanje Freewa boce napisali smo hvala na 12 jezika jer to je najljepša riječ koju vodi, prirodi i ljudskom biću možemo reći, ali i čuti

Gdje se proizvode Freewa boce?

Freewa boca, čep i torbica proizvodit će se u Hrvatskoj. Proizvodnjom u Hrvatskoj (EU) potičemo lokalnu ekonomiju i otvaranje novih radnih mjesta.

Koja je razlika između Freewa aplikacije i Freewa internetske stranice za mapiranje izvora? 

Nema puno razlike, funkcije su iste – možeš pregledati, pretražiti ili dodati novi izvor. Koristi onu koja ti više odgovora u određenim situacijama.

Kako funkcionira Freewa aplikacija?

Freewa aplikacija omogućuje ti pregled izvora pitke vode na cijelom svijetu. Bilo koji izvor, pumpu ili česmu koju vidiš – i ti možeš unijeti u Freewa aplikaciju, treba nam samo njena fotografija i lokacija.

Je li Freewa aplikacija besplatna?

Da, baš kao i što pitka voda treba biti!

Moram li imati svoj korisnički račun kako bi mogao dodati novi izvor u Freewa mapu? 

Za pretraživanje Freewa izvora ti ne treba korisnički račun, ali za unos novog izvora potrebna je kratka registracija.

Kako mogu skinuti Freewa aplikaciju?

Freewa aplikaciju možeš skinuti u Google Play trgovini aplikacija ako si Android korisnik ili App trgovini aplikacija ako si iOS korisnik.

Kad počinje dostava Freewa perkova?

Freewa će perkove početi slati krajem studenog odnosno početkom prosinca 2017. Ukoliko bude moguce, neki perkovi će biti distribuirani i ranije.

Kolika je cijena dostave?

Cijena dostave ovisi o željenom perku i destinaciji dostave. Nakon što odabereš perk i zemlju dostave, vidjet ćeš informaciju o cijeni dostave.

Što ako u mom gradu/državi nema besplatne pitke vode?

Freewa će ti pokazati gdje je najbliži izvor pitke vode! Možda trenutno nemaš mogućnost dodati svoj izvor, ali gdje god putovao možeš obratiti pažnju na izvore pitke vode te ih dodati u Freewa aplikaciju.

Imam prijedlog, ponudu ili pitanje za Freewu.

Pišite nam na info@freewa.org
