                                                  AIRSHIP: Micro Intelligence T-shirt                                                                                             AIRSHIP: Micro Intelligence MugBen Berry with the AirShip Endurance V2 VTOL UAV                                              Tuskegee Airman Ben "Flaps" Berry

story:
Our hope is to raise enough funds to go on many adventures in California, all the while creating a memorable experience with you, our supporters!

Intro

Hi, my name is JP and this fella over here on the right is my cousin, Julian, and we're ecstatic you're checking out our page!!! We live in the colorful state of Colorado and recently came across the opportunity to travel to The Golden State. As we were planning for this trip, we pondered how to make this adventure even more memorable, then BAH-BAM, it hit us! How cool would it be to [literally] share pieces of our trip with people from all over this wonderful world?!

When and Where Does the Trip Take Place?

August 15--August 20
From Santa Ana to San Francisco via  the famous Pacific Coast Highway (PCH)

How You Can Help

The goal of our trip is to see new sights, feel new emotions, and of course have fun! Part of that fun comes from us interacting with you! Depending on the perk type you choose, we will be able to send you a little bit of California to you whether that be in the form of a postcard, souvenir, etc. In order for us to accomplish this, the ideal goal for our campaign is $1500.

How Will the Funds Be Used?

What If We Don't Reach Our Goal?

It's okay! At the end of the day, we will be happy if we've gotten to share our trip with even one person. This is an opportunity for us to shake things up, make new friends, and bring some California joy to others! Reward-fulfillment is not contingent on whether or not we reach our goal; we will ensure that you be thanked for your contributions.

Other Ways You Can Help

It goes without saying that we appreciate every dollar you contribute. If you share the same passion for connecting with people through the wonders of travelling, then we'd very much appreciate if you shared our campaign with your friends and family! As the famous travel writer once said, “A journey is best measured in friends, rather than miles.” Thank you very much for your support!

story:
• My name is Steve Hall ... 
  • I am the creator of a little cowboy character on TNN, Hee Haw, Buckmasters, and now on RFD-TV called Shotgun Red.     www.shotgunred.com 
  •  Even though the music business for me is mostly in Nashville Tennessee my heart is in Minnesota!  I love to Ice Fish and Open water fish up north.  I have owned a fish house or 2 and always had to get down on my hands and knees to get water for the minnows, water on the stove, etc.  
  • I thought there has got to be a better way!   
  • In the very beginning I sat down and made a prototype, 
  • I thought it should do way more then dip water... 

  • Then I hired a firm here in Nashville to do all the CAD drawings to make the molds...  They are Tennessee Design Co. Nashville TN. 
  • (See drawings)  

    Then after a lot of searching we paid over $35,000 to get molds made.

    Now we have all the samples here at the shop and they look great....
  • We even put one in the freezer for 24 hours then twisted it... thru it on the floor hard about 10 times... and it did not break and no cracks!

    Now we need your help ....  In a way we are just asking you to pre-order because when you make a pledge of $25.00 we will ship you a $25.00 Skinny Dipper out as soon as we get them in.  The body of the dipper and the yellow ruler that is inside come in two separate pieces so we got an ultrasonic welder to fuse the 2 parts together. That will be done at our shop in Nashville. We will then apply a 10 inch label produced by CRT here in Nashville that has neat photos and graphics. 
  • We wanted to make sure that it was at least designed and assembled here in the USA.   Our boxes and shipping supplies are from ULINE out of Wisconsin .   
  • I can tell you I was pretty upset when we went to get molds done here.  They were about $40,000 more and when I asked the US manufacturer if I could come to there plant and watch part of the mold process he told me there plant was over seas.  I told him if you think I'm going to pay you $40,000 to pick up the phone your nuts.
  •  I made the plastic parts in two separate pieces so they could be designed and assembled here in the USA.  These companies need to work on bringing full manufacturing back to the USA!   We are doing as much design, assembly, and shipping and handling as possible here in Nashville on The Skinny Dipper.
  •  
  • On a lighter note... this has been a ball showing this to everyone. 
  • Here is what I heard!
  • "You can chill your drink ice cold in that chilly water!"
  • "I can wash my hands without hanging over the side of the boat!" 
  • "You could put your rods in there so they don't get broken!"
  • "What a neat way to give your dog a drink out on the lake!"
  •  "Now I can measure my fish without getting poked!"
  • Everybody says.. "I want one as soon as you get them made!
  •  A lady said... "Now I don't have to sit on a bucket when nature calls....
  • just drop my britches to my knees and slide the dipper through... 
  • that thing is a great porta-potty!"  LoL!
So here is the business end of things!
We already did the proto-type work and paid the design company and paid for two molds ... one for the dipper body... and a separate mold for the ruler.
Now we are looking for help from everybody to get the parts made.  
Once we place the order it takes about 60 days to get here ... then we need to ultrasound weld them together and apply labels and box and print shipping labels. 
So we can offer the Skinny Dipper at $25.00 to the public we need to order about $35,000 worth of parts at once.  All we need is $25,00 at a time from 1400 of the nicest folks in the world!  
Of coarse you can opt to pledge in at the $50.00 or $100.00 perk level and we can get there even faster....  
Nobody anywhere makes a product like this and I got a bunch sold already but we can"t do it without YOU!!!
Thanks in advance...
Steve Hall / Inventor of The Skinny Dipper

story:
What You Get:

  • You get our first batch of packs, in plenty of time for all your adventures next year
  • If we reach our full goal, we will include our company's fire starter kit along with each order

Our Story

  • We are a Utah based outdoor company founded by 3 former backpacking guides.
  • All our products are locally sourced and made by hand.
  • The idea for the TRAVERSE compact came to us on a trip through the Teton mountain range, as we wanted a pack to use for smaller day hikes on longer treks that was both comfortable and easy to stow away.
  • You backing our project will not only help this idea become a reality, but many other projects to come!
 

How We Give Back:

  • For every backer that supports us (even $1 donations) we will plant a tree to help support the sustainable use of the outdoors
  • A portion of all the funds we receive help to support our volunteer trail crews who help maintain the outdoor resources we all use

Credit: "G-stockstudio/Shutterstock"

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Even if you can't back us right now, or if you feel that this isn't the product for you, Please take a minute to share our link on social media to help get the word out

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't back us right now, or if you feel that this isn't the product for you, Please take a minute to share our link on social media to help get the word out

story:
The Plot Pod

My name is Marcus Emfinger and I am the founder and inventor of The Plot Pod.  With a degree in Electrical Engineering, I have always been passionate about new ideas that will help people take control of their lives.  With The Plot Pod, even the novice outdoor photographer can discover what is around when no one else is.  Whether it's game in the field, predators in the brush, or the occasional trespasser,  The Plot Pod is there to help get just the right shot at the right angle.  With your help, we can get this idea to market and start helping take control of our outdoor activities again.

At Plot Pod, our goal for this campaign is $50,000.  The majority of the funds will be used to have the molds built to make the product and fund the initial order of Plot Pods.  The remainder will be used to repay a loan that was needed to file the patent.  For our passionate supporters, we are set to offer a tiered perk system.  Some of the perks will include: Plot Pod logo T-shirts, caps, tumblers, and even a Plot Pod itself for those dedicated to the cause.  In the event that we do not reach the campaign goal, the funding will be used to take the process as far as possible.  From there, we will try to secure the remaining funds to make this product a successful launch to the outdoor world.

As an avid outdoor person, I have struggled many times to capture the action as it was taking place in the field.  Many times, as I'm sure many of you have also, I've searched for the perfect spot to mount my trail camera only to find that the game came from another place or direction.  I've wasted countless hours and dollars retrieving SD cards only to find that the image was blurry from windy conditions or the object was too far away.  This is the reason I designed the Plot Pod with it's unique features.  It has gotten rave reviews from the few people that I have shown it to and I know that you will find it fills so many needs of many people.  I have personally used the prototype and am super excited to introduce it to the world.  

In building this product, we have come across many hurdles along the way.  Many of them we have hurdled and are making strides towards an end goal.  Some of these hurdles include materials to use, portability, construction, and even minor details all the way down to types of fasteners and screws.  However, many of these we have overcome and now we have a great design in place and are set to build The Plot Pod.  With your help and support, we are ready to finish manufacturing the product and bring it to market.  We can't wait to see The Plot Pod and it's impact on the game and trail camera market.

We, at The Plot Pod, do understand that not everyone can contribute even though you may want and desire to.  However, everyone can help get the word out and make The Plot Pod campaign a success.  Remember to share with your friends and family using the Indiegogo sharing tools and many other sharing apps from twitter, facebook, instagram, and etc.

 

Thank you, 

The Plot Pod, LLC.

story:
My World, 

My name is Karol Piotrowski. I am an 18, almost 19 year-old male currently living in Brooklyn, New York. I am in college and doing all that I can in order to have a bright future. At the end of High School, I lost a dear friend and as such fell into a deep depression. I didn't understand how to cope with the stress of applying for college, dealing with High School finals and the typical drama that goes on in High School. Add an unsupportive family and friends that didn't understand, and you get someone like me, barely clinging to life. I found happiness through the action sports of parkour and freerunning and through those sports I eventually found myself behind a camera and I started to enjoy life once again. I'm still struggling with depression, but I found that photography is the one thing in this world that makes me feel like life is worth all the hassle. Currently, I shoot with a Canon T5i and with my phone. This campaign is to raise enough money to buy better camera equipment and to fulfill a promise to a dear friend that unfortunately passed away last October. I just want to make people happy, and I feel that through photography, I can put a smile on someone's face from across the world. You, the contributor, would be helping change my life for the better and would be aiding me make art for all to see.

All I need is...

$10,000. I understand that is a large amount of money and that my age is not really in my favor here. I bet a lot of you reading this would think that I'm immature and can't handle such amount of money. However, I have been through more experiences in my almost nineteen years, than the majority of "adults" teaching at my college. Unlike other people my age, I don't do drugs, (not saying that I'm better than anyone, just that I don't have a divided focus, which is what I see most people who take drugs have), and I study my ass off in order to keep my scholarships and stay in school. By donating to this campaign you would be helping me travel to Japan, which has been a dream of mine to visit, from as far back as I can remember. In exchange for your contribution, I will send you several of the pictures I take before I publish them on my online store, as well as personalized pictures, (skip to "Risks and Challenges" if you want to understand what I mean by "personalized"). If you donate enough money, I will ship a poster or canvas print, (whichever you choose). All of the funds for this campaign will go into this trip and into getting me the best camera gear that I can get my hands on.

Why it matters to me and why it should matter to you...

Like I said above, I just want to make people smile. I post my pictures on Facebook, and Instagram, as well as selling several pieces on an online store to help fund my photography and to help put me through college. "Why should I care about this?" Well, if you're reading this then I can safely assume I grabbed your interest and you might want to see exactly what kind of work I can come up with. By donating to this campaign you get to see the pictures before I make them available for everyone else to see, and you will get special access to limited edition prints and the longest/most sincere "thank you" email you have ever gotten in your life. Each email will be personalized in some way to each contributor. I feel like this project is valuable to the world because it will show everyone the power of human kindness. I'm not forcing you to donate, the only reason you should donate to this campaign or any campaign for that matter, is because you genuinely want to. I HAVE actually traveled before, so there's no need to be afraid of me getting hit by the "culture shock" and not doing what I promised to do. I will do all that I can to make this trip incredible and to make the pictures that I take, truly unforgettable, (in a good way, I swear).

Risks & Challenges

I'm not going to sugarcoat it. This is going to be difficult. I am not fluent in the language, I have never been there before, AND it is the furthest I will have ever traveled away from home, (literally, I'm going to the opposite end of the Earth for this project), also I'm doing all of this alone. And frankly, I'm nervous about this. It's an incredible feat but I'm also incredibly excited to get out there and experience the culture and learn all that I can in the span of my visit. I don't know anyone in Japan and as such I'll have to rely either on the kindness of strangers, or by my own wit. I live in New York, so I'm used to fending for myself, (sort of speak), and since both of my parents are from Poland, I'm used to traveling long distances and love to fly. Before I go to Japan, I will create a list of places that I want to see and will ask what do YOU the contributor want to see, so that I can take pictures for all of you that have never gone to Japan and want to go, or at least see what you want to see and not desperately search for that one good picture on google and waste your own time--Let me be your eyes.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you made it down here, Thank you! Seriously, thank you from the bottom of my heart. This is my first campaign and I am not used to doing anything remotely similar to this. If you can't contribute to this project, that's fine. I'll still share some of the pictures, (not all, since some pictures are exclusive to donors only), on my Facebook page; https://www.facebook.com/KarolPPhotography/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel

My Instagram page; https://www.instagram.com/karol_piotrowski/

And on my personal site, which is where you can buy the prints; https://kp.smugmug.com

If you want to check any of the links above, I'll be eternally grateful. Also if you want to share this with your friends, your family, whomever you know that might listen, I'll be overjoyed. One last thing, if you're in Japan or New York and want to get in touch with me prior/during/after the trip, feel free to reach out to me through Facebook or through my email; kpiotrowski11222@gmail.com

Thank you for reading this and have a great day!

My Instagram page; https://www.instagram.com/karol_piotrowski/
And on my personal site, which is where you can buy the prints; https://kp.smugmug.com
If you want to check any of the links above, I'll be eternally grateful. Also if you want to share this with your friends, your family, whomever you know that might listen, I'll be overjoyed. One last thing, if you're in Japan or New York and want to get in touch with me prior/during/after the trip, feel free to reach out to me through Facebook or through my email; kpiotrowski11222@gmail.com
Thank you for reading this and have a great day!

story:
You will never risk to loose your friends! They will be easily traced by you on your Smartphone!

I had this idea when I lost my sweet little dog. Fortunately my little friend was found after a few days but I kept looking for a solution for everyone, for all too many pets that are lost every day. This unfortunately, means that the animals are no longer found. I recently built and tested a magnificent collar adaptable, for the moment, both to dogs and cats  I hope in the future to extend it to all types of animals that can live in our homes.

The collar is made from an elegant leather string containing a GPS locator, a GSM dialer, a micro speaker, a micro microphone and a battery that, for the moment, lasts about 12 months.

The functioning is as follows:

if you lose your pet you can get in touch with the collar. In real time GPS tracker will send, via the GSM card, the exact position of your animal displaying it on a map and also giving you latitude and longitude.

The micro speaker will give you the chance to talk with your animal, that listening to your voice, will calm down.

The micro microphone will allow you to hear ambient noise, any voices of people and even communicate with them.

In addition the sending of the data and all the communications will take place at no cost because the system uses the Internet connection that every phone card today has.

 I hope I can realize it so that our animals can always be found.

Thank you all for your attention

                          

Why Pet Collar?

For the safety of your pet and your tranquility

What is Pet Collar?

Pet Collar allows you to always know where your pet is .

How can I use Pet Collar?

On your Smartphone via an App

Can I localize my pet also using my PC?

Yes, sure, it's easy as using your Smartphone. 

What the App allows me to do?

The App will show you in real time on a map the exact location of your pet.

You can also listen to ambient noise around the animal (always in real time) and talk to him to calm him.
If you hear voices of people you can talk to them and get more information.

How much is the connection with the collar?

Absolutely no cost because every Smartphone has an Internet connection.

story:
THE MILLENNIAL TRAINS PROJECT (MTP) is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization that leads crowd-funded transcontinental train journeys for diverse groups of young innovators (and virtual audiences) to explore America's new frontiers.

To get on board, applicants design a project to advance across the communities where our train stops and then race to be among the first 15 applicants on their selected train journey to reach their $5,000 crowdfunding goal. To learn more about the 2016 journeys click here. The applicant's project is described below.


What this is all about:

As you know, I'm trying to get on one of the 2016 Millennial Trains Project Journeys.  My project is to make financial literacy accessible. I plan on doing this through a crowdsourced blog and educational platform. I got my inspiration from blogs like "The Points Guy" and "One Mile at a Time".

Who I am:

My name is Nalin, I graduated from Northwestern University in the summer of 2014. I've been working at Johnson & Johnson in Singapore since then. Before university, I completed my National Service in the Singapore Police Force. You can get my full story here.

What's inspired me:

My experiences allowed me to meet people from a huge range of backgrounds. One thing that concerned me was that many people lacked basic finance skills. I found this to be true regardless of education or family income.

Don't just take my word for it though. Recently, I did some reading and found that it's not an isolated trend. The Economist found that many countries' residents lack financial literacy. Additionally, they also found a big gender divide when it came to financial literacy. Another publication, the the Nikkei Asian review, found a disparity along countries' incomes. 

This means is that a significant number of people around the world lack basic finance skills. These people may end up making ill informed decisions that could cost them a lot. While some schools do teach a little basic finance, it's rarely enough. I believe that I can work to change that with a crowdsourced blog and platform. My platform would make learning these skills easier and more accessible.

What I want to do about it:

One day, I came across the Millennial Trains Project (MTP). MTP helps young innovators launch projects beneficial to their communities. This gave me the perfect opportunity for me to launch a financial literacy project! 

MTP validated my idea, and accepted my pitch. I now have the opportunity to travel across the United States with talented mentors and innovators. This would not only allow me to learn from my travelling companions, but also from the communities we go through. The end result will be a compelling platform that helps people make more informed financial decisions.

Your contribution here will help me get on the 2016 MTP journey, launch and publicise my project, and most importantly, allow you to be a part of something that will add value to people's lives!

What I Need & What You Get

I need your help to get on the Millennial Trains Project journey in August 2016, I'm now racing to raise $5,000 as one of my final tasks in the selection process.

Important things to note:

  • The first $5,000 I raise will go toward the journey, and the education and publicity it will bring to my project.
  • Anything I raise beyond the first $5,000 will go toward the set up and upkeep of the platform

How will this help people?

  • Present financial literacy concepts in a compelling and easy to understand format
  • Partner with other entities to further educate people - just as travel blogs partner with airlines and credit cards, we can partner with financial entities such as Digit
  • The content will be relevant and beneficial to everyone - from recent graduates, to retirees

Risks & Challenges

Setting up a project like this might be tough because of the time commitment, but, I've built a strong network of friends and family who are willing to offer their support to help me in this endeavour.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Making a contribution here is the best way to help me, but it would also be great if you could:
  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!
  • Send me suggestions on what you'd like to see/what you wish you knew when you first made some big financial decisions
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to let your friends know about this!

*If my campaign is among the first 15 to reach its $5,000 goal, all funds raised will go to MTP, which is a 501(c)3 organization. As such, they will be tax-deductible. These funds help to underwrite the costs of the journey and its associated programming, transportation, and hospitality costs.

story:
Introducing the SMUG e-bike. The most eye-catching, high-performance electric bike you’ll ever see. Forget what you know about dull, boring e-bikes. SMUG is rewriting the rule book.

 

SMUG is designed to stand out. Have you ever seen an e-bike that looks like a vintage American motorcycle? It’s a timeless, classic design, built to last. A laid- back cruiser “bobber” or “Chopper” style so in vogue with motorcycle manufacturers.

Enjoy making people smile? This attention-grabber is the perfect e-bike for you! Within 30 seconds you’ll know why we call our e-bikes “SMUG”

 

Its performance is second to none. Choose from a 750w rear-hub motor for sweat-free cruising, 1,000w for those who like to live in the fast lane, or a whopping 1,500w for you crazy off-roaders, all coupled with top spec hydraulic disk braking and superb front fork suspension.

Fed up with pedalling? A 5-level power-assist gear changer at your fingertips allows you to cruise around while keeping up with the traffic. Or, you can unleash the beast and hit up to 30 mph (1,500w model only) comforted by some radical suspension forks, and protected by serious hydraulic brakes!

 

With SMUG, you’re free to go anywhere. Whether you love inner-city travelling or offroad adventures. Its fat, 3-inch tyres and state-of-the-art suspension make every ride a smooth ride. It’s lightweight and easy to transport. Take it anywhere.

 

 

 

We know that everyone who climbs on to a SMUG e-bike will love it, but especially commuters, people who already ride motorcycles, plus fashionistas.

 

 

 

Dynamic and indisputably unique  frame design capturing the same laid- back cruiser “bobber” or “Chopper” style so in vogue with many motorcycle manufacturers, wonderfully complimented with either 750w rear-hub motor for sweat-free cruising, 1,000w for those who like to live in the fast lane, or a whopping 1,500w for you crazy off-roaders, all coupled with top spec hydraulic disk braking and superb front fork suspension. 

 

 

With a SMUG e-bike, you’re able to go where standard motorbikes are not allowed. SMUG makes traveling through the city fast and efficient. The battery life is perfect for the commute, giving you the ability to cruise comfortably at 20 mph for up to 30 miles. Then, take it offroad for some weekend adventures. You can ride your SMUG e-bike in places you could never take a motorbike, such as parks and cycle paths.

We think what SMUG riders will love most is the looks of envy and admiration they will get as they ride along. The SMUG e-bike is so eye-catching, with its retro ‘chopper’ frame and fat tyres, it will turn heads wherever it goes. What an ego boost! We didn’t call it SMUG for nothing!

 

​

 

 

 

 

The ultimate aim was to create an e-bike that was truly eye-catching without compromising on performance, attracting a huge demographic of consumer/commuters looking to bridge that gap between push-bike and motorcycle, capturing the benefits of both.

Working with a concept bike from a highly regarded manufacturer, we spent two years designing the SMUG e-bike. We wanted to use the power of an electric motor to permit the “foot-forward” design so admired in the motorbike world. Unlike the standard push-bike that needs the rider’s legs to be directly above the pedals, the gentle, almost resistance free pedal action afforded by an electric motor allows you to go faster, look cooler, and feel truly SMUG riding it.

 

 

Was ‘doing up’ old car - couldn’t get the engine part needed - so decided to convert it to an electric car - stumbled upon e-bikes - decided to work on this first.

Set up in 2013, the company finalised its prototyping and testing, ready to launch its first model, the 1,000w CT100 aimed squarely at the USA where such machines are still able to qualify for the vehicle classification “Bicycle”, with ambitions to launch further models in the near future.

The founder is passionate about all electrically-powered transport with a keen eye for high-end design, placing the same on an equal (if not higher) criteria than function/performance. Having finally satisfied himself with his personal machines, it became all too apparent that others also have exactly the same aspiration when it came to their choice, with huge interest shown from an extremely large cross-section of people wanting information on said bikes, many asking what the price would be.

Smug founder, London-based and self-proclaimed fashionista Warren Djanogly, a devoted motorcyclist for many years. He discovered the simpler joys and greater practicalities of e-biking (greater manoeuvrability, minimal running costs, simpler parking storage and transportation), but couldn’t find any e-bikes that he was willing to be seen riding. At least, not at a sensible price.

“It was during the prototyping process of my own design that I stumbled on a fabulous bike being made by a long-established, greatly respected manufacturer, but only as a demonstrator to tempt buyers to its trade stands.

Seeing it as potentially the Holy Grail of smug e-biking, I knew he had to bring it to the world’s attention.”

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SMUG Cycles emanated from the old adage, “if you can’t find what you want, then build it yourself”. In 2008, as avid London-based motorcyclist, I was becoming increasingly disillusioned with the seemingly endless legislation being meted out against motorbikes from both the UK and European authorities.

With the same not applying to e-bikes, I teamed up with pal (and now work colleague) consultant electronics engineer Nick and together with converted a grand old Claude Butler bicycle into a 1000w ebike. The result was an absolutely thrilling machine, but not of the style of motorbike I’ve always favoured.

Development

The next, “decade-long” stage was to create our own for reasons already mentioned, and we found the style we sort in bicycle brands like Electra and Schwinn. Donor bicycle acquired, we set about carving up the frame and engineering a unique, extra-wide “seat post” tube, that could shroud the battery. Many hours metal-working and fettling led to our first product.

The first hurdle

It was taking this to the next level that caused the was the real eye-opener. Basically, we needed to find a factory willing to take on the tooling, moulding and testing required to put the design into production. It soon became apparent that no factory would bear these substantial development costs without solid assurances of large enough orders to facilitate absorbing them.

The resolution

The solution was to find a design of bike already processed that was as near to our own design. That’s when we found what was to become our model CT100. No small design modifications ensued, and a compromise on our unique seat post design gave way to a fabulous product that we are very proud to call SMUG. That pride was in no uncertain terms elevated by the endless comments and smiles from other road users who also find the design wonderfully eye-catching.

Manufacturing & Production

By using a basic design already created by a highly-reputable bicycle manufacturer (interestingly, created as a “show-piece” for their stand at trade shows) placed us in the enviable position of being able to start production any time, and having agreed the minimum order, any volume above that, be it hundreds or thousands, can be handled from their extensive plant facility.

Reaching that “minimum” volume, and after-sales care

Rather than follow the old route of bringing such a product to market, we were also afforded the opportunity to Crowd-Fund in order to gather that volume in pre-orders, albeit at heavily discounted prices, that would not only kick-start the production process, but guarantee our ability to provide a professional after-sales service. This is where we’ve found others to fall down. They rush into production to meet a small demand in the hope that the end-user will be their advertisers, and fail to have enough funds in reserve to provide after-sales care.

Our Commitments

We will not put our prototype into production unless we hit a sales target equal to 150% of the agreed minimum order level we have with the production facility. As said, this is to ensure we can provide the after-sales care. Once this level is reached, we hope to see the first bike roll off the line within 90 days. We will keep our Backers at every stage of our progress. Thus, if there are any unexpected obstacles, you will be the first to know what is happening and what we are doing to eliminate them, but we will try to prevent it. As for Backers you will receive all the behind-the-scenes information about SMUG Cycles. Also, we will post some stories in our accounts in the instagram and Facebook about our progress.

story:
Version française à la suite

Our project

What We Need & What You Get

It all started with our meeting during our Master studies and our common love for pets, nature and ecology. Started as a school project, it soon became a much more ambitious project. But creating a startup while we are still studying with few money in the pocket is complicated and we did not want to let our big ideas and our children’s dream escape us. Nothing is going to stop us because we have YOU who believe in US!

Your support, as precommand or as donation will help us to produce our first product (raw material has to be ordered in big quantities, travel & meeting with supplier and producer etc.)

And you know what? As everything started with a Master project and is still part of it, you could also help us graduate. Isn’t it that great?

In the future, we want to continue developing other fancy and creative products respectful of the environment for pets and pet owners. Let’s impact the world together!

Our Products

HORSEGAN protects the environment reducing the waste of animal leather and other chemical supplies by providing high-quality cork halters for horses and dogcollars. Cork enables the production of ecological halters to save animals, reducing the negative impact we have on the world around us and helping to preserve the planet to make the world a better place.

Horse Halters

 

Dogcollars

About Cork

 

Our Goal

Our project is not only about making a product and sell it but is much more. On the market, you only have the choice between the quality product named “leather” which is a beautiful product but comes from an animal and contributes to its suffering or synthetic material which most of the time contributes to pollution. We want to offer to pet owner who cares about Nature and animal a product that is natural and provide an improvement in the dog comfort as well. Cork is much lighter than Leather and smooth.

Even if you don’t care about buying leather because you think “the animal is already dead for its meat”, just think about mass consumption and that you the only one that could make things change. And more, you will get a trendy product that nobody has!

  • With your help, we could show our professor that we have a great idea and that we are successful entrepreneurs → we will graduate :)
  • You will contribute to make a better world, reducing chemical production and animal suffering.
  • We would be happy to share a picture of your pet with our product on our instagram and facebook, because our pet are stars !

 

Our Team

We are 3 master students studying Entrepreneurship and willing to have an impact in the world. Our project is part of our Master degree but is much more than a school project. It represents a chance for us to realize a dream.

Risks & Challenges

Launching a new product, is a process that takes time and many steps have to be well followed. We are a highly motivated team that is proud of our horse halters and dogs collar but sometimes unforeseen issues can come up and could delay the shipment of our products. As we know how exciting it is to receive a new product by post, it’s essential for us to keep our contributors updated on our last progress or any hiccups.

Interested in learning more about us? Follow us on Facebook or Instagram!

Visit our website for more content, tips & tricks, inspiration, and cute dog and horse pictures.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if some of you, close followers cannot contribute to our project, it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Don’t hesitate to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Don’t forget that there are many Indiegogo share tools!
  • Help us improve our product and tell us what we can do better!
  • Don't hesitate to donate some money to support us, even if it only 1 Euro it always help !

Donate and receive some Give Aways

Our gratitude note: Our team will thank you by sending you a personal picture of us at the end of the crowdfunding campaign. We would be also happy to share on our website a picture of all pets and pet owners who helped us with our campaign (even if you have snake!). Let your imagination take flight, the best picture will also be posted on Instagram!

The Horsegan Stickers: stickers with our brand produced by a printer certified environmental friendly. Be creative and stick them wherever you want to promote your involvement for our project and the values we live up to.

Recycled Bracelet: Néocombine is a french company designing bracelets by using second-hand wetsuits and giving a second life to the neoprene material while following a 100% handcrafted manufacturing process.

Horsegan T-shirt: Here, we give you the opportunity to promote our products and the values we are all proud of. The T-shirts are given in order to thank you again for your participation in our project. By wearing them you’ll remember your act for a better environment and respect of animals.

 

Our Timeline

Thanks to our models:

 

Version française:

Intro:

Horsegan a été fondé au cours d'un projet de Master avec l'idée de créer un accessoire pour animaux de compagnie qui soit naturel et fabriqué sans matériaux d'origine animale. Nous avons conçu des licols pour chevaux et des colliers pour chiens faits en liège, un matériau naturel, beau,doux et léger qui apporte du confort à votre animal de compagnie ainsi qu’une bonne qualité et résistance. Nous développons nos produits en minimisant notre impact sur l'environnement. L'objectif est de vivre en harmonie avec la nature, en obtenant le meilleur compromis entre qualité, design et propriétés techniques.

Notre projet

Pourquoi du Crowdfunding?

Tout a commencé grâce à notre rencontre dans le cadre de nos études de Master et d’un amour commun: les animaux, la nature, l’écologie. D’un projet scolaire, est devenu une ambition plus grande. Mais créer une startup lorsqu’on est aux études avec peu de moyen est un vrai challenge, les matières premières ne se commandent uniquement en grande quantité, les voyages en Europe pour trouver le bon fournisseur, le bon producteur sont compliqués… Tester les produits, les améliorer coûte du temps et de l’argent. Mais rien ne peut nous arrêté lorsqu'on décide de réaliser son rêve et devine quoi, nous nous avons la chance de t’avoir TOI qui croit en NOUS!

Nous avons besoin de toi pour les précommandes! C’est argent nous permettra de pouvoir réaliser nos premiers produits grâce à ton soutien!

Nous avons besoin de toi pour réussir notre Master et prouvez que nous pouvons créer un monde meilleur.

Nous ne voulons pas nous arrêter là et continuer à développer d’autres gammes de produits, plus stylées, plus confortables, pour nos animaux comme pour nous amis des animaux.

Nos Produits

HORSEGAN protège l’environnement en réduisant l'utilisation de cuir animal et d’autres produits chimiques en produisant des licols pour chevaux et des colliers pour chiens en cuir de liège de haute qualité. Le liège permet la production de licols écologiques permettant de diminuer la quantité d'animaux tués, réduisant également l’impact négatif sur l’environnement et l’émission de grandes quantités de polluants dans notre monde afin de nous aider à préserver la planète.

Licol:

Collier de chien:

About Cork

 

Notre objectif

Notre projet ne consiste pas seulement à fabriquer un produit et à le vendre, mais représente beaucoup plus que ça. Sur le marché, vous avez seulement le choix entre un produit de qualité nommé "cuir" qui est un beau produit mais qui est d’origine animale et contribue à sa souffrance, ou une matière synthétique qui est fabriqué à base de plastique, et donc de polluant. Nous voulons offrir un produit naturel aux propriétaires d’animaux de compagnie qui se soucient de l’environnement et des animaux, et ainsi améliorer le confort de leur mascotte préférée. Le liège à l’avantage d’être beaucoup plus léger et lisse que le cuir.

Même si vous ne vous souciez pas d'acheter du cuir parce que vous pensez que «l'animal est déjà mort pour sa viande», pensez simplement à la consommation de masse et que vous seul pouvez changer les choses. En nous soutenant, vous obtenez un produit unique!

  • Avec votre aide, nous pourrions montrer à notre professeur que nous avons une bonne idée et que nous sommes des entrepreneuses à succès → nous allons obtenir notre diplôme :)
  • Vous contribuerez à créer un monde meilleur, en réduisant la production de produits chimiques et la souffrance des animaux.
  • Nous serions heureuses de partager une photo de votre animal de compagnie avec notre produit sur notre page Instagram ou Facebook, parce que nos animaux de compagnie sont des étoiles!

Notre équipe

Nous sommes 3 étudiantes en Master en Entrepreneuriat, désireuses d'avoir un impact dans le monde. HORSEGAN fait partie  intégrante de notre Master, mais il représente beaucoup plus pour nous: l’opportunité de réaliser un rêve.

Risques & défis

Lancer un nouveau produit est un processus qui prend du temps et de nombreuses étapes doivent être suivies. Nous sommes une équipe très motivée qui est fière de ses licols pour chevaux et de ses colliers pour chiens, mais parfois des problèmes imprévus peuvent surgir et retarder l'expédition des produits. Comme nous savons à quel point il est excitant de recevoir un nouveau produit par la poste, il est essentiel pour nous de tenir nos contributeurs au courant de nos derniers progrès.

Intéressé d'en apprendre plus sur nous? Suivez-nous sur Facebook ou Instagram!

Visitez notre site Web pour plus d’information, astuces, et 'inspiration, et de jolies photos de chiens et de chevaux.

D'autres façons d’aider

Même si certains d'entre vous, proches partisans, ne peuvent pas contribuer à notre projet, cela ne signifie pas que vous ne pouvez pas aider:

  • N'hésitez pas à faire passer le mot et à faire du bruit sur notre campagne!
  • N'oubliez pas qu'ils existent des nombreux outils de partage Indiegogo!
  • Aidez-nous à améliorer notre produit et dites-nous ce que nous pouvons faire mieux!
  • n'hesitez pas à donner un peu d'argent pour nous soutenir, même 1 euro nous aidera !

 

Faites un don et recevez un cadeau

Notre note de gratitude : Notre équipe vous remerciera en vous envoyant une photo personnelle de nous à la fin de la campagne de financement participatif. Nous serions également heureux de partager sur notre site Web une photo de tous les animaux de compagnie et les propriétaires d'animaux qui nous ont aidé avec notre campagne (même si c'est un serpent). Laissez votre imagination prendre son envol, les meilleures photos seront également postées sur Instagram!

Les autocollants :  autocollants HORSEGAN produits par une imprimante certifiée respectueuse de l'environnement. Soyez créatif et collez-les partout où vous voulez promouvoir votre implication pour notre projet et les valeurs que nous respectons.

Bracelet recyclé : Néocombine est une société française qui conçoit des bracelets en utilisant des combinaisons de plongée d'occasion et donne une seconde vie aux matériaux en néoprène tout en suivant un processus de fabrication 100% artisanal.

T-shirt HORSEGAN : Ici, nous vous donnons l'opportunité de promouvoir nos produits et les valeurs dont nous sommes tous fiers. Les T-shirts vous sont remis afin de vous remercier à nouveau pour votre participation à notre projet. En les portant, vous vous souviendrez de votre acte pour un meilleur environnement et le respect des animaux.

 

Notre Timeline

story:
Short Summary

BraveHearts Expeditions is an Outdoor Adventure and Experiential Learning  business. We provide one-to-three-day hiking, trekking, abseiling, biking, kayaking and mountaineering adventure services in Ghana.

Our modern-day Explorers sleep in tents, eat food cooked over camp fires, hike on some of Ghana’s breath-taking landforms, slush through knee-high rivers, hack their way through jungle thickets, scramble over dirt paths, kayak on lakes and engage waterfalls on expeditions that contribute to creating economic power for young people and local communities, and enhancing Ghana's tourism sector.

This campaign aims to generate funds to build a global adventure tourism centre on islands in Lake Volta. It is important for us to do this, and your contributions will help put Ghana on the world map as Africa's most engaging adventure tourism destination.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are campaigning to raise a starting minimum of 500,000 Ghana Cedis (~$105,000) to set up the Survival Island Adventure Resort, which will host the following:

  • The world’s longest zip lines over the world’s largest man-made lake at thrilling lengths of 5.2km and an installed capacity of 500 participants a day
  • A highly interactive high-action ropes challenge infrastructure to accommodate a minimum 1000 customers a day.
  • A freshwater climatic pool and chalets  for corporate retreats and overnight campers.
  • Passenger-boat cruises to and from adventures on Survival Island.
  • Weekend, week-long and day-out Kayaking adventures for tourists, adventurers and corporate bodies (already done).
  • Paint-balling adventures and contests for thrill- and adventure-seekers.
  • Boathouses and Docks (already done)
  • Canopy walkways

In return for your contribution, we offer you twice the value of your contribution in adventure services. If you contribute 500 Cedis, for example, you will receive tickets worth 1000 Cedis to sign up for adventures on Survival Island, and the tickets have lifetime value - they never expire until the services are used up.

 

The Impact

This project not only creates a new adventure paradigm for Ghana and West Africa; it also gives contributors the power to reshape Ghana's tourism potential to the image they have always wanted to see. In addition, this project will:

  • Create employment, 65% for rural women, during the 3-month construction and installation period.
  • Provide economic incentives to protect the rich ecosystem of the Volta Lake and prevent biodiversity loss through enjoyment of its natural and lacustrine resources.
  • Train and employ at least 100 unemployed graduates as adventure guides, customer service operatives and office staff.
  • Contribute to ecotourism offerings around the Akosombo dam.
  • Increase Ghana tax revenues from tourism.
  • Increase foreign exchange inflows from tourists

 

Risks & Challenges

The challenges we might face in pulling this project off (interference from government agencies or feet-dragging in some small aspects, Ghana ports and harbour delays, storms on Lake Volta, extreme heat and dehydration due to elemental exposure during construction and validation) will all be overcome by our governmental and public sector networks, our unparalleled experience working in Ghana's amazing outdoors, and our tenacity and leadership as West Africa's leading adventure tourism firm.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you have no funds to contribute, you can help us by sharing this campaign with those who you believe can, and asking them to contribute. This campaign contributes to funds we hope to raise from potential investors we are currently engaged with. You can also talk to us about project investment opportunities. Together, we can pull this off as an unprecedented West African first!

story:
Your family looks forward to summertime all year, but then...

 


Your kids LOVE the public pool or nearby splash park but...

 

 

What you really need? Something to keep them outside, having fun and staying cool right in your own backyard.


Enter Splash2o. The world's first portable at-home splash pad, with an industrial design built to match the splash pads available at public parks, Splash2o gives families (finally!) an affordable and long-lasting solution for outdoor water fun at home. Keep your kids cool, active, and entertained summer after summer, all in the comfort of your very own backyard. The collapsible, modular Aqua-Tower allows quick, easy setup and storage. Switch out or upgrade Aqua-Stations for a customized play experience.
 


SPLASH2O HIGHLIGHTS:

  • World’s first at-home portable splash pad
  • Versatile, collapsible + easy to store design
  • Simple, click to connect for initial assembly
  • Customizable water play: choose from 8 interchangeable Aqua-Stations
  • Accommodates kids of all ages: spacious footprint (9'x9’) with adjustable height (3’-6’)
     

AQUA-TOWER FEATURES

 

 

 

STANDARD AQUA-STATIONS

Your Aqua-Tower comes with 8 Aqua-Stations to maximize the fun. 
 

 

We are also working on additional play stations and accessories with many more to come so that your children can have something new and exciting summer after summer.
 

Future accessories and stations include:
 


Here's how we stack up against the alternatives:
 

Benefits for parents:

  • An easy to set up and store outdoor structure that keeps kids occupied during the hot weather months without having to leave home.
  • Accommodate nap schedules and save time and energy by staying home but still getting outdoors.
  • An affordable solution that will last for years: current inflatables break after one or two seasons of hard use and at home splash pad installations today are custom creations and professionally installed, costing thousands of dollars.
     

Benefits for Caregivers / Daycare Providers

  • Add one or two Aqua-Tower systems to your business and give kids in your care hours of safe fun that parents will approve of and childcare providers can benefit from

  • Spend $2k and receive five setups to use throughout your facility that are completely DIY and easy to store, especially if you are in a cold weather area where things need to be brought indoors to avoid storms, cold weather and wind, etc.

  • Make your business more attractive to parents in warm weather months by providing a solution to the heat and allowing their kids to get more outdoors time.

 

Commitment to Community

By supporting us, you will not only be making your summers more fun, but also helping our kids and communities.

Our children are very fortunate to be growing up in a loving environment filled with many joyful memories, but we realize there are lots of children out there who do not have such an opportunity. A portion of Splash2o proceeds will be donated to local and national charities such as 4KIDS, whose main mission is improving children’s quality of life. We believe children are the future. Join us in creating a better future.

Our manufacturing will take place in the USA, so you will also be helping strengthen our domestic workforce and community.

Speaking of manufacturing, the expenses associated with engineering and tooling a product of this size are quite significant. While reaching our funding goal will not cover all these costs, it will provide us with the market validation and the momentum for securing the remaining funds to make sure we get your perks shipped as promised.

The Splash2o Aqua-Tower will have your neighbors peeking their heads over the fence in awe, and their kids maybe even jumping the fence to get in on all the fun.

 

Splash2o in the Media

 

                       

                         

 

Who are we?

We are David and Carol Ertur. We live in a suburban home in Florida with our two children, Caden (5) and Ava (3). Having two young kids at home all day keeps us (mom) extremely busy, with little time for breaks. The hot summers call for lots of water activities. We don’t have a pool in our backyard, so we either have to go to parks or find water toys that the kids won't destroy or get bored with quickly. We prefer staying home in our backyard though, as it allows the kids to run around freely and still gives us parents some time to socialize and catch up. We needed an affordable, backyard summertime option full of water activities, and that's how we came up with Splash2o.

Risks & Challenges

As with any product development effort, we expect to come across a few challenges: some that we plan for and some that we just won't be able to predict. Rest assured that we are well poised to quickly tackle and overcome any obstacles. Our well rounded, cross-functional team has many years of experience and an extensive network in the field of product development for nationally recognized brand names such as Mr. Coffee, Sunbeam, Oster, Calphalon, and more. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you cannot invest money at this time, but we equally value your investment of feedback.  If you have any suggestions or recommendations, please contacts us. Or if you're willing to take a survey, please provide us your email. Oh and please don't forget to spread the word about Splash2o.
story_txt:
Your family looks forward to summertime all year, but then... 
Your kids LOVE the public pool or nearby splash park but...
  What you really need? Something to keep them outside, having fun and staying cool right in your own backyard.Enter Splash2o. The world's first portable at-home splash pad, with an industrial design built to match the splash pads available at public parks, Splash2o gives families (finally!) an affordable and long-lasting solution for outdoor water fun at home. Keep your kids cool, active, and entertained summer after summer, all in the comfort of your very own backyard. The collapsible, modular Aqua-Tower allows quick, easy setup and storage. Switch out or upgrade Aqua-Stations for a customized play experience. 
SPLASH2O HIGHLIGHTS:
World’s first at-home portable splash pad
Versatile, collapsible + easy to store design
Simple, click to connect for initial assembly
Customizable water play: choose from 8 interchangeable Aqua-Stations
Accommodates kids of all ages: spacious footprint (9'x9’) with adjustable height (3’-6’) 
AQUA-TOWER FEATURES   STANDARD AQUA-STATIONSYour Aqua-Tower comes with 8 Aqua-Stations to maximize the fun.   We are also working on additional play stations and accessories with many more to come so that your children can have something new and exciting summer after summer. Future accessories and stations include:

story:
Summary

Hi! We're the Davis family. Oklahoma born and raised, we've been floating the Illinois River for years. We've loved the beautiful scenery, the friendly faces, and the awesome experience to be had around the Tahlequah area and in the Illinois River resorts. On our yearly float in 2016, we met veteran and longtime river resident Ross, current owner of Patriot Park.

Ross informed us of his wish to travel, to sell his property and spend more time with his grandchildren. So, after much consideration and time invested in exploring the possibilities of this property, we decided we'd like to maintain and grow this scenic river destination.

We have only one problem: financing.

With your help, we can purchase this property and keep it open for families, groups, couples etc. to come and enjoy the Illinois River and gorgeous surroundings year-round. If we are able to finance this property we will have it up and running in time for Summer, even Memorial Day, so anyone willing can book a stay or event with us in time for Summer 2017.

Once we've gotten started, this property will allow for group camping (motorcycle clubs, boy/girl scouts, reunions, etc.), events and parties, overnight tent stays, honeymoon getaways and even weddings, which we already have experience hosting around Northwest Oklahoma. We currently have mobile entertainment service including a DJ and PA rentals. Any sort of event you can imagine will be possible on the riverside.

What We Need & What You Get

All we're in need of is assistance with a down payment and starting amenities. We've managed to negotiate a down payment that we can almost afford, and we're so close! All we need is a little kindness, faith and help from the community. In return, book your stay or event with us and have confidence we will make it memorable and worth-while.

To break it down, specific things we need include:

  • Landscaping Equipment (Mower, weed eater, etc.)
  • Additional Furniture (TVs, Stands, Lamps, etc.)
  • Kitchen Amenities (Pots, pans, dishes, utensils, etc.)
  • Bathroom Amenities (Toilet paper, towels, rags, etc.)
  • Bedroom Fittings (Sheets, Blankets, Pillows etc.)

If we don't reach our entire goal this will significantly delay our efforts, but believe we will find a way!

In the event we raise more than expected, your hard-earned money will not go to waste. Our future plans include:

  • Adding several cabins of varying sizes and packages for cabin stays.
  • Adding bunks for group stays
  • Landscaping significantly to include waterways, diverse plant-life, etc.
  • Expanding our possibilities for weddings and similar events. A chapel/arch by a waterfall and reception area.
  • Bed and Breakfast amenities.
  • Spas or hot tubs for winter stays.
  • Deep swimming area against the riverbank.
  • And more ideas every day!

Risks & Challenges

As with any endeavor like this, we face significant challenges. Your efforts will help greatly with these, of course, but our monthly expenses will need to be buffered by income. This means we have to be able to start up quickly to offset expenses. We feel as a family we are more than capable of this.

It is important to note that we will not provide floating opportunities, as we are unable to do this commercially. We will eventually provide private float opportunities and you are more than welcome to reserve a float through one of the resorts, just down the road!

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be able to contribute, and we respect that fully. But we still need your help! Share this with your friends and family, on your social media, get the word out!

Use the share tools provided by Indiegogo to share our cause on your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

Thank You!

With your help we can make this secluded riverfront destination a great getaway available for all.

story:
The idea of Wellve is a healthy whole life of experience for you and your pet. Wellve offers pet's safety, wellness and satisfactions of quality services for pet lovers.  Our aim is to make every creature on the Earth to Be Healthy and Happy.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Wellve pack includes a Pet collar ‘Well.Fit’, Pet Lover’s ‘Well.Finder’, charging cable and Wellve app.
You can download Wellve app for free from iTunes or the Google Play store.

 

 

 

 

“Wellve” is a health care wearable device service for pet on mission to keep you and your pet together even when you’re not physically there. Using LoRa and Bluetooth technology, Wellve system’s AI remote control app allows owners to watch, get a customized food recipe, and check their pet’s activities in real time. A WellFit's GPS feature gives you a finder of all your babies (pet) you might have missed while you were away, and also monitors them, analyzes and shares information at the touch of a button in app.

 

 

 

 

“WellFinder” can connect to “WellFit” in the range up to 2,000yd. And the pet’s owner doesn’t have to pay communication fee.

“WellFinder” is a guardian which helps you prevent losing your pets. You can easily track them by using an app on your mobile device that is connected to “WellFinder” via Bluetooth. Moreover, a single “WellFinder” can connect to multiple “WellFit” and you can also check multiple pets information in the app.

 

 

 

There are two physical modules, one is a wearable device for your baby(pet), WellFit, the other is for an owner, WellFinder keyring. They are wirelessly connected to each other, and all you need to make them work is the Wellve's App!

Wellve devices are rechargeable (5-pin micro USB cable is included). Most importantly, WellFit is sturdy and waterproof which is enough to accompany your best friends for the craziest adventures.

You might be asking yourself,

At the core of Wellve,
LoRa & AI technology are used and developed by our team entirely. It allows both devices to communicate wirelessly in a range of up to 1,2 mile (1 900m) and eliminates the need for a cellular connection to send the GPS coordinates which means the devices consume less battery and the required monthly fees are totally removed!

 

Here is a short demo video where you can actually see Wellve's main functionalities in action:

 

 

1 . Everywhere & No Monthly fee

We hope to you don't pay.
Wherever you are, there is no need to pay the communication services fee.
That's why "wellve" uses LoRa and Bluetooth, the hybrid technology for the communication.
which let "WellFinder" connect to WellFit" in range up to 1,2 mile(1 900 m).

2. AI Health Care Management

We hope  you live with your healthy baby(pet) for always.
That's why "Wellve"  provides  fitness management and AI which customizes food nutrition information.

 

3. Safety

We hope you travel with your baby(pet) safely.
That's why "Wellve" provides private communication and "WellFinder" is guardian which helps you prevent losing your pet or helps you in case of an emergency.

 

4. Multi connect

We hope  you can always easily take care of your babies.
That’s why a single “WellFinder” can connect to multiple “WellFit” and you can also check multiple pets information in our app.

 

5. AI Real-time Tracker

We hope you don’t worry about pet sitting from a dog walker.
That’s why “Wellve” provides real-time tracking which allows you to monitor your baby whenever you want to see him/her.

 

6. Pet info Share

We hope you can easily share your healthy baby information to your family or dog walker.
That’s why “Wellve” provides a sharing function in the app.

 

 

 

 

Pet Research Institute

We work Co-partner, Pethérapie. (Premium Aroma Health Care, Natural Food, Activities, PetHotel, etc.)

 

Main Office

(Device and app development)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Much like the Avengers, our team consists of a bunch of superheroes who have united their powers for the greater good. Our team possesses a wealth of experience with a combined total of more than 70 years!

 

 

 

Why did We started?

 

 


Myself, I take care of six dogs and know is not easy to remember who was already fed and when was their last walk. Sometimes is difficult to balance a work and pet care. So we have studied have solve this problem.

We have studied many of times for Wellve design. The product of Users(dogs) is smart and cool design to Apple owner.

Since 2017, Wellve is alumni of GCCEI program - the Korea’s #1 Government Hardware Startup incubator. They’ve helped bringing over 100 products to market in the last 3 years with a lot of experience in this process. They help us with manufacturing to make sure everything goes smoothly with N15 acclerator. You can read more about N15 and GCCEI here.

N15 >   http://www.n15.asia/
GCCEI >   https://ccei.creativekorea.or.kr/eng/main.do

 

We're also a part of the France accelerator Agency CREATIVE VALLEY's Business Incubation Center program. So we have opened a region office in Creative Valley. They provide us with comprehensive business support in STATION F in Paris, and their knowledge on service. You can read more about STATION F here.

STATION >   https://stationf.co/fr/
CREATIVE VALLEY >   https://www.creative-valley.fr/

 

So we’ve got a solid base,
the blueprints for the improvements and the tools to implement them -

now we just need your help to turn our project into a reality!

 

 

When you refer your friends and help spread the word about our campaign, we reward you with special offers and perks. Please read this section carefully to find out how to participate in this contest.  >>> Click Here

 

- 1st. Method

Click these share buttons and share quickly

 

 

- 2nd. Method

Log in to indiegogo, visit Wellve indiegogo page: https://igg.me/at/wellve

Find the share button and share directly

 

 

- 3rd. Method

In addition to the one click share button, you can also take two steps to refer our campaign to more people:

* Step 1 : Login your indiegogo account, and go to our campaign page, copy the link with the series number, that’s your unique referral pixel. 

* Step 2 : Paste that link to anywhere with large viewership, like your emails, Facebook groups, Linkedin groups, personal blogs, Pinterest groups or some forums, anywhere. The more you share, the better your chance is of winning a FREE our gift.

 

 

 

1) Why is the Super Early Bird so cheap?
It is too good to be true. What discounts can be expected after the Super Early Bird?

First of all, please trust the quality of Wellve. Our team members of Allfin, have worked in the IT industry for more than 10 years! We have more development experience for major brands such as Samsung, Hyundai, SKT, KT. Allfin has top tier engineers to develop these innovative AI products for you! We also work with our co-partners, one of Korea's leading telecom factories! And are assisted by our new co-partner in this camp. The most important thing is that we love your pet.

That’s why we offer surprisingly low prices for early bird specials. Even though we cannot cover the cost at this low price, it is super good to brand and benefit our first batch of fans. Of course, these discounts are so big that we can only offer a limited quantity at this price. Once the cost reaches the budget, the early bird discount will be gone. Super Early Bird benefits are the best discounts you can get – back Wellve now before it’s sold out!

 

2) When is the expected delivery?

We planned to start shipping in August. However, Wellve is so much more popular than we expected in Exhibitions. We are already in the process of production, and the expected shipping time will be in early Auguet. We will ship in batches.

 

3）What’s the IP rating of these products? Can my dog take a swimming with your Wellve?

By using a water-repellent sealing design and Waterproof USB-port, it keeps the inside of a device dry and fully functional, which means that Wellfit is sweat, rain and swim proof. We have designed it to be worn while swimming from the start. So there will be a Wellfit waterproof test video soon.

Wellfit, the dog collar, has been tested to IP7 rating, but our team generally makes conservative statements. You don't need to warry about your puppy playing on the water anymore. Wellve will surely bring you more surprises!!!

 

4) Are there plans for more colors to be offered?

We offer just two type color for our Wellve fans to choose our every new products. But during crowdfunding event, you can choose a one color, white.

 

5) What version Bluetooth does Wellve use?

Wellve uses Bluetooth LE 4.0.  Wellve Priemium uses both Bluetooth LE 4.2 and 5.0 since we are considering more devices that can connect to Bluetooth 5.0 in the near future. And our Bluetooth provides 128-bit security for your safety.

6) What is the warranty policy if I receive a defective set?

We value our users, and believe in our products. We tested all products before packaged. However, if there is a problem due to manufacturer's defect, we will replace it.

 

7) How do I get my Order ID?

You can find your Order ID by logging in to your Indiegogo account and clicking on ‘My Contribution’If you login, you could see secret promotion event gift.

 

8) Why does it take 2 hours to charge the battery case？

We provide a USB charging cable for you to charge anywhere. 2 hours is the maximum charging time in case you charge from a low-voltage power source like computer’s USB port. So, in most cases, it takes less than 2 hours to get both the WellFit and WellFinder fully charged. 

 

9) What type of antenna do you use?

We use chip antenna and choose the small mobile devices. Although the cost of the chip antenna is higher than other types, the size, weight and stability for the multi-connection are better.

 

10) Can you manage more one dogs, and can you use a cat?

Yes, if you have multiple dogs, you may buy more WellFit to use with Wellfinder which allow you to manage up to 10 dogs. And our next product, Wellfinder home, can connect and have more control with longer distance.  
If your lovely cat like pet collar or cloth, you can also use it. We provide the fashionable clothes for mini pet. And with this promotion, a mark can be changed to cat icon.

 

11) How can I change the color from white to others？

Indiegogo does allow you one color. Because Our Identity is White and Black color. WellFit color are couple with your base Apple products. But We will next products add new colors.

 

12）What’s the Wellve’s advantage of bass effect compared to other pet collar？

Our AI dynamic GPS pet collar is controlled by AWS Cloud System. It is designed to provide balanced data by taking advantage of battery life with outdoor activities. And with LoRa communication technology, you can use Wellve anywhere without monthly fees. So Wellve has a special technique and patents for long term battery effect. Because We think always with pets. Wellve is a design product to follow a pet's weight 1% under. 

 

13) Does it have charging cables and other appendix?

This item includes a pair of Wellve(WellFit & WellFinder) as a pet collar accessory with a charging cable and guide book. Thanks!

 

14) Does your  products have connection delay?

We use the latest Bluetooth and LoRa technology and pass multiple tests to solve the problem of RF connection delay. In normal using, there will be almost no connection delay or broken line.

 

Take this QR code and Share quickly,
