N15 >   http://www.n15.asia/GCCEI >   https://ccei.creativekorea.or.kr/eng/main.do
 
We're also a part of the France accelerator Agency CREATIVE VALLEY's Business Incubation Center program. So we have opened a region office in Creative Valley. They provide us with comprehensive business support in STATION F in Paris, and their knowledge on service. You can read more about STATION F here.
STATION >   https://stationf.co/fr/CREATIVE VALLEY >   https://www.creative-valley.fr/
 
So we’ve got a solid base,the blueprints for the improvements and the tools to implement them -
now we just need your help to turn our project into a reality!
 
 

When you refer your friends and help spread the word about our campaign, we reward you with special offers and perks. Please read this section carefully to find out how to participate in this contest.  >>> Click Here
 
- 1st. Method
Click these share buttons and share quickly

 
 
- 2nd. Method
Log in to indiegogo, visit Wellve indiegogo page: https://igg.me/at/wellve
Find the share button and share directly

 
 
- 3rd. Method
In addition to the one click share button, you can also take two steps to refer our campaign to more people:
* Step 1 : Login your indiegogo account, and go to our campaign page, copy the link with the series number, that’s your unique referral pixel. 
* Step 2 : Paste that link to anywhere with large viewership, like your emails, Facebook groups, Linkedin groups, personal blogs, Pinterest groups or some forums, anywhere. The more you share, the better your chance is of winning a FREE our gift.
 
 

 

1) Why is the Super Early Bird so cheap?It is too good to be true. What discounts can be expected after the Super Early Bird?
First of all, please trust the quality of Wellve. Our team members of Allfin, have worked in the IT industry for more than 10 years! We have more development experience for major brands such as Samsung, Hyundai, SKT, KT. Allfin has top tier engineers to develop these innovative AI products for you! We also work with our co-partners, one of Korea's leading telecom factories! And are assisted by our new co-partner in this camp. The most important thing is that we love your pet.
That’s why we offer surprisingly low prices for early bird specials. Even though we cannot cover the cost at this low price, it is super good to brand and benefit our first batch of fans. Of course, these discounts are so big that we can only offer a limited quantity at this price. Once the cost reaches the budget, the early bird discount will be gone. Super Early Bird benefits are the best discounts you can get – back Wellve now before it’s sold out!
 
2) When is the expected delivery?
We planned to start shipping in August. However, Wellve is so much more popular than we expected in Exhibitions. We are already in the process of production, and the expected shipping time will be in early Auguet. We will ship in batches.
 
3）What’s the IP rating of these products? Can my dog take a swimming with your Wellve?
By using a water-repellent sealing design and Waterproof USB-port, it keeps the inside of a device dry and fully functional, which means that Wellfit is sweat, rain and swim proof. We have designed it to be worn while swimming from the start. So there will be a Wellfit waterproof test video soon.
Wellfit, the dog collar, has been tested to IP7 rating, but our team generally makes conservative statements. You don't need to warry about your puppy playing on the water anymore. Wellve will surely bring you more surprises!!!
 
4) Are there plans for more colors to be offered?
We offer just two type color for our Wellve fans to choose our every new products. But during crowdfunding event, you can choose a one color, white.
 
5) What version Bluetooth does Wellve use?
Wellve uses Bluetooth LE 4.0.  Wellve Priemium uses both Bluetooth LE 4.2 and 5.0 since we are considering more devices that can connect to Bluetooth 5.0 in the near future. And our Bluetooth provides 128-bit security for your safety.
6) What is the warranty policy if I receive a defective set?
We value our users, and believe in our products. We tested all products before packaged. However, if there is a problem due to manufacturer's defect, we will replace it.
 
7) How do I get my Order ID?
You can find your Order ID by logging in to your Indiegogo account and clicking on ‘My Contribution’If you login, you could see secret promotion event gift.
 
8) Why does it take 2 hours to charge the battery case？
We provide a USB charging cable for you to charge anywhere. 2 hours is the maximum charging time in case you charge from a low-voltage power source like computer’s USB port. So, in most cases, it takes less than 2 hours to get both the WellFit and WellFinder fully charged. 
 
9) What type of antenna do you use?
We use chip antenna and choose the small mobile devices. Although the cost of the chip antenna is higher than other types, the size, weight and stability for the multi-connection are better.
 
10) Can you manage more one dogs, and can you use a cat?
Yes, if you have multiple dogs, you may buy more WellFit to use with Wellfinder which allow you to manage up to 10 dogs. And our next product, Wellfinder home, can connect and have more control with longer distance.  If your lovely cat like pet collar or cloth, you can also use it. We provide the fashionable clothes for mini pet. And with this promotion, a mark can be changed to cat icon.
 
11) How can I change the color from white to others？
Indiegogo does allow you one color. Because Our Identity is White and Black color. WellFit color are couple with your base Apple products. But We will next products add new colors.
 
12）What’s the Wellve’s advantage of bass effect compared to other pet collar？
Our AI dynamic GPS pet collar is controlled by AWS Cloud System. It is designed to provide balanced data by taking advantage of battery life with outdoor activities. And with LoRa communication technology, you can use Wellve anywhere without monthly fees. So Wellve has a special technique and patents for long term battery effect. Because We think always with pets. Wellve is a design product to follow a pet's weight 1% under. 
 
13) Does it have charging cables and other appendix?
This item includes a pair of Wellve(WellFit & WellFinder) as a pet collar accessory with a charging cable and guide book. Thanks!
 
14) Does your  products have connection delay?
We use the latest Bluetooth and LoRa technology and pass multiple tests to solve the problem of RF connection delay. In normal using, there will be almost no connection delay or broken line.
 
Take this QR code and Share quickly,

story:
Meet OFFROAD COFFEE

 

 

INTRODUCING

https://offroad-coffee.com

This portable magnetic espresso maker is the first of its kind.
In the construction are used two completely new principles of espresso making.

  •       1.  This machine produces the necessary pressure for espresso by WINDING UP the device.  This provides full control over the pressure.

SQUEEZE YOUR ESPRESSO.

  •      2. The unique MAGNETIC valve. The coffee passes through this valve. So it creates a thick silk cream.
  • 3.  The device has a separate heater. If you do not have hot water, you can use it. But if you put hot water directly in the machine, it will still work. So you can use OFFROAD COFFEE both outdoors and at home. It does not need a battery.​

​

 

 

 

 

 

 

FEATURED IN

 

 

Anytime Anywhere ESPRESSO

 

You can use OFFROAD COFFEE on a motorcycle, in the car, on the boat, in the camper, with thermos, outdoors, at home or in the office.

The coffee machine has a 12-volt heater but you can also pour hot water directly in it. It works perfectly with ground coffee. Compatible with coffee pods e.s.e. It can work also with original Nespresso capsules. Stand for comfortable work at home. Waterproof and impactproof bag for easy carrying with compartments for coffee, sugar, stirrers. Full control of espressing. Easy to work with. Easy to wash.

 

MAGNETIC NOZZLE

ADAPTERS

Stand for comfortable work at home.

 

TRAVEL BAGS

MATERIAL :  NYLON 600D

THREE DIFFERENT TRAVEL BAGS

 

 

 

ABOUT ME

For me, espresso is everything, therefore it should be everywhere.
There is nothing better than a delicious espresso. And it's great to have a small espresso maker with you anytime you need it.

My job is to service all sorts of espresso machinеs for almost two decades. I have a small espresso machine workshop service in my hometown.
In my spare time I love to travel. Every time when I and my friends are far from home, we feel the lack of good espresso.

https://offroad-coffee.com

 

 

Made of precision CNC lathes

 

 

 

Please be aware that we cannot mark any shipments as a gift. This is illegal so we will not be able to do this.

The perks will send  everywhere in the world via International Courier.Delivery within 3-5 working days.

Backers are responsible for any and all import fees, VAT, duties, taxes, post office fees, and or any other fees their country or government imposes, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries, to as much as 200% for certain South American countries. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo.

Shipments that could not be delivered due to an inaccurately provided address (including failure to update an old address) will have additional costs to be reshipped. Due to the size of your rewards, we cannot ship to PO Boxes.

As you know with international shipping there can be unpredictable delays that are out of our control, however, we will do our absolute best to ship based on the predicted time frame.

 

https://offroad-coffee.com

story:
Order yours today so we can deliver to the Masses!!

Our message!

Thanks for viewing, contributing or even sharing this page!

Our mission here at Pendulum Innovations is not only to deliver on our product but to continue in developing nifty products that are aesthetic and useful!

 

Our background:

Javier Godoy: Designer, drafter and operations specialist

Sergio Reyes: Blue collar hardware industrial background.

Llanele Razo: Clerical and packing specialist

 

To all our backers we appreciate all your support to deliver!!!

HELP STIR THINGS UP AND SHARE! :)

story:
The KeyBiner is a more refined version of a time tested tool many have used to carry their essentials every day.  The biggest change was the addition of a unique key retention system, that allows you to keep your keys neatly organized and quiet.  We have also added several tools to aid you in your daily chores. The KeyBiner has no sharp edges to cut you or damage your clothing.

AVAILABLE IN 3 MATERIALS OF YOUR CHOICE:  Aluminum, Copper, and Titanium

Please share this project with your friends, on Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter with the hashtag #KeyBiner


1/8"- 3/16" - 1/4" - 5/16" - 3/8" 10mm  Wrenches
Screw Bit Driver
Flat Blade Screw Driver/Prybar/File


UNLOCK GOALS

$8,000  -  Once this project goal has been met all backers will receive one Aircraft Wire Key loop with their order.  Great for attaching key fobs and other essential gear


$10,000  -  Once this project goal has been met all Aluminum Backers will have their choice of colored anodizing FOR FREE
$15,000 -  Once this project goal has been met all Titanium Backers will have their choice of colored anodizing FOR FREE


$55,000 - Once this goal has been met KeyBiner Backers (with pledge over $24) get a FREE Aluminum KeyBiner (tumbled) with their order


What We Need & What You Get

  • We manufacture the KeyBiner here in Erie, PA USA, and have already procured all the machinery neccessary to fullfill the demand.  Our facility is capable of producing thousands of KeyBiners a week if neccessary.
  • Funding will go to purchasing a larger quantity of raw materials as well as hiring employees to help with manufacturing.
  • You will receive your KeyBiner, in your choice of material.

The Impact

  • We are dedicated to manufacturing all KeyBiners here in the USA.  This way we can assure quality control over the product.  This helps us create jobs, stimulate the domestic economy, and grow a small business.

Risks & Challenges

  • We have already purchased the machinery and created all the fixtures required to mass produce our product.
  • We will need to hire 1-2 full time employees to help with manufacturing, assembly and shipping.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if KeyBiner isn't "for you", it would be a great help to share this project on your social media sites and spread the word to your friends.  Thanks again!
